ingredients: 2 lb ground beef, 1 packages taco season, 1 each onion, 1 can enchilada sauce, 1 can rotel, 2 bags of chips, 1 12 packages cream cheese, 1 12 stick velvetta cheese
directions: add rotel, enchilada sauce, and onions and simmer, cook ground beef, or turkey, add cheese, both, crush chips and add to skillet, place more chips on top and grated cheese, bake at 400f until chips are toasted and cheese is melted, garnish with lettuce tomatoes and salsa
input_text: Ingredients: 2 lb ground beef, 1 packages taco season, 1 each onion, 1 can enchilada sauce, 1 can rotel, 2 bags of chips, 1 12 packages cream cheese, 1 12 stick velvetta cheese
target_text: Directions: add rotel, enchilada sauce, and onions and simmer, cook ground beef, or turkey, add cheese, both, crush chips and add to skillet, place more chips on top and grated cheese, bake at 400f until chips are toasted and cheese is melted, garnish with lettuce tomatoes and salsa

ingredients: 1 canned ham about 45lbs, 40 slice american cheese, 20 kaiser rolls, 12 cup butter margarine approximatly, 20 tsp spicy brown or original mustard optional, 6 tbsp bacon grease
directions: slice canned ham into slices appropriate for a sandwich, hint i make mine about 14 inch, i used dabuque brand canned ham but u can use deli sliced ham or package sliced ham, but id make sure they were thick enough to fry up,  u can also use bologna slices, preheat skillet on medium high with 2tbl, bacon grease, hint u may sub for butter or a nice flavorful oil, hint if pan gets to hot just lower heat, , fry ham slices for about 30 seconds to one minute per side, give a nice browning, add bacon grease as needed, set ham aside, preheat oven to 375, slice all kaiser rolls in equal halves all the way through, butter both sides of the inside part of the buns, then spread mustard on one side or both sides depends on how much u like hint u can omit mustard as i did, place 1 slice of cheese per roll half hint u can omit cheese, cut down amount of cheese or use any type of cheese u wish, cheddar goes perfect with these as well, place 23 slices of ham more or less depending on ur liking on half of the rolls, place the other half of rolls on top of the ham cheese side down, wrap each sandwich in a piece of aluminum foil, hint this helps with lots of things it keeps the bread protected and keeps the juices in , hint to wrap place a sheet of foil large enough to completely wrap sandwich in, place sandwich top side down, fold each corner in overlapping, then place folded side down onto cookie sheet, place sandwiches on a cookiebaking sheet, bake for 1015 min, or until pipping hot and cheese is melted and gooey hint unwrap one to check after 10 min, place still wrapped sanwiches on a serving tray or large bowl, serve hot with toppings of choice, they can now unwrap their hot ham n cheese and assemble with favorite toppings, toppings suggested would be slices of tomato, onion, lettuce, pepper rings, jalpeno rings and pickle slices or any other toppings u would like, enjoy, , serves about 20 large sandwiches

ingredients: vegetable, prepared as indicated, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, cucumbers 2 meaty kirby cucs, cut into 18 slices, radishes 1 bunch radishes, scrubbed well  cut into thin wedges through the root end, daikon 1 large or 3 small daikon radishes, peeled and cut into very, very thin slices
directions: 1 combine the vegetable with the sugar and salt in a small mixing bowl and toss to coat with the sugar and salt let sit for 5 to 10 minutes, , 2 taste if the pickles are too sweet or too salty, put them in a colander, rinse off the seasoning and dry in a kitchen towel taste again and add more sugar or salt if needed serve after 5 to 10 minutes, or refrigerate for up to 4 hours
input_text: Ingredients: vegetable, prepared as indicated, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, cucumbers 2 meaty kirby cucs, cut into 18 slices, radishes 1 bunch radishes, scrubbed well  cut into thin wedges through the root end, daikon 1 large or 3 small daikon radishes, peeled and cut into very, very thin slices
target_text: Directions: 1 combine the vegetable with the sugar and salt in a small mixing bowl and toss to coat with the sugar and salt let sit for 5 to 10 minutes, , 2 taste if the pickles are too sweet or too salty, put them in a colander, rinse off the seasoning and dry in a kitchen towel taste again and add more sugar or salt if needed serve after 5 to 10 minutes, or refrigerate for up to 4 hours

ingredients: 1 tablespoon flour, 12 tablespoon cocoa, 2 cups flour, 34 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 4 ounce bottle maraschino cherries, 12 cup butter, 1 12 cups sugar, 2 eggs, 4 ounces unsweetened chocolate melted, 1 13 cups evaporated milk, milk chocolate kiss, 14 cup quik chocolate milk mix, 14 confectioners sugar, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, 2 cups heavy cream, whip until stiff
directions: preheat oven to 350f combine flour and cocoa, grease 2 9 cake pans and dust with mixture, sift flour, salt and baking powder, set aside drain and chop cherries keep juice, set both aside, cream butter and then gradually add sugar, beat until fluffy, add eggs, chocolate, milk and cherry juice, beat until smooth, blend in flour mixture and stir, add cherries and stir, bake 2530 minutes remove from oven and let set for 58 minutes, remove from pans and cool on racks split cakes in two, layer and frost w chocolate whipped cream
input_text: Ingredients: 1 tablespoon flour, 12 tablespoon cocoa, 2 cups flour, 34 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 4 ounce bottle maraschino cherries, 12 cup butter, 1 12 cups sugar, 2 eggs, 4 ounces unsweetened chocolate melted, 1 13 cups evaporated milk, milk chocolate kiss, 14 cup quik chocolate milk mix, 14 confectioners sugar, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, 2 cups heavy cream, whip until stiff
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 350f combine flour and cocoa, grease 2 9 cake pans and dust with mixture, sift flour, salt and baking powder, set aside drain and chop cherries keep juice, set both aside, cream butter and then gradually add sugar, beat until fluffy, add eggs, chocolate, milk and cherry juice, beat until smooth, blend in flour mixture and stir, add cherries and stir, bake 2530 minutes remove from oven and let set for 58 minutes, remove from pans and cool on racks split cakes in two, layer and frost w chocolate whipped cream

ingredients: 8 oz light philadelphia cream cheese, 4 tbsp sugar or more to taste, 3 tbsp sweet milk, 6 oz light dream whip
directions: beat cream cheese, sugar and milk until smooth, fold in dream whip and chill, serve with fruit
input_text: Ingredients: 8 oz light philadelphia cream cheese, 4 tbsp sugar or more to taste, 3 tbsp sweet milk, 6 oz light dream whip
target_text: Directions: beat cream cheese, sugar and milk until smooth, fold in dream whip and chill, serve with fruit

ingredients: 3 tbsp butter, 4 tbsp allpurpose flour, 1 12 c hot milk, 12 tsp salt, 14 tsp pepper, dash of cayenne optional, dash of dry mustard optional, 1 c grated sharp cheese, 2 12 c cooked or canned asparagus, 12 c asparagus liquid, 1 2 oz jar diced pimento, 12 c sliced blanched almonds
directions: in a saucepan, blend butter and flour gradually add milk and seasonings, cook until thickened, stirring constantly, remove from heat and stir in cheese, place asparagus and stock in a greased 13 x 9 x 2inch casserole dish cover with cream sauce sprinkle with pimento and almonds, bake at 350u00b0 for 20 minutes or until bubbly, yields 6 to 8 servings
input_text: Ingredients: 3 tbsp butter, 4 tbsp allpurpose flour, 1 12 c hot milk, 12 tsp salt, 14 tsp pepper, dash of cayenne optional, dash of dry mustard optional, 1 c grated sharp cheese, 2 12 c cooked or canned asparagus, 12 c asparagus liquid, 1 2 oz jar diced pimento, 12 c sliced blanched almonds
target_text: Directions: in a saucepan, blend butter and flour gradually add milk and seasonings, cook until thickened, stirring constantly, remove from heat and stir in cheese, place asparagus and stock in a greased 13 x 9 x 2inch casserole dish cover with cream sauce sprinkle with pimento and almonds, bake at 350u00b0 for 20 minutes or until bubbly, yields 6 to 8 servings

ingredients: 1 white bread dough, 1 ceasar salad, 14 cup parmesan cheese, 4 tbsp pesto, 1 oil for frying, 1 tart pan, 1 flour, 1 kalamata olives in oil with cheese, 1 tbsp parsley flakes, 2 cup italian bread crumbs, 1 cup milk, 12 tsp italian seasonings, 1 bag ravioli of choice
directions: preheat oven to 350, start by lightly flouring your surface and rolling out bread dough, i used a tart pan and started working dough around pan till you get it all around the pan, bake as directed 2025 minutes, heat oil on medium low, add bread crumbs and seasoning to one bowl and milk to another, dip ravioli into and bread crumb mixture fry till golden on medlow heat set aside, now arrange your bread bowl, pesto , ceasar salad, ravioli add olives and cheese sprinkle with parmesan and lightly with parsley flakes
input_text: Ingredients: 1 white bread dough, 1 ceasar salad, 14 cup parmesan cheese, 4 tbsp pesto, 1 oil for frying, 1 tart pan, 1 flour, 1 kalamata olives in oil with cheese, 1 tbsp parsley flakes, 2 cup italian bread crumbs, 1 cup milk, 12 tsp italian seasonings, 1 bag ravioli of choice
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 350, start by lightly flouring your surface and rolling out bread dough, i used a tart pan and started working dough around pan till you get it all around the pan, bake as directed 2025 minutes, heat oil on medium low, add bread crumbs and seasoning to one bowl and milk to another, dip ravioli into and bread crumb mixture fry till golden on medlow heat set aside, now arrange your bread bowl, pesto , ceasar salad, ravioli add olives and cheese sprinkle with parmesan and lightly with parsley flakes

ingredients: 1 lb meaty mushrooms white, shiitake, or cremini, sliced thinly, 4 slices oat nut bread, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 bunch scallions, minced, 12 white onion or 1 shallot, minced, 12 teaspoon dried sage, 2 slices swiss cheese, 12 tbsp butter or 1 tbsp vegetable oil
directions: in a large saute pan heat oil or melt butter over mediumhigh heat, saute garlic until fragrant and then add onions and scallions and saute until soft, put bread into toaster, place mushrooms into saute pan and season with kosher salt and fresh ground pepper saute for 2 mins, until they begin to soften, add dried sage, once bread is a crispy brown, remove from toaster and place one slice on each of two plates, once mushrooms are cooked down and have released a lot of liquid about 8 mins, total scoop half of mixture onto each slice of bread it should look like there is too much for the bread to hold top with swiss cheese slices, then with last two slices of bread cut diagonally, and serve
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb meaty mushrooms white, shiitake, or cremini, sliced thinly, 4 slices oat nut bread, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 bunch scallions, minced, 12 white onion or 1 shallot, minced, 12 teaspoon dried sage, 2 slices swiss cheese, 12 tbsp butter or 1 tbsp vegetable oil
target_text: Directions: in a large saute pan heat oil or melt butter over mediumhigh heat, saute garlic until fragrant and then add onions and scallions and saute until soft, put bread into toaster, place mushrooms into saute pan and season with kosher salt and fresh ground pepper saute for 2 mins, until they begin to soften, add dried sage, once bread is a crispy brown, remove from toaster and place one slice on each of two plates, once mushrooms are cooked down and have released a lot of liquid about 8 mins, total scoop half of mixture onto each slice of bread it should look like there is too much for the bread to hold top with swiss cheese slices, then with last two slices of bread cut diagonally, and serve

ingredients: 1 pound picked, fresh crabmeat snow, blue, 14 pound cream cheese, softened, 1 cup sweet and sour cranberry chutney, plus some for garnish, 14 cup chopped chives, kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 1 package thin square wonton skins, defrosted, 1 egg mixed with 2 tablespoons water, grapeseed or canola oil, for cooking
directions: in a large bowl, mix the crab, cream cheese, cranberry chutney and 3 tablespoons of the chives, season with salt and pepper, lay out 4 to 6 wonton skins, lightly brush the edges with egg wash and place a small mound of the crabmeat mixture in the middle, top with second wonton skin and press firmly to seal, this is very important so the rangoons do not burst and leak, repeat until the filling is gone, heat a large saute pan coated with 14 inch of oil over medium to high heat, add as many rangoons as will fit in the pan in one layer, shallowfry until golden brown, flip and fry the other side until golden brown, transfer rangoons to a plate lined with paper towels, place a small mound of chutney on a plate, surround with 3 rangoons, garnish with the remaining chives and serve hot
input_text: Ingredients: 1 pound picked, fresh crabmeat snow, blue, 14 pound cream cheese, softened, 1 cup sweet and sour cranberry chutney, plus some for garnish, 14 cup chopped chives, kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 1 package thin square wonton skins, defrosted, 1 egg mixed with 2 tablespoons water, grapeseed or canola oil, for cooking
target_text: Directions: in a large bowl, mix the crab, cream cheese, cranberry chutney and 3 tablespoons of the chives, season with salt and pepper, lay out 4 to 6 wonton skins, lightly brush the edges with egg wash and place a small mound of the crabmeat mixture in the middle, top with second wonton skin and press firmly to seal, this is very important so the rangoons do not burst and leak, repeat until the filling is gone, heat a large saute pan coated with 14 inch of oil over medium to high heat, add as many rangoons as will fit in the pan in one layer, shallowfry until golden brown, flip and fry the other side until golden brown, transfer rangoons to a plate lined with paper towels, place a small mound of chutney on a plate, surround with 3 rangoons, garnish with the remaining chives and serve hot

ingredients: 2 tablespoons extravirgin olive oil, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 1 teaspoon flaked salt, divided, 2 large heirloom tomatoes, thinly sliced, 2 ripe peaches  halved, pitted, and sliced into half moons, 6 leaves fresh basil, 1 8 ounce ball fresh mozzarella, thinly sliced
directions: whisk olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and 1 pinch flaked salt together in a bowl until dressing is smooth, alternate tomato slices, peach slices, basil leaves, and mozzarella slices in layers on a platter drizzle dressing over salad and sprinkle remaining flaked salt on top
input_text: Ingredients: 2 tablespoons extravirgin olive oil, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 1 teaspoon flaked salt, divided, 2 large heirloom tomatoes, thinly sliced, 2 ripe peaches  halved, pitted, and sliced into half moons, 6 leaves fresh basil, 1 8 ounce ball fresh mozzarella, thinly sliced
target_text: Directions: whisk olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and 1 pinch flaked salt together in a bowl until dressing is smooth, alternate tomato slices, peach slices, basil leaves, and mozzarella slices in layers on a platter drizzle dressing over salad and sprinkle remaining flaked salt on top

ingredients: 6 cups sliced peeled pear 3 pounds, 13 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1 tablespoon allpurpose flour, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 12 teaspoon apple pie spice, cooking spray, 12 cup allpurpose flour, 12 cup wholewheat flour or allpurpose flour, 3 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons chilled stick margarine, cut into small pieces, 12 cup skim milk, 2 teaspoons margarine, melted, 1 tablespoon brown sugar
directions: preheat oven to 350u00b0, combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl toss gently to coat spoon pear mixture into an 8inch square baking dish coated with cooking spray, combine 12 cup allpurpose flour and next 4 ingredients 12 cup allpurpose flour through salt in a medium bowl, and cut in 2 tablespoons chilled margarine with a pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse meal add milk, and toss with a fork until flour mixture is moist, drop dough by heaping tablespoons onto pear mixture brush melted margarine over dough, and sprinkle with brown sugar bake at 350u00b0 for 45 minutes or until lightly browned and bubbly
input_text: Ingredients: 6 cups sliced peeled pear 3 pounds, 13 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1 tablespoon allpurpose flour, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 12 teaspoon apple pie spice, cooking spray, 12 cup allpurpose flour, 12 cup wholewheat flour or allpurpose flour, 3 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons chilled stick margarine, cut into small pieces, 12 cup skim milk, 2 teaspoons margarine, melted, 1 tablespoon brown sugar
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 350u00b0, combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl toss gently to coat spoon pear mixture into an 8inch square baking dish coated with cooking spray, combine 12 cup allpurpose flour and next 4 ingredients 12 cup allpurpose flour through salt in a medium bowl, and cut in 2 tablespoons chilled margarine with a pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse meal add milk, and toss with a fork until flour mixture is moist, drop dough by heaping tablespoons onto pear mixture brush melted margarine over dough, and sprinkle with brown sugar bake at 350u00b0 for 45 minutes or until lightly browned and bubbly

ingredients: 2 cans eagle brand milk, 1 c sugar, 1 c fruit bananas, mashed, 1 tbsp flavoring your choice, 12 gal milk
directions: combine ingredients, fill churn container finish filling with milk, churn

ingredients: 12 c all purpose flour, 2 tbsp cornstarch, 34 tsp baking pwdr, 12 c water, 2 x golden brown delicious apples or possibly, 2 x bananas salad oil, 23 c granulated sugar, 13 c hot water, 1 tbsp salad oil, 2 tsp sesame seeds
directions: in a bowl, mix flour, cornstarch, and baking pwdr, add in water and stir till smooth, peel and core apples cut each apple into 3 wedges, if you use bananas, peel and cut in 12 inch thick diagonal slices, place fruit in batter and turn to coat proportionately, into a deep pan pour oil to a depth of about 1 12 inches, heat oil to 350 degrees, using chopsticks or possibly a spoon, lift one piece of fruit at a time from batter and let excess batter drip off, then lower fruit into warm oil, cook several pcs at a time till coating is golden about 2 min, remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels, generously oil a flat serving dish, fill a serving bowl to the brim with ice cubes cover with water, place sugar, water and oil in a ten inch frying pan stir to blend, place pan over high heat, when mix begins to bubble about one minute, shake pan continuously to prevent burning, continue cooking and shaking pan till syrupjust turns a pale straw color about 9 min, immediately remove from heat, add in sesame seeds, and swirl to mix, syrup will continue to cook after you remove it from heat and color will turn golden brown in a few seconds, drop fruit into syrup and swirl to coat proportionately, using two spoons, immediately remove each piece of fruit and place on oiled dish so pcs dont touch, at table, dip each piece of fruit in ice water so coating hardens and fruit cools, serve
input_text: Ingredients: 12 c all purpose flour, 2 tbsp cornstarch, 34 tsp baking pwdr, 12 c water, 2 x golden brown delicious apples or possibly, 2 x bananas salad oil, 23 c granulated sugar, 13 c hot water, 1 tbsp salad oil, 2 tsp sesame seeds
target_text: Directions: in a bowl, mix flour, cornstarch, and baking pwdr, add in water and stir till smooth, peel and core apples cut each apple into 3 wedges, if you use bananas, peel and cut in 12 inch thick diagonal slices, place fruit in batter and turn to coat proportionately, into a deep pan pour oil to a depth of about 1 12 inches, heat oil to 350 degrees, using chopsticks or possibly a spoon, lift one piece of fruit at a time from batter and let excess batter drip off, then lower fruit into warm oil, cook several pcs at a time till coating is golden about 2 min, remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels, generously oil a flat serving dish, fill a serving bowl to the brim with ice cubes cover with water, place sugar, water and oil in a ten inch frying pan stir to blend, place pan over high heat, when mix begins to bubble about one minute, shake pan continuously to prevent burning, continue cooking and shaking pan till syrupjust turns a pale straw color about 9 min, immediately remove from heat, add in sesame seeds, and swirl to mix, syrup will continue to cook after you remove it from heat and color will turn golden brown in a few seconds, drop fruit into syrup and swirl to coat proportionately, using two spoons, immediately remove each piece of fruit and place on oiled dish so pcs dont touch, at table, dip each piece of fruit in ice water so coating hardens and fruit cools, serve

ingredients: 1 lb sausage, 1 tsp mustard, 6 slices bread, 6 slices cheese swiss or cheddar, 1 14 c evaporated milk, 3 eggs, 14 tsp salt, 14 tsp pepper, 1 tsp worcestershire sauce
directions: saute sausage, trim crusts from bread, arrange in greased 9 x 13inch pan, set aside, combine milk, eggs, salt, pepper and worcestershire, beat well, drain sausage, mix with mustard spread over bread slices, add cheese pour egg mixture over bread, sausage and cheese, refrigerate overnight, bake at 350u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes, uncovered, serves 6 to 8
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb sausage, 1 tsp mustard, 6 slices bread, 6 slices cheese swiss or cheddar, 1 14 c evaporated milk, 3 eggs, 14 tsp salt, 14 tsp pepper, 1 tsp worcestershire sauce
target_text: Directions: saute sausage, trim crusts from bread, arrange in greased 9 x 13inch pan, set aside, combine milk, eggs, salt, pepper and worcestershire, beat well, drain sausage, mix with mustard spread over bread slices, add cheese pour egg mixture over bread, sausage and cheese, refrigerate overnight, bake at 350u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes, uncovered, serves 6 to 8

ingredients: 2 12 cups dry green lentils, 4 white potatoes, peeled and chopped, 3 large carrots, peeled and chopped, 1 cup white onion, chopped, 1 whole fennel, chopped, 2 garlic cloves, finely chopped, 1 12 cups rutabagas, chopped, 2 cups butternut squash, chopped, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 12 teaspoons cumin, salt and pepper, 1 tablespoon olive oil
directions: saute white onion and garlic in olive oil until translucent, make sure to stir frequently to prevent stickiness and the garlic from burning, add carrots and saute a few minutes longer, add salt, pepper, cumin ad paprika, and stir well, add all other vegetables and lentils and mix well, then add 7 cups of water, let it come to a boil, then reduce to simmer for 45 minutes, add water if necessary, serve warm
input_text: Ingredients: 2 12 cups dry green lentils, 4 white potatoes, peeled and chopped, 3 large carrots, peeled and chopped, 1 cup white onion, chopped, 1 whole fennel, chopped, 2 garlic cloves, finely chopped, 1 12 cups rutabagas, chopped, 2 cups butternut squash, chopped, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 12 teaspoons cumin, salt and pepper, 1 tablespoon olive oil
target_text: Directions: saute white onion and garlic in olive oil until translucent, make sure to stir frequently to prevent stickiness and the garlic from burning, add carrots and saute a few minutes longer, add salt, pepper, cumin ad paprika, and stir well, add all other vegetables and lentils and mix well, then add 7 cups of water, let it come to a boil, then reduce to simmer for 45 minutes, add water if necessary, serve warm

ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1 jar large spaghetti sauce, 1 box lasagna noodles, 32 oz cottage cheese, 16 oz mozzarella cheese, shredded
directions: brown ground beef, drain, mix in spaghetti sauce, layer lasagna noodles uncooked on bottom of 13 x 9inch pan, spread 12 ground beef mixture on noodles, spread 12 cottage cheese on ground beef, spread 12 mozzarella cheese on cottage cheese repeat, cover with foil, bake at 325u00b0 for 45 minutes, uncover and bake 10 minutes more

ingredients: 1 15ounce can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed, 1 head roasted garlic, 2 tablespoons olive oil, the leaves of 1 stem of fresh rosemary, the leaves of 3 stems of fresh thyme
directions: add all the ingredients to a food processor and puree until smooth, note to roast garlic, slice off the top quarter of the garlic, wrap in foil, and bake at 350 degrees f for 1 hour then, squeeze out all the flesh
input_text: Ingredients: 1 15ounce can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed, 1 head roasted garlic, 2 tablespoons olive oil, the leaves of 1 stem of fresh rosemary, the leaves of 3 stems of fresh thyme

ingredients: 1 pound sashimigrade headon shrimp or 12 medium shrimp, shells and heads removed and reserved for another use see note, sea or kosher salt, 2 serrano chilies, stemmed and cut into 14inch pieces, 2 tablespoons water, 4 tablespoons fresh juice from 4 limes, freshly ground black pepper, 14 cup thinly sliced red onion, 2 tablespoons diced seeded cucumber, tostadas and sliced avocado, for serving
directions: split shrimp in half lengthwise and discard any veins transfer to a plate, sprinkle all over with salt, cover with plastic, and refrigerate at least 1 hour and up to 2 hours, meanwhile, in a mortar and pestle, combine chilies with a pinch of salt and pulverize thoroughly, then add water and continue to work until chilies are reduced to tiny bits alternatively, blend chilies with water in a blender or with an immersion blender until thoroughly blended add lime juice and season with salt and pepper, in a mixing bowl, toss shrimp with chililime marinade, onion, and cucumber season once more with salt and pepper and serve right away with tostadas and avocado

target_text: Directions: split shrimp in half lengthwise and discard any veins transfer to a plate, sprinkle all over with salt, cover with plastic, and refrigerate at least 1 hour and up to 2 hours, meanwhile, in a mortar and pestle, combine chilies with a pinch of salt and pulverize thoroughly, then add water and continue to work until chilies are reduced to tiny bits alternatively, blend chilies with water in a blender or with an immersion blender until thoroughly blended add lime juice and season with salt and pepper, in a mixing bowl, toss shrimp with chililime marinade, onion, and cucumber season once more with salt and pepper and serve right away with tostadas and avocado

directions: combine first 4 ingredients, mix well with mayonnaise, stuff each hot dog bun with half of the mixture, wrap each hobo in foil, heat in a 400u00b0 oven for 20 minutes

directions: brown ground beef in 10inch skillet drain, return to pan add tomato sauce and paste, onions and peppers to meat, stir occasionally and cook 10 minutes, season to taste

ingredients: 1 15 12 oz can pineapple and juice, 3 bananas, mashed, 2 6 oz pkg strawberry gelatin, 1 8 oz pkg cream cheese, softened, 8 oz sour cream
directions: drain juice from pineapple, mix mashed bananas in juice let stand at least 5 minutes, dissolve gelatin in hot water, when gelatin is cool, add strawberries, pineapple and banana mixture blend well, spread 12 in a 13 x 9inch pan, chill, whip together cream cheese and sour cream spread over chilled mixture top with remaining gelatinfruit mixture, chill, serves 12 to 15
input_text: Ingredients: 1 15 12 oz can pineapple and juice, 3 bananas, mashed, 2 6 oz pkg strawberry gelatin, 1 8 oz pkg cream cheese, softened, 8 oz sour cream
target_text: Directions: drain juice from pineapple, mix mashed bananas in juice let stand at least 5 minutes, dissolve gelatin in hot water, when gelatin is cool, add strawberries, pineapple and banana mixture blend well, spread 12 in a 13 x 9inch pan, chill, whip together cream cheese and sour cream spread over chilled mixture top with remaining gelatinfruit mixture, chill, serves 12 to 15

ingredients: for the shortcakes, 1 pint strawberries, 114 cup sugar, divided, 112 cup flour, 112 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoons salt, 3 whole eggs, 1 cup butter, softened, 14 cups milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, , for the frosting, 8 ounces, weight cream cheese, 1 stick butter, 2 cups powdered sugar, 12 whole strawberries for garnish
directions: start by slicing one pint of the strawberries and covering with 14 cup sugar leave them in a bowl in the fridge for an hour or two and then mash with a potato masher or a fork let them sit in the fridge for another hour or up to overnight, when the strawberries are ready, make the batter stir all the dry ingredients together including the remaining 1 cup sugar and then add all the wet ingredients mix on low speed just to combine, then mix on medium speed for about 4 minutes, until the batter is very light and fluffy stir down the sides of the bowl once while mixing, scoop some batter into muffin tins lined with muffin cups fill cups about 14 to 13 full use the back of a spoon to make little well in the batter and spoon on about a teaspoons worth of strawberries and syrup dont worry when it overruns the well, its all good top with a bit more batter you could also leave the strawberries sitting on top of the batter if you prefer, bake in a 350degree oven for about 3035 minutes, or until tops are golden brown and a toothpick comes out clean, cool the cupcakes completely in their muffin tins, to make the frosting, let the cream cheese come to room temperature and the butter soften blend well in your mixer add the powdered sugar and mix on high until light and fluffy frost the cupcakes, then garnish with strawberries cut in half leave the tops on so they look pretty
input_text: Ingredients: for the shortcakes, 1 pint strawberries, 114 cup sugar, divided, 112 cup flour, 112 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoons salt, 3 whole eggs, 1 cup butter, softened, 14 cups milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, , for the frosting, 8 ounces, weight cream cheese, 1 stick butter, 2 cups powdered sugar, 12 whole strawberries for garnish
target_text: Directions: start by slicing one pint of the strawberries and covering with 14 cup sugar leave them in a bowl in the fridge for an hour or two and then mash with a potato masher or a fork let them sit in the fridge for another hour or up to overnight, when the strawberries are ready, make the batter stir all the dry ingredients together including the remaining 1 cup sugar and then add all the wet ingredients mix on low speed just to combine, then mix on medium speed for about 4 minutes, until the batter is very light and fluffy stir down the sides of the bowl once while mixing, scoop some batter into muffin tins lined with muffin cups fill cups about 14 to 13 full use the back of a spoon to make little well in the batter and spoon on about a teaspoons worth of strawberries and syrup dont worry when it overruns the well, its all good top with a bit more batter you could also leave the strawberries sitting on top of the batter if you prefer, bake in a 350degree oven for about 3035 minutes, or until tops are golden brown and a toothpick comes out clean, cool the cupcakes completely in their muffin tins, to make the frosting, let the cream cheese come to room temperature and the butter soften blend well in your mixer add the powdered sugar and mix on high until light and fluffy frost the cupcakes, then garnish with strawberries cut in half leave the tops on so they look pretty

ingredients: 1 mentaiko sac of, 2 tablespoons kimchi, 2 udon bricks of frozen, 2 tablespoons butter, sliced green onions, nori
directions: melt the butter over low heat set aside to cool to room temperature, remove the roe from the sac cut the sac open with a knife and use a spoon to scrape the eggs out, put a pot of water big enough for your two bricks of udon to boil on high heat, cook the udon according to the cooking directions on the package, mix the mentaiko and butter together, drain your udon and while it is hot, toss it with the mentaiko butter combination once the udon is coated, add the kimchi and toss well, sprinkle with sliced green onions and nori

ingredients: 1 cup steel cut oats, 12 cup dried cranberries, 12 cup raisins, 3 cups hot water not boiling, 1 12 cups milk whole milk works best, 14 cup packed brown sugar optional, 1 tablespoon cinnamon optional
directions: spray inside of crock pot with nonstick spray i use canola, add all ingredients to crock pot may add raisins andor cranberries in the morning  depending on texture preference, turn to low setting, cook for 89 hours turn on last thing before bedtime

ingredients: 13 c chopped onion, 14 c chopped green pepper, 14 c margarine, 12 c chopped spam, 2 medium potatoes, cooked and cubed, 34 tsp salt, 6 eggs, beaten, 2 tbsp water, 18 tsp pepper
directions: in large pan, cook onion and green pepper in margarine, add spam, potatoes and 14 teaspoon salt, cook for 10 minutes, stirring often, add eggs, water, 12 teaspoon salt and pepper pour over spam mixture, cook over low heat until set, can be used as a breakfast, a dinner or for supper

ingredients: 1 4 lb boneless chuck roast, 1 12 teaspoons chopped fresh marjoram or 12 teaspoon dried marjoram, 1 teaspoon fresh basil or 14 teaspoon dried basil leaves, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 12 cup apple cider, 12 cup water, 6 7 carrots, sliced, 2 medium turnips, cubed, 3 cups rutabagas, cubed can just add 3 more turnips, 1 medium onion, cubed, 4 stalks celery, 1 green bell pepper, cut in 1 inch pieces, 2 tablespoons parsley, kitchen bouquet browning sauce or another browning and seasoning sauce, 1 box couscous
directions: trim excess fat if necessary rub kitchen bouquet all over the meat, put in large pot or dutch oven, sprinkle with marjoram, basil, salt, pepper, and garlic add cider and water, heat to boiling reduce heat, cover and simmer 1 12 hours or until fork tender, add vegetables, parsley and, if necessary, 14 cup liquid equal parts ciderwater, cover and simmer about 45 minutes or until vegetables are tender and beef is just about ready to fall apart, make the couscous according to the directions on the box, remove the roast and add the couscous to the veggies, mix and let sit a few minutes

ingredients: 1 lb ground chuck, 6 oz tomato paste, 1 can corn, sliced carrots optional, small pkg elbow macaroni, 8 oz tomato sauce, 1 pkg lipton soup mix
directions: brown ground chuck drain fat, add tomato paste, sauce and 2 8 ounce cans water, stir add macaroni, carrots and onion soup mix simmer, covered, for 15 minutes, add corn and cook until desired consistency

ingredients: 1 cup sugar or 1 cup sucanat, 1 cup canola oil, 12 cup cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce, 12 cup organic catsup doesnt have high fructose, 4 teaspoons onions, grated or 4 teaspoons dry onion flakes, 1 teaspoon garlic, minced, 12 teaspoon real salt
directions: mix all ingredients in blender until smooth makes about 4 cups

ingredients: 8 to 10 c fresh melon cubes, 1 to 2 tbsp white corn syrup, 1 pt fresh strawberries, 2 c fresh pineapple chunks, fresh mint leaves optional
directions: in a large bowl, combine melon cubes and corn syrup, cover and refrigerate overnight, just before serving, stir in remaining fruit, garnish with fresh mint leaves if desired, yields 3 to 4 quarts

ingredients: 2 12 cups flour, 1 12 cups sugar, 1 cup butter, softened, 1 egg, 12 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon almond extract, red food coloring, 14 cup cocoa, 12 cup chopped walnuts
directions: in an electric mixer add flour, sugar, butter, egg, baking powder, vanilla, salt, beat 3 minutes, line bottom of loaf pan with waxed paper, divide in 3 equal parts and mix in part 1 almond extract and 5 drops red food coloring part 2 cocoa part 3 chopped walnuts, preheat oven to 350 degrees, spread each part in loaf pan one on top of the other, pink, white, and chocolate, cover pan and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, remove from pan and cut lengthwise in half then crosswise then cut 15 cookies from each piece, bake for 8 to 10 minutes, the recipes for this program, which were provided by contributors and guests who may not be professional chefs, have not been tested in the food networks kitchens, therefore, the food network cannot attest to the accuracy of any of the recipes

ingredients: 1 lb italian sausage, casing removed, cooked and crumbled, 12 lb ziti pasta, cooked and drained, 1 15 oz carton ricotta cheese, 1 jar ragu spaghetti sauce, 12 c grated parmesan cheese, 2 tsp italian seasoning, 3 c grated mozzarella cheese
directions: combine ricotta, parmesan and 1 cup mozzarella, stir in sausage and ziti, spoon 12 of mixture into a greased 2quart casserole, pour 12 jar ragu over this, sprinkle 1 teaspoon italian seasoning over sauce sprinkle 1 cup mozzarella over all repeat layers, ending with mozzarella cheese, cover with aluminum foil, bake for about 45 minutes to 1 hour at 350u00b0, or until mixture is completely heated through

ingredients: 1 c sugar, 1 stick butter, 4 eggs, 1 12 c flour, 1 tsp baking powder, 1 tsp vanilla, fresh or canned peaches
directions: beat sugar, butter and eggs, beat in flour, baking powder and vanilla, pour into pan and place fruit on batter, bake at 350u00b0 for 50 minutes

ingredients: 1 pints cherry tomatoes  washed and halved, 4 oz baby portabello mushrooms  wiped clean and quartered, 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, 2 tbsp balsamic vinegar, 34 tsp dried rosemary, 12 tsp dried oregano, 12 tsp dried basil, 1 salt and pepper to taste
directions: preheat oven to 400f, line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and set aside, rinse cherry tomatoes under cold, running water, cut each in half from stem to butt and place in a large bowl, wipe mushrooms clean with a slightly dampened, clean dish towel, cut each mushroom in half lengthwise, then cut each half in half lengthwise again, place in bowl with tomatoes, in a small bowl whisk together all your other ingredients, pour over your tomatoes and mushrooms, toss gently to coat, pour out onto baking sheet and spread out into an even, single layer, place in oven and bake 1520 minutes or until tomatoes are looking wilty mushrooms are soft
input_text: Ingredients: 1 pints cherry tomatoes  washed and halved, 4 oz baby portabello mushrooms  wiped clean and quartered, 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, 2 tbsp balsamic vinegar, 34 tsp dried rosemary, 12 tsp dried oregano, 12 tsp dried basil, 1 salt and pepper to taste
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 400f, line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and set aside, rinse cherry tomatoes under cold, running water, cut each in half from stem to butt and place in a large bowl, wipe mushrooms clean with a slightly dampened, clean dish towel, cut each mushroom in half lengthwise, then cut each half in half lengthwise again, place in bowl with tomatoes, in a small bowl whisk together all your other ingredients, pour over your tomatoes and mushrooms, toss gently to coat, pour out onto baking sheet and spread out into an even, single layer, place in oven and bake 1520 minutes or until tomatoes are looking wilty mushrooms are soft

ingredients: 3 whole large ripe peaches, 14 ounces, fluid greek yogurt, 14 cups honey i like tupelo, 12 cups sugar less if your peaches are supersweet, 14 cups ice wine, late harvest wine or lillet blanc
directions: put all ingredients in the blender take the pits out of the peaches first, duh blend until smooth, press the mixture through a fine mesh sieve to get all the peach skin bits out or dont, if you dont care, freeze in your ice cream maker according to the manufacturers instructions, scoop into some tupperware and freeze for 3 to 4 hours before eating

ingredients: 2 cups chopped onions about 1 large, 1 lb chuck steak, trimmed and cut into 12inch cubes, 1 12 cups chopped peeled carrots about 4, 1 cup chopped celery about 4 stalks, 5 garlic cloves, minced, 1 cup uncooked pearl barley, 5 cups fatfree lesssodium beef broth, 2 cups water, 12 cup nosaltadded tomato puree, 12 teaspoon kosher salt, 14 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper, 2 bay leaves
directions: heat a large dutch oven over medium heat coat pan with cooking spray add chopped onion and beef to pan cook 10 minutes or until onion is tender and beef is browned, stirring occasionally add chopped carrot and chopped celery to pan cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally stir in garlic cook 30 seconds stir in barley and remaining ingredients, and bring to a boil cover, reduce heat, and simmer 40 minutes or until the barley is done and vegetables are tender discard bay leaves
input_text: Ingredients: 2 cups chopped onions about 1 large, 1 lb chuck steak, trimmed and cut into 12inch cubes, 1 12 cups chopped peeled carrots about 4, 1 cup chopped celery about 4 stalks, 5 garlic cloves, minced, 1 cup uncooked pearl barley, 5 cups fatfree lesssodium beef broth, 2 cups water, 12 cup nosaltadded tomato puree, 12 teaspoon kosher salt, 14 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper, 2 bay leaves
target_text: Directions: heat a large dutch oven over medium heat coat pan with cooking spray add chopped onion and beef to pan cook 10 minutes or until onion is tender and beef is browned, stirring occasionally add chopped carrot and chopped celery to pan cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally stir in garlic cook 30 seconds stir in barley and remaining ingredients, and bring to a boil cover, reduce heat, and simmer 40 minutes or until the barley is done and vegetables are tender discard bay leaves

ingredients: 3 c domino granulated sugar, 1 can carnation milk, 1 stick butter, 3 tbsp peanut butter, walnuts optional
directions: mix the first 3 ingredients in a saucepan on medium heat, stirring constantly until it starts to boil, cook until it forms a soft ball in cold water, set the pan in cold water, stir in the peanut butter until well mixed, add the walnuts, pour mixture into a greased 13 x 9 x 2inch pan, let stand until cool, then cut

ingredients: 2 c selfrising flour, 2 tbsp sugar, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 14 c milk maybe more, 4 tbsp melted meat drippings last thing
directions: stir together until mixed, do not overbeat, pour onto slightly greased, mediumhot surface and pass the butter and maple syrup, yummy

ingredients: 1 cup garbanzo beans prepared, 1 red bell pepper, medium diced, 1 orange bell pepper, diced, 1 large english cucumber, sliced and quartered, 11 ounces grape tomatoes, sliced in half, 12 cup red onion, diced, 5 ounces feta cheese, 12 cup sliced kalamata olive, 14 cup fresh basil, minced, 12 cup extravirgin olive oil, 14 cup white balsamic vinegar, 2 tablespoons fresh squeezed lemon juice, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped, 12 teaspoon dijon mustard, 14 teaspoon pink himalayan sea salt, 18 teaspoon pepper
directions: soak garbanzo beans in cool water overnight, rinse beans  discard water place 2 cups of water in a large pot, bring to a boil and add the chickpeas, reduce heat to a slow boil for 4045 min, making sure they are always covered with water, rinse beans under cold water until cool, spread on a baking sheet and remove skins, combine chickpeas, peppers, cucumber, tomatoes, onion, cheese, olives and basil in medium bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients olive oil, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, garlic, parsley, mustard, salt and pepper, pour dressing over salad, stir and serve

ingredients: 1 14 c graham cracker crumbs, 14 c sugar, 13 c melted margarine, 2 8 oz pkg cream cheese, softened, 1 14 oz can eagle brand milk, 3 eggs, 14 c lemon juice, 1 8 oz carton sour cream

ingredients: 5 c diced rhubarb, 4 c sugar, 1 large can crushed pineapple, 6 oz strawberry jello
directions: mix rhubarb, pineapple and sugar together and let stand for 10 minutes mix and start cooking, bringing to a boil boil 10 minutes, stirring all the time remove from heat add the jello, mixing well seal in glass jars makes 3 12 pints

ingredients: 1 6 oz pkg raspberry jello save 12, 1 no 2 can crushed pineapple, drained save juice, 1 c boiling water or 34 c water and 14 c pineapple juice, 1 c port wine, 1 c chopped walnuts, 12 c celery, 3 oz cream cheese, 1 c sour cream, grapes
directions: mix 12 jello, pineapple, water and port wine, chill until firm, mix walnuts, celery, cream cheese and sour cream, spread on jello that is already firm, add remaining jello on top of last layer, chill and garnish with grapes

ingredients: 4 chicken breasts, 2 cans campbells cream of chicken soup, 2 boxes stovetop stuffing mix, 1 16 oz pkg of four cheeses, salt and pepper to taste
directions: cook chicken breasts cut into chunks, prepare stuffing mix as directed on box, place chicken in greased 9 x 13 inch baking pan, mix one can of soup with chicken, salt and pepper to taste spread stuffing over chicken mixture, spread another can of soup over stuffing, sprinkle cheese over soup, bake at 350u00b0 for 30  45 minutes

ingredients: 4 c milk, 1 beaten egg, 1 4 oz pkg vanilla pudding not instant, 1 c minute rice, 14 c raisins, 14 tsp cinnamon, 18 tsp nutmeg
directions: mix together in large saucepan milk, egg and pudding mix add rice and stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil add raisins and stir in, spices can be stirred in or sprinkled on top of serving, serve warm or cold

ingredients: 2 c milk, 4 eggs, beaten, 1 tbsp vanilla, 1 c raisins optional, 4 c biscuit crumbs, 2 tbsp butter, nutmeg to taste
directions: mix milk, eggs and vanilla together in a saucepan, place over heat until hot, but do not boil, line baking dish with biscuit crumbs mixed with melted butter, pour mixture over biscuit crumbs, sprinkle with nutmeg, place baking dish on a pan of hot water in a 350u00b0 oven, bake for 45 minutes

ingredients: 2 tablespoons semisweet chocolate chips, melted, 14 cup fatfree ricotta cheese, 1 teaspoon pure maple syrup, 18 teaspoon pure vanilla extract
directions: chocolate chips can be melted in the microwave, over a double boiler, or over very, very low heat in a small skillet, combine all ingredients in a blender process until smooth, chill until firm, about 2 hours

ingredients: 10 large strawberries, 10 vanilla cookies i used my vanilla butter cookie pops recipe from my profile, 200 grams cream cheese see my profile for the dairyfree recipe, sorry its not nut free though, 2 tsp icingpowdered sugar, sieved, 1 tsp vanilla extract
directions: combine the cream cheese with the icing sugar and vanilla and blend smooth, top each cookie with some of the mixture, cut the green off each strawberry so you have a wide flat end and place one on top of each cookie, put the rest of the cream cheese into a piping bag and pipe a pompom onto the top of each hat

ingredients: 1 large strawberry jello, 2 c hot water, 1 pt thawed strawberries, 1 c cold water
directions: pour half of the mixture in a glass dish, sink one sliced banana in it and chill until set, spread with a pint of sour cream, pour remaining half of mixture over sour cream, sink another sliced banana over this and chill until ready to serve
input_text: Ingredients: 1 large strawberry jello, 2 c hot water, 1 pt thawed strawberries, 1 c cold water

ingredients: 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 12 red bell pepper, cored, seeded and thinly sliced, 2 pounds broccoli florets, cut into bitesize pieces about 12 cups, 1 cup lowsodium chicken broth, salt and pepper
directions: spread sesame seeds in a small skillet over mediumhigh heat and cook, stirring constantly, until lightly toasted and beginning to release oil, about 1 minute remove to a plate to cool, warm vegetable oil with sesame oil in a large skillet over mediumhigh heat add garlic and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute stir in bell pepper add broccoli and stir well until coated in oil cook, stirring, until broccoli is slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes, pour in broth bring to a simmer reduce heat to low, cover and cook, stirring once or twice, until broccoli is tender, about 5 minutes sprinkle with sesame seeds season with salt and pepper serve warm
input_text: Ingredients: 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 12 red bell pepper, cored, seeded and thinly sliced, 2 pounds broccoli florets, cut into bitesize pieces about 12 cups, 1 cup lowsodium chicken broth, salt and pepper
target_text: Directions: spread sesame seeds in a small skillet over mediumhigh heat and cook, stirring constantly, until lightly toasted and beginning to release oil, about 1 minute remove to a plate to cool, warm vegetable oil with sesame oil in a large skillet over mediumhigh heat add garlic and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute stir in bell pepper add broccoli and stir well until coated in oil cook, stirring, until broccoli is slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes, pour in broth bring to a simmer reduce heat to low, cover and cook, stirring once or twice, until broccoli is tender, about 5 minutes sprinkle with sesame seeds season with salt and pepper serve warm

ingredients: 3 c allpurpose flour, 1 12 tsp salt, 23 c plus 2 tbsp corn oil, 13 c water
directions: mix all together and roll between wax paper, makes two double crust pies
input_text: Ingredients: 3 c allpurpose flour, 1 12 tsp salt, 23 c plus 2 tbsp corn oil, 13 c water
target_text: Directions: mix all together and roll between wax paper, makes two double crust pies

ingredients: 12 cup butter, margarine, softened, 1 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups allpurpose flour, 12 cup hersheys cocoa, 1 tsp baking powder, 12 tsp baking soda, 12 tsp salt, 1 cup powdered sugar, 2 tbsp butter, margarine, shortening, 2 tbsp milk, 12 tsp vanilla extract, 2 drops red food color optional
directions: 1, in large bowl, beat butter, sugar and eggs on medium speed of electri cmixer until light and fluffy, stir together flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and salt add to butter mixture beating until well blended, cover refrigerate dough about 1 hour or until firm enough to handle, 2, heat oven to 350f, on lightly floured surface, roll dough to 18inch thickness cut with heartshaped cookie cutter, place on ungreased cookie sheet, 3, bake 5 to 7 minutes or until no imprint remains when touched lightly in center, cool 1 minute remove from cookie sheet to wire rack, cool completely, frost with valentine frosting decorate as desired, valentine frosting in bowl, beat powdered sugar, shortening, milk, vanilla and food color, if desired, until smooth and of spreading consistency, makes 34 cup frosting
input_text: Ingredients: 12 cup butter, margarine, softened, 1 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups allpurpose flour, 12 cup hersheys cocoa, 1 tsp baking powder, 12 tsp baking soda, 12 tsp salt, 1 cup powdered sugar, 2 tbsp butter, margarine, shortening, 2 tbsp milk, 12 tsp vanilla extract, 2 drops red food color optional
target_text: Directions: 1, in large bowl, beat butter, sugar and eggs on medium speed of electri cmixer until light and fluffy, stir together flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and salt add to butter mixture beating until well blended, cover refrigerate dough about 1 hour or until firm enough to handle, 2, heat oven to 350f, on lightly floured surface, roll dough to 18inch thickness cut with heartshaped cookie cutter, place on ungreased cookie sheet, 3, bake 5 to 7 minutes or until no imprint remains when touched lightly in center, cool 1 minute remove from cookie sheet to wire rack, cool completely, frost with valentine frosting decorate as desired, valentine frosting in bowl, beat powdered sugar, shortening, milk, vanilla and food color, if desired, until smooth and of spreading consistency, makes 34 cup frosting

ingredients: 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 pkg onion soup mix, 2 lb stew meat, dont brown, 34 c white sherry wine
directions: mix all ingredients together, bake in deep casserole dish for 3 hours, in 300u00b0 oven, serve over rice or noodles
input_text: Ingredients: 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 pkg onion soup mix, 2 lb stew meat, dont brown, 34 c white sherry wine
target_text: Directions: mix all ingredients together, bake in deep casserole dish for 3 hours, in 300u00b0 oven, serve over rice or noodles

ingredients: 1 8 ounce package cream cheese, softened, 8 ounces grated parmesan cheese, 3 tablespoons chopped jalapeno peppers, 2 large egg yolks, 2 cups dry breadcrumbs
directions: preheat oven to 350u00b0f, combine the cream cheese, parmesan, jalapeno peppers and egg yolks in a bowl and mix to form a paste, shape a 12 tablespoonful at a time into 14inch rounds and roll in the bread crumbs, place on an ungreased baking sheet and bake for 1015 minutes or until golden brown, serve warm
input_text: Ingredients: 1 8 ounce package cream cheese, softened, 8 ounces grated parmesan cheese, 3 tablespoons chopped jalapeno peppers, 2 large egg yolks, 2 cups dry breadcrumbs
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 350u00b0f, combine the cream cheese, parmesan, jalapeno peppers and egg yolks in a bowl and mix to form a paste, shape a 12 tablespoonful at a time into 14inch rounds and roll in the bread crumbs, place on an ungreased baking sheet and bake for 1015 minutes or until golden brown, serve warm

ingredients: 3 13 cups allpurpose flour, 2 teaspoons coarse salt, 1 pound 4 sticks unsalted butter, room temperature, 2 cups sugar, 3 tablespoons finely grated lemon zest from 3 lemons, 3 tablespoons finely grated orange zest from 2 oranges, 3 tablespoons finely grated lime zest, plus more for garnish from about 3 limes, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, 9 large eggs, room temperature, citrus glaze made with lime juice and zest page 315
directions: preheat oven to 325f, line standard muffin tins with paper liners, whisk together flour and salt, with an electric mixer on mediumhigh speed, cream butter and sugar until pale and fluffy, scraping down sides of bowl every few minutes, add citrus zests, reduce speed to medium, and add vanilla, add eggs, three at a time, beating until incorporated, scraping down sides of bowl as needed, reduce speed to low, add flour mixture in four batches, beating until completely incorporated after each, divide batter evenly among lined cups, filling each threequarters full tap pans on countertop once to distribute batter, bake, rotating tins halfway through, until a cake tester inserted in centers comes out clean, about 20 minutes, transfer tins to wire racks to cool 10 minutes turn out cupcakes onto racks and let cool completely, cupcakes can be stored up to 2 days at room temperature, or frozen up to 2 months, in airtight containers, to finish, dip tops of cupcakes in glaze, then turn over quickly and garnish with zest, cupcakes are best eaten the day they are glazed keep at room temperature until ready to serve
input_text: Ingredients: 3 13 cups allpurpose flour, 2 teaspoons coarse salt, 1 pound 4 sticks unsalted butter, room temperature, 2 cups sugar, 3 tablespoons finely grated lemon zest from 3 lemons, 3 tablespoons finely grated orange zest from 2 oranges, 3 tablespoons finely grated lime zest, plus more for garnish from about 3 limes, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, 9 large eggs, room temperature, citrus glaze made with lime juice and zest page 315
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 325f, line standard muffin tins with paper liners, whisk together flour and salt, with an electric mixer on mediumhigh speed, cream butter and sugar until pale and fluffy, scraping down sides of bowl every few minutes, add citrus zests, reduce speed to medium, and add vanilla, add eggs, three at a time, beating until incorporated, scraping down sides of bowl as needed, reduce speed to low, add flour mixture in four batches, beating until completely incorporated after each, divide batter evenly among lined cups, filling each threequarters full tap pans on countertop once to distribute batter, bake, rotating tins halfway through, until a cake tester inserted in centers comes out clean, about 20 minutes, transfer tins to wire racks to cool 10 minutes turn out cupcakes onto racks and let cool completely, cupcakes can be stored up to 2 days at room temperature, or frozen up to 2 months, in airtight containers, to finish, dip tops of cupcakes in glaze, then turn over quickly and garnish with zest, cupcakes are best eaten the day they are glazed keep at room temperature until ready to serve

ingredients: 1 lb butter, 12 cup parsley, chopped, 1 tablespoon garlic, crushed, 3 tablespoons shallots, chopped, 12 canned anchovy fillets, 1 tablespoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon quatreepices, 100 canned snails, 12 cup white wine optional, 2 cups white breadcrumbs fresh
directions: preparation time 25 minutes, cooking time 8 minutes, make snail butter by working the butter with a mixture of chopped parsley, garlic, shallots and anchovy fillets, season with the salt, pepper and spice, then work through a fine sieve, place a piece of butter the size of a bean inside each snail shell, add the snail, then close up the shell with some more butter, pressing it down firmly, arrange the snails on a dish and moisten with the wine if liked, sprinkle with the breadcrumbs and bake in a hot oven for 8 minutes, dry white wines maconvire, bourgognealigote, rully, pouillyfuisse
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb butter, 12 cup parsley, chopped, 1 tablespoon garlic, crushed, 3 tablespoons shallots, chopped, 12 canned anchovy fillets, 1 tablespoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon quatreepices, 100 canned snails, 12 cup white wine optional, 2 cups white breadcrumbs fresh
target_text: Directions: preparation time 25 minutes, cooking time 8 minutes, make snail butter by working the butter with a mixture of chopped parsley, garlic, shallots and anchovy fillets, season with the salt, pepper and spice, then work through a fine sieve, place a piece of butter the size of a bean inside each snail shell, add the snail, then close up the shell with some more butter, pressing it down firmly, arrange the snails on a dish and moisten with the wine if liked, sprinkle with the breadcrumbs and bake in a hot oven for 8 minutes, dry white wines maconvire, bourgognealigote, rully, pouillyfuisse

ingredients: 112 cups graham cracker crumbs about 24 squares, 12 cup chopped salted peanuts, 14 cup butter, melted, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 package 8 ounces cream cheese, softened, 12 cup peanut butter, 12 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 carton 16 ounces frozen whipped topping, thawed, 3 to 4 tablespoons chocolate syrup
directions: in a large bowl, combine cracker crumbs and peanuts stir in butter and peanut butter set aside 12 cup for topping press the remaining crumb mixture into a greased 13in x 9in dish cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes, meanwhile, in a large bowl, beat cream cheese and peanut butter until smooth beat in sugar and vanilla until smooth fold in whipped topping spoon over crust drizzle with chocolate syrup sprinkle with reserved crumb mixture, cover and freeze for up to 3 months remove from the freezer 15 minutes before serving
input_text: Ingredients: 112 cups graham cracker crumbs about 24 squares, 12 cup chopped salted peanuts, 14 cup butter, melted, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 package 8 ounces cream cheese, softened, 12 cup peanut butter, 12 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 carton 16 ounces frozen whipped topping, thawed, 3 to 4 tablespoons chocolate syrup
target_text: Directions: in a large bowl, combine cracker crumbs and peanuts stir in butter and peanut butter set aside 12 cup for topping press the remaining crumb mixture into a greased 13in x 9in dish cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes, meanwhile, in a large bowl, beat cream cheese and peanut butter until smooth beat in sugar and vanilla until smooth fold in whipped topping spoon over crust drizzle with chocolate syrup sprinkle with reserved crumb mixture, cover and freeze for up to 3 months remove from the freezer 15 minutes before serving

ingredients: 1 to 2 lb little smokies, 1 tsp soy sauce, 2 tsp dry mustard, 1 c brown sugar, 3 tbsp flour, 1 c pineapple juice
directions: combine all ingredients, except little smokies, in a heavy saucepan, cook over medium heat until boiling, boil 5 minutes reduce heat add little smokies and simmer 5 minutes, keep warm over low heat in a chafing dish or slow cooker
input_text: Ingredients: 1 to 2 lb little smokies, 1 tsp soy sauce, 2 tsp dry mustard, 1 c brown sugar, 3 tbsp flour, 1 c pineapple juice
target_text: Directions: combine all ingredients, except little smokies, in a heavy saucepan, cook over medium heat until boiling, boil 5 minutes reduce heat add little smokies and simmer 5 minutes, keep warm over low heat in a chafing dish or slow cooker

ingredients: 1 banana straight shape, 100 grams cake flour, 5 grams baking powder, 70 grams sugar, 1 large egg, 80 ml milk, 200 ml vegetable oil or butter, 1 dash for frying pan vegetable oil or butter
directions: refer tofor making waffle batter steps 1  3, mix the ingredients, it will be a runnier batter than waffle batter, peel the banana and cut into half, insert bamboo skewers in the middle, dip the banana in the batter, hold both ends using both hands and coat the batter around the banana, i used one hand in this picture as i needed to take the picture, once coated, lift the banana and wait until the batter stops dripping, cook the banana in a frying pan over medium to low heat, please adjust the heat and keep rolling until it becomes a nice and golden brown, the,n dip the banana back into the batter to coat it again, try thinly coating it so that there will be beautiful growth ring patterns when you slice the cake, here you can see a thick cake around the banana, i would love to make a round baumkuchen, but it always turned into a triangle shape, keep layering cake around the banana until the batter is gone, please be careful not to burn yourself, once you finish cooking around the banana, remove the wooden skewers from the middle and cook both ends, too, isnt it cute that you can see a little bit of banana, wrap them with plastic wrap while still warm to keep them moist, place the baumkuchen on the wrap and fold both ends, then wrap over the cake to help keep the shape, chill in the fridge for at least 1 hour, but, it is best to eat at room temperature as it will have a nice and fluffy texture, slice to your desired thickness, its so very delicious with a soft banana inside, its also easier than normal baumkuchen as you dont have to remove the centre from the cake
input_text: Ingredients: 1 banana straight shape, 100 grams cake flour, 5 grams baking powder, 70 grams sugar, 1 large egg, 80 ml milk, 200 ml vegetable oil or butter, 1 dash for frying pan vegetable oil or butter

ingredients: 1 head cabbage, 1 egg, rice cooked minute, just enough to blend in with meat, 2 tablespoons vinegar, 2 3 tablespoons brown sugar, to taste, ground beef enough to fill as many cabbage rolls as you want to make, salt and pepper, 1 28 ounce can tomato sauce
directions: put cabbage in water over med to high heat, pull leaves off as they get soft and set aside, they only need to be soft enought to wrap around the meat mixture, mix hamburger, rice just enough to blend in with meat, egg, salt pepper, place enough beef to fit easily in cabbage leafs, roll up and place in a large roasting pan that has a lid, seam side down, mix tomato sauce, vinegar, brown sugar, a little water swished around in the can for extra liquid, taste, the sauce should be tangysweet, pour sauce over cabbage rolls, cover and bake at 350 about 4 hours
input_text: Ingredients: 1 head cabbage, 1 egg, rice cooked minute, just enough to blend in with meat, 2 tablespoons vinegar, 2 3 tablespoons brown sugar, to taste, ground beef enough to fill as many cabbage rolls as you want to make, salt and pepper, 1 28 ounce can tomato sauce

ingredients: 1 large head lettuce, chopped, 1 large tomato, chopped, 3 oz shredded cheddar cheese, 1 can red kidney beans, drained, 1 10 oz bag taco flavored chips
directions: combine all ingredients in a large bowl, toss, then top with otts french dressing

ingredients: 34 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips, 12 cup kraft classic catalina dressing, 1 cup each broccoli florets, red pepper strips, pea pods and shredded carrots, 12 cup slivered onions, 14 cup chopped planters cocktail peanuts, 2 tbsp lite soy sauce, 6 cups field greens
directions: cook chicken in large nonstick skillet on mediumhigh heat 5 min, or until done, stirring occasionally, remove chicken from skillet cover to keep warm, heat dressing in same skillet on mediumhigh heat, add vegetables cook and stir 3 min, add chicken, nuts and soy sauce cook 2 min, or until vegetables are crisptender and mixture is heated through, stirring frequently, serve over greens
input_text: Ingredients: 34 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips, 12 cup kraft classic catalina dressing, 1 cup each broccoli florets, red pepper strips, pea pods and shredded carrots, 12 cup slivered onions, 14 cup chopped planters cocktail peanuts, 2 tbsp lite soy sauce, 6 cups field greens
target_text: Directions: cook chicken in large nonstick skillet on mediumhigh heat 5 min, or until done, stirring occasionally, remove chicken from skillet cover to keep warm, heat dressing in same skillet on mediumhigh heat, add vegetables cook and stir 3 min, add chicken, nuts and soy sauce cook 2 min, or until vegetables are crisptender and mixture is heated through, stirring frequently, serve over greens

ingredients: 1 12 lb ground meatloaf mix of beef, pork, and veal, 1 cup italian bread crumbs, 34 to 1 and 12 cup of milk, 1 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 the following spice measurements are approximate because i dont really measure anymore, and can be adjusted to taste, 1 tsp garlic salt, 12 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp oregano, 1 tsp basil, 1 tsp italian spice, 12 tsp black pepper
directions: preheat oven to 350 and spray cookie sheet with cooking spray, add all ingredients to large bowl and mix well with washed hands to incorporate, start with 34 cup of milk and if it feels dry or sticky, add a little more at a time until they are the proper consistency, roll meatballs in your hands gently, i make mine about walnut size and end up with about 35, place on cookie sheet with about a 12 inch space between each, cook for about 20 minutes, until lite golden brown, they are done when you can pick one up with a tong and it doesnt fall apart, i always make a big pot of sauce the same day i make the meatballs, and just plop them in when they are done and let them add to the flavor of the sauce, mangia
input_text: Ingredients: 1 12 lb ground meatloaf mix of beef, pork, and veal, 1 cup italian bread crumbs, 34 to 1 and 12 cup of milk, 1 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 the following spice measurements are approximate because i dont really measure anymore, and can be adjusted to taste, 1 tsp garlic salt, 12 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp oregano, 1 tsp basil, 1 tsp italian spice, 12 tsp black pepper
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 350 and spray cookie sheet with cooking spray, add all ingredients to large bowl and mix well with washed hands to incorporate, start with 34 cup of milk and if it feels dry or sticky, add a little more at a time until they are the proper consistency, roll meatballs in your hands gently, i make mine about walnut size and end up with about 35, place on cookie sheet with about a 12 inch space between each, cook for about 20 minutes, until lite golden brown, they are done when you can pick one up with a tong and it doesnt fall apart, i always make a big pot of sauce the same day i make the meatballs, and just plop them in when they are done and let them add to the flavor of the sauce, mangia

ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 4 pork loin chops, 4 5 medium potatoes peeled and cut into wedges, 2 heads garlic small and separated into cloves and lightly bruised, salt  freshly ground black pepper to taste, 1 cup white wine, 30 g butter, 14 head cabbage about 2 cups shredded
directions: preheat oven to 200 degree celsius, heat oil in a frypan that will take the cutlets in a single layer and which will go into a preheated oven, over a moderately high heat, brown the chops on both sides until they are golden, remove to a plate, add the potatoes and cook them until they are a golden colour, remove to a plate, add the bruised garlic and cook for a minute of so longer, add the chops back into the pan, and top with the potatoes and some of the bruised garlic, season with salt and pepper and pour over the wine and boil for a few minutes, put pan into the oven and cook for 15 minutes, meanwhile melt the butter in a medium pot and add the cabbage and season with pepper and salt, cover and cook over a low heat for 3 to 5 minutes, to serve place a bed of cabbage on the plates and top with a chop and a portion of the garlic and potatoe wedges
input_text: Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 4 pork loin chops, 4 5 medium potatoes peeled and cut into wedges, 2 heads garlic small and separated into cloves and lightly bruised, salt  freshly ground black pepper to taste, 1 cup white wine, 30 g butter, 14 head cabbage about 2 cups shredded
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 200 degree celsius, heat oil in a frypan that will take the cutlets in a single layer and which will go into a preheated oven, over a moderately high heat, brown the chops on both sides until they are golden, remove to a plate, add the potatoes and cook them until they are a golden colour, remove to a plate, add the bruised garlic and cook for a minute of so longer, add the chops back into the pan, and top with the potatoes and some of the bruised garlic, season with salt and pepper and pour over the wine and boil for a few minutes, put pan into the oven and cook for 15 minutes, meanwhile melt the butter in a medium pot and add the cabbage and season with pepper and salt, cover and cook over a low heat for 3 to 5 minutes, to serve place a bed of cabbage on the plates and top with a chop and a portion of the garlic and potatoe wedges

ingredients: 1 12 cups quinoa, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 large shallots, minced, 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, peeled and minced, 12 teaspoon ground cardamom, 12 teaspoon ground coriander, 12 teaspoon ground cumin, 18 teaspoon cayenne, 3 cups vegetable stock, heated, salt  freshly ground black pepper, 13 cup golden raisin, 14 cup pine nuts, toasted, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley leaves, minced
directions: rinse the quinoa well to remove the bitter white coating drain thoroughly and set aside, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat add the shallots and ginger and cook, stirring, until the shallots are slightly softened, about 1 minute add the quinoa along with the cardamom, coriander, cumin, and cayenne and stir to coat with the oil stir in the hot stock and bring to a boil reduce the heat to low and season with salt and pepper to taste cover the cook until all the water is absorbed, about 10 minutes, remove from the heat and stir in the raisins, pine nuts, and parsley serve hot
input_text: Ingredients: 1 12 cups quinoa, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 large shallots, minced, 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, peeled and minced, 12 teaspoon ground cardamom, 12 teaspoon ground coriander, 12 teaspoon ground cumin, 18 teaspoon cayenne, 3 cups vegetable stock, heated, salt  freshly ground black pepper, 13 cup golden raisin, 14 cup pine nuts, toasted, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley leaves, minced
target_text: Directions: rinse the quinoa well to remove the bitter white coating drain thoroughly and set aside, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat add the shallots and ginger and cook, stirring, until the shallots are slightly softened, about 1 minute add the quinoa along with the cardamom, coriander, cumin, and cayenne and stir to coat with the oil stir in the hot stock and bring to a boil reduce the heat to low and season with salt and pepper to taste cover the cook until all the water is absorbed, about 10 minutes, remove from the heat and stir in the raisins, pine nuts, and parsley serve hot

ingredients: 6 very ripe bananas, 12 c vegetable oil, 14 lb butter, 2 c sugar, 2 12 tsp cinnamon, 1 12 tsp ground cloves, 12 tsp salt, 4 eggs, 3 c flour cake, 2 tsp soda, 1 12 c seedless raisins, 1 12 c chopped pecans
directions: mash the bananas, pour vegetable oil over the bananas and let stand while mixing cake, cream the butter and sugar, add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition, stir in banana mixture and mix well add dry ingredients which have been combined stir in raisins and pecans mix thoroughly spoon into 3 greased loaf pans and bake at 250u00b0 for 1 12 hours
input_text: Ingredients: 6 very ripe bananas, 12 c vegetable oil, 14 lb butter, 2 c sugar, 2 12 tsp cinnamon, 1 12 tsp ground cloves, 12 tsp salt, 4 eggs, 3 c flour cake, 2 tsp soda, 1 12 c seedless raisins, 1 12 c chopped pecans
target_text: Directions: mash the bananas, pour vegetable oil over the bananas and let stand while mixing cake, cream the butter and sugar, add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition, stir in banana mixture and mix well add dry ingredients which have been combined stir in raisins and pecans mix thoroughly spoon into 3 greased loaf pans and bake at 250u00b0 for 1 12 hours

ingredients: 1 cup coarse cornmeal, 34 cup allpurpose flour, 2 tablespoons sugar, 12 teaspoon baking soda, 12 teaspoon salt, 8 tablespoons 1 stick unsalted butter, melted and cooled, 2 large eggs, beaten, 1 12 cups buttermilk
directions: preheat oven to 425u00b0f grease an 8inch baking pan, mix cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking soda and salt in a large bowl, whisk together butter, eggs and buttermilk stir buttermilk mixture into flour mixture batter will be slightly lumpy pour batter into baking pan, bake until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, 22 to 25 minutes let cornbread cool on a wire rack

ingredients: 8 to 10 cooked potatoes, 1 8 oz pkg cream cheese, 12 pt 1 c sour cream, 4 tbsp margarine, 13 c chopped chives, salt and pepper to taste, paprika
directions: cook potatoes and drain, add remaining ingredients, sprinkle top with paprika, store in refrigerator until ready to use, warm in 350u00b0 oven for 45 minutes

ingredients: 14 pound chicken breast, 14cup milk, 2 tbsbutter, 1 tbs ginger  garlic minced, 2 tbs chopped fresh cilantro, salt to taste
directions: 1 cut the chicken like a small pieces, , 2 in a small bowl combine the chicken, with all other ingredients together, , 3 marinade above 1 hour, , 4preheat the oven to 350 degrees, bake 20 to 30 minutes until the, chicken done

ingredients: 1 cup skim milk, 12 teaspoon rum extract, 12 cup pineapple chunk, 1 vanilla instant breakfast drink mix, 6 ice cubes
directions: combine ingredients except ice in blender glass, process mixture on hi until frothy and smooth, add ice cubes, crush, drink, makes about 2 cups

ingredients: 1 pkg 2 layer size white cake mix, 1 pkg 3 oz jello brand raspberry gelatin any other flavor can be used, 1 c boiling water, 12 c cold water
directions: prepare cake mix as directed on package, baking in wellgreased and floured 9 x 13 inch pan at 350 degrees for 30  35 minutes, cool in pan 15 minutes then poke with fork at 12 inch intervals, dissolve gelatin in boiling water, add cold water and spoon over cake in pan, chill 3 to 4 hours, top with thawed cool whip when serving
input_text: Ingredients: 1 pkg 2 layer size white cake mix, 1 pkg 3 oz jello brand raspberry gelatin any other flavor can be used, 1 c boiling water, 12 c cold water

ingredients: 1 12oz can evaporated milk, 1 cup instant nonfat dry milk, 4 12 cups milk, 3 cups whipping cream, 18 teaspoon table salt, 1 115oz package bittersweet chocolate morsels, 1 12oz package semisweet chocolate morsels, 1 10oz package large marshmallows, parchment paper, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, coffee liqueur optional
directions: whisk together evaporated milk and dry milk in a 4qt slow cooker until smooth whisk in milk and next 2 ingredients add chocolate morsels cover and cook on low 4 hours, whisking until smooth after 2 hours, preheat broiler with oven rack 3 inches from heat place 12 marshmallows on a parchment paperlined baking sheet broil 2 minutes or just until toasted repeat procedure with desired amount of marshmallows stir vanilla into hot chocolate, and ladle into mugs stir 1 tablespoon liqueur into each serving, if desired, and top each serving with 1 to 2 toasted marshmallows
input_text: Ingredients: 1 12oz can evaporated milk, 1 cup instant nonfat dry milk, 4 12 cups milk, 3 cups whipping cream, 18 teaspoon table salt, 1 115oz package bittersweet chocolate morsels, 1 12oz package semisweet chocolate morsels, 1 10oz package large marshmallows, parchment paper, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, coffee liqueur optional
target_text: Directions: whisk together evaporated milk and dry milk in a 4qt slow cooker until smooth whisk in milk and next 2 ingredients add chocolate morsels cover and cook on low 4 hours, whisking until smooth after 2 hours, preheat broiler with oven rack 3 inches from heat place 12 marshmallows on a parchment paperlined baking sheet broil 2 minutes or just until toasted repeat procedure with desired amount of marshmallows stir vanilla into hot chocolate, and ladle into mugs stir 1 tablespoon liqueur into each serving, if desired, and top each serving with 1 to 2 toasted marshmallows

ingredients: 1 14 cup sifted 10x confectioners sugar, 1 pkg 8 oz cream cheese, 4 tsp butter, 1 tsp vanilla
directions: beat all ingredients together until smooth
