ingredients: 3 tbsp chopped green pepper, 2 tbsp chopped onion, 2 tsp butter or margarine, 3 eggs, 12 c fully cooked chopped ham, 1 tbsp milk, 18 tsp dry mustard, 18 tsp salt, 18 tsp pepper, bread or toast
directions: combine green pepper, onion and butter in small mixing bowl microwave at high 1 to 2 12 minutes or until vegetables are tender, stir in eggs, chopped ham, milk and seasonings, pour into two small saucers, microwave at high 2 to 5 minutes or until eggs are almost set, pushing cooked portions toward center of dish and rotating saucers once or twice during cooking, serve openface or as sandwiches with bread or toast, serves 4
input_text: Ingredients: 3 tbsp chopped green pepper, 2 tbsp chopped onion, 2 tsp butter or margarine, 3 eggs, 12 c fully cooked chopped ham, 1 tbsp milk, 18 tsp dry mustard, 18 tsp salt, 18 tsp pepper, bread or toast
target_text: Directions: combine green pepper, onion and butter in small mixing bowl microwave at high 1 to 2 12 minutes or until vegetables are tender, stir in eggs, chopped ham, milk and seasonings, pour into two small saucers, microwave at high 2 to 5 minutes or until eggs are almost set, pushing cooked portions toward center of dish and rotating saucers once or twice during cooking, serve openface or as sandwiches with bread or toast, serves 4

ingredients: 1 12 to 2 c red delicious apples, diced, 1 12 to 2 c granny smith apples, diced, 1 can crushed pineapple, drained, 1 12 oz cool whip, 1 c grapes, cut in 12, 1 pkg small cubed snickers candy bars cut into fours
directions: mix and chill 24 hours and serve
input_text: Ingredients: 1 12 to 2 c red delicious apples, diced, 1 12 to 2 c granny smith apples, diced, 1 can crushed pineapple, drained, 1 12 oz cool whip, 1 c grapes, cut in 12, 1 pkg small cubed snickers candy bars cut into fours
target_text: Directions: mix and chill 24 hours and serve

ingredients: 1 lb sausage meat, 12 lb freshly grated parmesan cheese, 1 17 14 oz pkg puff pastry, thawed, 1 egg, 2 tbsp water
directions: mix sausage and cheese together until thoroughly blended, on lightly floured surface, roll each pastry rectangle until its about 8 inches by 14 inches, divide sausage mixture in half and form each into tube shape, about 13 inches long, lay each sausage roll along one long edge of pastry rectangle and roll up, jelly roll fashion, to form two long logs, recipe may be made to this point up to 24 hours before serving, cover sausage roll with plastic wrap until ready to finish and serve
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb sausage meat, 12 lb freshly grated parmesan cheese, 1 17 14 oz pkg puff pastry, thawed, 1 egg, 2 tbsp water
target_text: Directions: mix sausage and cheese together until thoroughly blended, on lightly floured surface, roll each pastry rectangle until its about 8 inches by 14 inches, divide sausage mixture in half and form each into tube shape, about 13 inches long, lay each sausage roll along one long edge of pastry rectangle and roll up, jelly roll fashion, to form two long logs, recipe may be made to this point up to 24 hours before serving, cover sausage roll with plastic wrap until ready to finish and serve

ingredients: 1 stick butter, 1 12 lb yellow squash, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 small jar pimentos, 1 onion, 1 carrot, grated, 1 small carton sour cream, 1 pkg pepperidge farm herb stuffing
directions: cook squash until tender, drain water and mash up, add cream of chicken soup, pimentos, onion, carrot, and sour cream mix well, put 12 of pepperidge stuffing in bottom of dish, pour squash mixture in dish, melt butter and mix with other half of stuffing spread over top, cook at 350 degrees for 30 to 45 minutes
input_text: Ingredients: 1 stick butter, 1 12 lb yellow squash, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 small jar pimentos, 1 onion, 1 carrot, grated, 1 small carton sour cream, 1 pkg pepperidge farm herb stuffing
target_text: Directions: cook squash until tender, drain water and mash up, add cream of chicken soup, pimentos, onion, carrot, and sour cream mix well, put 12 of pepperidge stuffing in bottom of dish, pour squash mixture in dish, melt butter and mix with other half of stuffing spread over top, cook at 350 degrees for 30 to 45 minutes

ingredients: 1 lb pork loin in 8 slices, 2 tablespoons flour, 1 tablespoon oil, 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 12 cup chicken broth, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 3 tablespoons chopped parsley, 12 teaspoon salt
directions: dredge pork in flour, heat oil in a large nonstick skillet, add pork and cook until browned on both sides, remove, stir together the cornstarch, chicken broth, lemon juice, and parsley, simmer 1 minute, spoon over pork
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb pork loin in 8 slices, 2 tablespoons flour, 1 tablespoon oil, 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 12 cup chicken broth, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 3 tablespoons chopped parsley, 12 teaspoon salt
target_text: Directions: dredge pork in flour, heat oil in a large nonstick skillet, add pork and cook until browned on both sides, remove, stir together the cornstarch, chicken broth, lemon juice, and parsley, simmer 1 minute, spoon over pork

ingredients: 1 lb ground beef or 1 lb ground turkey, 1 15 ounce can chili beans, with liquid, 1 15 ounce can kidney beans, drained, 1 cup frozen corn, 1 medium onion chopped , 1 small green pepper chopped, 2 15 ounce cans diced tomatoes with juice, 1 6 ounce can tomato paste, 14 teaspoon garlic powder, 14 teaspoon chili powder, 12 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon pepper, 1 dash crushed red pepper flakes a few shakes worthor more its up to you, hot sauce optional, sour cream reserve for toppping, cheddar cheese reserve for topping
directions: you will need a decently large pot at least 4 qts, cook at med, to high heat, brown the meat and onions and green pepper all togetherdrain grease, add all other ingredients except sour cream and cheese, turn to medlow heat, let simmer for 20 min stirring oftendo taste checks to make sure that its the way you like it, serve with biscuits, over macaroni or just enjoy it plain
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb ground beef or 1 lb ground turkey, 1 15 ounce can chili beans, with liquid, 1 15 ounce can kidney beans, drained, 1 cup frozen corn, 1 medium onion chopped , 1 small green pepper chopped, 2 15 ounce cans diced tomatoes with juice, 1 6 ounce can tomato paste, 14 teaspoon garlic powder, 14 teaspoon chili powder, 12 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon pepper, 1 dash crushed red pepper flakes a few shakes worthor more its up to you, hot sauce optional, sour cream reserve for toppping, cheddar cheese reserve for topping
target_text: Directions: you will need a decently large pot at least 4 qts, cook at med, to high heat, brown the meat and onions and green pepper all togetherdrain grease, add all other ingredients except sour cream and cheese, turn to medlow heat, let simmer for 20 min stirring oftendo taste checks to make sure that its the way you like it, serve with biscuits, over macaroni or just enjoy it plain

ingredients: 4 to 6 lb round bone or english cut roast, 5 or 6 large potatoes, 8 to 10 carrots, 4 to 5 oz soy sauce, 1 tbsp minced onion, 1 tsp pepper, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 pkg frozen peas or green beans optional
directions: cut roast into 4 or 5 pieces, place in dutch oven or large soup pot, cover with cold water and add soy sauce, onion, pepper and garlic powder, cover and cook on mediumlow heat, after 3 hours, peel carrots, cut into 2 to 3 pieces, add to pot stir and recover, after another 30 minutes, peel and quarter potatoes add to pot and recover, after 1 14 hours, add optional frozen vegetables, cook 15 minutes more, scoop onto platter and serve with fresh bread or rolls, serves 6 to 8
input_text: Ingredients: 4 to 6 lb round bone or english cut roast, 5 or 6 large potatoes, 8 to 10 carrots, 4 to 5 oz soy sauce, 1 tbsp minced onion, 1 tsp pepper, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 pkg frozen peas or green beans optional
target_text: Directions: cut roast into 4 or 5 pieces, place in dutch oven or large soup pot, cover with cold water and add soy sauce, onion, pepper and garlic powder, cover and cook on mediumlow heat, after 3 hours, peel carrots, cut into 2 to 3 pieces, add to pot stir and recover, after another 30 minutes, peel and quarter potatoes add to pot and recover, after 1 14 hours, add optional frozen vegetables, cook 15 minutes more, scoop onto platter and serve with fresh bread or rolls, serves 6 to 8

ingredients: 5 cups allpurpose flour, 1 cup cold butter, cubed, 1 cup shortening, 1 package 14 ounce active dry yeast, 12 cup warm milk 110u00b0 to 115u00b0, 2 large eggs, room temperature, 1 tablespoon sugar, 112 teaspoons vanilla extract, 2 cups confectioners sugar, additional confectioners sugar
directions: place flour in a large bowl cut in butter and shortening until mixture resembles coarse crumbs set aside in a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm milk add the eggs, sugar, vanilla and 2 cups of the crumb mixture beat until well blended gradually beat in remaining crumb mixture, turn onto a floured surface knead for 34 minutes place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour, punch dough down divide into 6 portions shape each portion into twelve 6in ropes about 14 in thick roll in confectioners sugar shape each rope into a loop holding both ends of loop, twist together 3 times, place 2 in apart on greased,  bake at 375u00b0 for 1214 minutes or until golden brown roll warm cookies in additional confectioners sugar cool on wire racks
input_text: Ingredients: 5 cups allpurpose flour, 1 cup cold butter, cubed, 1 cup shortening, 1 package 14 ounce active dry yeast, 12 cup warm milk 110u00b0 to 115u00b0, 2 large eggs, room temperature, 1 tablespoon sugar, 112 teaspoons vanilla extract, 2 cups confectioners sugar, additional confectioners sugar
target_text: Directions: place flour in a large bowl cut in butter and shortening until mixture resembles coarse crumbs set aside in a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm milk add the eggs, sugar, vanilla and 2 cups of the crumb mixture beat until well blended gradually beat in remaining crumb mixture, turn onto a floured surface knead for 34 minutes place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour, punch dough down divide into 6 portions shape each portion into twelve 6in ropes about 14 in thick roll in confectioners sugar shape each rope into a loop holding both ends of loop, twist together 3 times, place 2 in apart on greased,  bake at 375u00b0 for 1214 minutes or until golden brown roll warm cookies in additional confectioners sugar cool on wire racks

ingredients: zaatar spice rub, 3 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds, 2 tablespoons dried lemon thyme or regular dried thyme, 2 tablespoons sumac, 2 teaspoons sea salt, fish and pasta, 34 pound white fish filets such as snapper, cod or tilapia, zaatar seasoning from above, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 shallots, minced, 1 spring onion or 2 scallions, minced, 12 clove garlic, minced, 2 cups chopped tomatoes, 1 cup dry white wine, 5 ounces baby spinach, roughly chopped, 12 pitted kalamata olives, chopped fine, 121 teaspoons red pepper flakes or aleppo pepper, salt and freshground black pepper to taste, 2 tablespoons chopped parsley, zest of one meyer lemon, more toasted sesame seeds, 12 pound pasta of your choicei used shells
directions: dry fish filets and sprinkle both sides with zaatar spice rubrnyou will not use all of it some will go into the sauce when cooking and you will probably have some left over, in a large saucepan you will ultimately put the pasta in this pan so it should be large, heat oil over medium heat, and saute shallots, onions and garlic till soft but not browned, about 35 minutes add tomatoes and wine, and turn up heat so that sauce comes to low boil reduce heat to low and simmer until slightly reduced, about 5 minutes stir in about a tablespoon of zaatar and add spinach, stirring till wilted, boil salted water for pasta while water is coming up to boil, cut fish into 1 inch pieces, and put fish and seasoning into tomato sauce stir so that fish pieces are completely covered stir in chopped kalamata olives and red pepper flakes or aleppo pepper, cook the pasta to just al dente drain pasta, reserving about 14 cup of pasta water in case you need it for the sauce i didnt stir pasta into sauce, taking care to leave fish in rather large chunks taste and adjust seasoning you may want to add salt and pepper or more zaatar seasoning, to serve, spoon pasta with sauce onto plate and sprinkle with chopped parsley, lemon zest and sesame seeds
input_text: Ingredients: zaatar spice rub, 3 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds, 2 tablespoons dried lemon thyme or regular dried thyme, 2 tablespoons sumac, 2 teaspoons sea salt, fish and pasta, 34 pound white fish filets such as snapper, cod or tilapia, zaatar seasoning from above, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 shallots, minced, 1 spring onion or 2 scallions, minced, 12 clove garlic, minced, 2 cups chopped tomatoes, 1 cup dry white wine, 5 ounces baby spinach, roughly chopped, 12 pitted kalamata olives, chopped fine, 121 teaspoons red pepper flakes or aleppo pepper, salt and freshground black pepper to taste, 2 tablespoons chopped parsley, zest of one meyer lemon, more toasted sesame seeds, 12 pound pasta of your choicei used shells
target_text: Directions: dry fish filets and sprinkle both sides with zaatar spice rubrnyou will not use all of it some will go into the sauce when cooking and you will probably have some left over, in a large saucepan you will ultimately put the pasta in this pan so it should be large, heat oil over medium heat, and saute shallots, onions and garlic till soft but not browned, about 35 minutes add tomatoes and wine, and turn up heat so that sauce comes to low boil reduce heat to low and simmer until slightly reduced, about 5 minutes stir in about a tablespoon of zaatar and add spinach, stirring till wilted, boil salted water for pasta while water is coming up to boil, cut fish into 1 inch pieces, and put fish and seasoning into tomato sauce stir so that fish pieces are completely covered stir in chopped kalamata olives and red pepper flakes or aleppo pepper, cook the pasta to just al dente drain pasta, reserving about 14 cup of pasta water in case you need it for the sauce i didnt stir pasta into sauce, taking care to leave fish in rather large chunks taste and adjust seasoning you may want to add salt and pepper or more zaatar seasoning, to serve, spoon pasta with sauce onto plate and sprinkle with chopped parsley, lemon zest and sesame seeds

ingredients: 12 cup cashews, 14 cup tahini i used roasted, though raw will probably work just as well, 14 cup agave nectar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 14 cup sesame seeds i used raw, though you could toast them for a stronger flavor
directions: place cashews in food processor and pulse until the texture of coarse sand, add tahini, agave and vanilla and pulse until smooth, transfer mixture from food processor to a bowl and refrigerate 2 hours, roll into 1 inch balls and coat with sesame seeds, serve
input_text: Ingredients: 12 cup cashews, 14 cup tahini i used roasted, though raw will probably work just as well, 14 cup agave nectar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 14 cup sesame seeds i used raw, though you could toast them for a stronger flavor
target_text: Directions: place cashews in food processor and pulse until the texture of coarse sand, add tahini, agave and vanilla and pulse until smooth, transfer mixture from food processor to a bowl and refrigerate 2 hours, roll into 1 inch balls and coat with sesame seeds, serve

ingredients: 4 medium red bell peppers, 2 leeks white part only, 1 medium carrot, sliced, 1 medium onion, chopped, 3 tbsp butter, 2 c chicken broth, 2 c whipping cream, salt and white pepper to taste
directions: saute vegetables until softened, add broth and cream, lower heat and simmer 30 minutes, puree in blender, simmer soup 15 minutes or more, season with salt and pepper to taste
input_text: Ingredients: 4 medium red bell peppers, 2 leeks white part only, 1 medium carrot, sliced, 1 medium onion, chopped, 3 tbsp butter, 2 c chicken broth, 2 c whipping cream, salt and white pepper to taste
target_text: Directions: saute vegetables until softened, add broth and cream, lower heat and simmer 30 minutes, puree in blender, simmer soup 15 minutes or more, season with salt and pepper to taste

ingredients: 1 frozen prepared poundcake or sugar free angel food cake, 1 lemon, 1 12 cups milk, 1 8 ounce container sour cream, 1 8 ounce whipped topping can be sugar free, 2 3 12 ounce packages instant lemon pudding can be sugar free or 3 12 ounce packages pie filling can be sugar free, 1 pint blueberries
directions: cut pound cake into cubes and place in large colander sprinkle juice from 1 lemon over cake toss gently, in separate bowl combine milk, sour cream and half of whipped topping, whisk until smooth add pudding and whisk until pudding begins to thicken, set 10 blueberries aside for garnish optional place 13 of cake in bottom of bowlglass bowl make a pretty presentation top with 13 of blueberries then top with 13 of the pudding mixture and spread evenly repeat layers 12 more times, you can decorate the top with remaining whipped cream and reserved berries if you would like
input_text: Ingredients: 1 frozen prepared poundcake or sugar free angel food cake, 1 lemon, 1 12 cups milk, 1 8 ounce container sour cream, 1 8 ounce whipped topping can be sugar free, 2 3 12 ounce packages instant lemon pudding can be sugar free or 3 12 ounce packages pie filling can be sugar free, 1 pint blueberries
target_text: Directions: cut pound cake into cubes and place in large colander sprinkle juice from 1 lemon over cake toss gently, in separate bowl combine milk, sour cream and half of whipped topping, whisk until smooth add pudding and whisk until pudding begins to thicken, set 10 blueberries aside for garnish optional place 13 of cake in bottom of bowlglass bowl make a pretty presentation top with 13 of blueberries then top with 13 of the pudding mixture and spread evenly repeat layers 12 more times, you can decorate the top with remaining whipped cream and reserved berries if you would like

ingredients: 4 large ripe tomatoes, peeled and chopped, 12 cucumber, chopped, 14 cup green pepper, chopped, 4 tablespoons salad oil, 1 cup tomato juice, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon grated onion, 12 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, fresh ground pepper, 1 dash tabasco sauce
directions: blend all ingredients in blender blend well and cool, serve ice cold
input_text: Ingredients: 4 large ripe tomatoes, peeled and chopped, 12 cucumber, chopped, 14 cup green pepper, chopped, 4 tablespoons salad oil, 1 cup tomato juice, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon grated onion, 12 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, fresh ground pepper, 1 dash tabasco sauce
target_text: Directions: blend all ingredients in blender blend well and cool, serve ice cold

ingredients: 2 tablespoons sugar, 1 tablespoon grated orange zest, 34 pound beef top sirloin steak, cut into thin strips, 1 tablespoon canola oil, 3 cups cut fresh green beans, cut into 2inch pieces, 2 tablespoons water, 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 18 teaspoon pepper, 14 cup reducedsodium soy sauce, 3 tablespoons orange juice
directions: in a large bowl, combine sugar and orange zest add beef toss to coat in a, , stirfry beef in oil for 5 minutes or until browned, in a microwavesafe dish, cover and cook beans in water for 35 minutes on high drain add beans to skillet cook, stirring constantly, until tender, in a small bowl, combine the cornstarch, ginger and pepper stir in the soy sauce and orange juice until smooth pour the sauce over beef and beans toss to coat bring to a boil cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened
input_text: Ingredients: 2 tablespoons sugar, 1 tablespoon grated orange zest, 34 pound beef top sirloin steak, cut into thin strips, 1 tablespoon canola oil, 3 cups cut fresh green beans, cut into 2inch pieces, 2 tablespoons water, 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 18 teaspoon pepper, 14 cup reducedsodium soy sauce, 3 tablespoons orange juice
target_text: Directions: in a large bowl, combine sugar and orange zest add beef toss to coat in a, , stirfry beef in oil for 5 minutes or until browned, in a microwavesafe dish, cover and cook beans in water for 35 minutes on high drain add beans to skillet cook, stirring constantly, until tender, in a small bowl, combine the cornstarch, ginger and pepper stir in the soy sauce and orange juice until smooth pour the sauce over beef and beans toss to coat bring to a boil cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened

ingredients: 1 15ounce can chickpeas, 1 onion, 5 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 tablespoons flour, salt and pepper, canola oil for frying, 1 cup sour cream, 12 cucumber, 1 carrot, 1 tomato, 2 pieces pita bread
directions: pour the chickpeas into a colander and rinse under cold water, let drain for 10 minutes, place the chickpeas in a bowl and smash them well with a fork or a potato masher, if you have one, until they are the consistency of dense, grainy mashed potatoes, peel and finely chop the onion and garlic, or pass the garlic through a garlic press, reserve 1 tablespoon of the chopped onion and 1 teaspoon of the chopped garlic for the sauce and add the remainder of each to the mashed chickpeas, stir in the parsley, cumin, and flour until they are completely combined, season with salt and pepper and mix well, form the mixture into small balls about the size of pingpong balls, and press them gently between your palms to flatten slightly into patties, pour about 1 inch of oil into a deep skillet or large saucepan and place over mediumhigh heat until very hot about 350f, a tiny drop of water flicked into the pan should immediately cause the oil to bubble up, carefully add a few of the patties to the oil using a slotted spoon, make sure not to crowd the patties in the pan, cook for 3 to 4 minutes on each side, or until golden brown, remove to a plate lined with several layers of paper towels to drain and repeat the process with the remaining patties, place the sour cream in a bowl and add the reserved onion and garlic, peel the cucumber and cut it in half lengthwise, scrape out the seeds with a spoon and cut the cucumber into thin slices, stir the cucumber into the sour cream and season with salt and pepper, peel and grate the carrot, cut the tomato in half, remove the seeds by scraping them out of the tomato with a small tool or your finger, and chop into 12inch pieces, cut the pita breads in half and open the pockets, place 3 or 4 falafel in each pocket and spoon on some of the cucumber sauce, top with some of the grated carrot and tomato and serve immediately, temperature control is the key to nongreasy frying if your oil is hot enough when you add the food, and if it stays hot enough, the food will cook fast and absorb a surprisingly small amount of oil, fry the food in batches to keep the pan uncrowdedadding a lot of food to the pan can cool the oil down too much

ingredients: 1 shallot, 3 blood oranges, 1 12 teaspoons balsamic vinegar, 12 teaspoon red wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper, 1 12 lbs asparagus 2530 spears
directions: peel and chop the shallot fine and macerate for 30 minutes in the juice of 12 of one orange and the balsamic and red wine vinegars, whisk in the olive oil to taste to make a vinaigrette, and season with salt and pepper, peel just the zest from one orange, chop very fine, and add to the vinaigrette, cut away the rind and pith from all oranges and slice them into thin rounds, parboil and grill the asparagus until tender, arrange asparagus on a platter with orange slices on top, drizzle with vinaigrette
input_text: Ingredients: 1 shallot, 3 blood oranges, 1 12 teaspoons balsamic vinegar, 12 teaspoon red wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper, 1 12 lbs asparagus 2530 spears
target_text: Directions: peel and chop the shallot fine and macerate for 30 minutes in the juice of 12 of one orange and the balsamic and red wine vinegars, whisk in the olive oil to taste to make a vinaigrette, and season with salt and pepper, peel just the zest from one orange, chop very fine, and add to the vinaigrette, cut away the rind and pith from all oranges and slice them into thin rounds, parboil and grill the asparagus until tender, arrange asparagus on a platter with orange slices on top, drizzle with vinaigrette

ingredients: 12 c grapenuts, 1 c sour milk, 34 c sugar, 1 egg, 2 tbsp oil, 2 c flour, 12 tsp soda, 2 tsp baking powder, 12 tsp salt
directions: soak the grapenuts, sour milk , sugar, egg and oil together for 10 minutes, add the flour, soda, baking powder and salt bake in 2 small or 1 large pan, let rise 20 minutes, then bake at 350u00b0
input_text: Ingredients: 12 c grapenuts, 1 c sour milk, 34 c sugar, 1 egg, 2 tbsp oil, 2 c flour, 12 tsp soda, 2 tsp baking powder, 12 tsp salt
target_text: Directions: soak the grapenuts, sour milk , sugar, egg and oil together for 10 minutes, add the flour, soda, baking powder and salt bake in 2 small or 1 large pan, let rise 20 minutes, then bake at 350u00b0

ingredients: 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 12 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 teaspoons minced garlic, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 2 tablespoons new mexico chile powder, 2 tablespoons olive oil
directions: combine all ingredients and mix well, rub evenly over chicken at least 30 minutes prior to grilling
input_text: Ingredients: 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 12 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 teaspoons minced garlic, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 2 tablespoons new mexico chile powder, 2 tablespoons olive oil
target_text: Directions: combine all ingredients and mix well, rub evenly over chicken at least 30 minutes prior to grilling

ingredients: 12 cup cool water, 1 cucumber, halved, 2 green apples, quartered, 1 lemon, halved
directions: pour water into a glass and place beneath the spigot of a juicer, process first the cucumber, waiting about 20 seconds between halves do the same with each apple quarter finally juice the lemon halves, stir juice vigorously to blend
input_text: Ingredients: 12 cup cool water, 1 cucumber, halved, 2 green apples, quartered, 1 lemon, halved
target_text: Directions: pour water into a glass and place beneath the spigot of a juicer, process first the cucumber, waiting about 20 seconds between halves do the same with each apple quarter finally juice the lemon halves, stir juice vigorously to blend

ingredients: 513 ounces, weight potatoes i used new potatoes, 358 ounces, weight carrot, 12 whole red pepper, 278 ounces, weight cauliflower, 2 cloves garlic, 2 teaspoons oil, 1 teaspoon curry powder, 12 teaspoons garlic salt, 12 teaspoons garam masala
directions: heat the oven to 190 degrees c gas mark 5  375 degrees f, cut the potatoes, carrots, pepper and cauliflower into small chunks, put all of the cut veggies except cauliflower into a large bowl keep the cauliflower aside, i halved the new potatoes, cut the carrot into slices approximately 12 cm thick, cut the pepper half into around 6 chunks and cut the cauliflower into small florets, cut each clove of garlic into about 3 chunks, mix all the vegetables, apart from the cauliflower, in a bowl with the oil, curry powder, garlic salt and garam masala until they are well coated with the oil and spices, transfer them to a baking tray and roast for about 30 minutes, remove them from the oven, add the cauliflower, and toss all the vegetables together, roast for a further 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender but still slightly firm
input_text: Ingredients: 513 ounces, weight potatoes i used new potatoes, 358 ounces, weight carrot, 12 whole red pepper, 278 ounces, weight cauliflower, 2 cloves garlic, 2 teaspoons oil, 1 teaspoon curry powder, 12 teaspoons garlic salt, 12 teaspoons garam masala

ingredients: 1 yeast cake, 14 c warm water, 1 tbsp sugar, 4 c flour, 3 tbsp olive oil, 12 tsp salt, 1 12 c water
directions: dissolve yeast with 14 cup warm water and sugar, mix together next 4 ingredients, mix with yeast let rise 2 hours
input_text: Ingredients: 1 yeast cake, 14 c warm water, 1 tbsp sugar, 4 c flour, 3 tbsp olive oil, 12 tsp salt, 1 12 c water
target_text: Directions: dissolve yeast with 14 cup warm water and sugar, mix together next 4 ingredients, mix with yeast let rise 2 hours

ingredients: 1 c oil, 1 c sugar, 1 egg, 12 c cocoa, 2 c flour, 1 12 tsp baking soda, 12 tsp salt, 1 c milk, 1 tsp vanilla
directions: mix ingredients and let stand for 15 minutes, preheat oven to 375u00b0, drop batter by heaping teaspoonful on a cookie sheet, leave ample space between, bake 8 to 10 minutes
input_text: Ingredients: 1 c oil, 1 c sugar, 1 egg, 12 c cocoa, 2 c flour, 1 12 tsp baking soda, 12 tsp salt, 1 c milk, 1 tsp vanilla
target_text: Directions: mix ingredients and let stand for 15 minutes, preheat oven to 375u00b0, drop batter by heaping teaspoonful on a cookie sheet, leave ample space between, bake 8 to 10 minutes

ingredients: 2 tbsp cornstarch, 6 lasagna noodles, 1 10 oz pkg frozen spinach, 2 c skim milk, 1 tbsp minced onion, 1 12 c fully cooked diced ham, 12 tsp italian seasoning, 1 c lowfat cottage cheese, 1 c mozzarella cheese, shredded
directions: cook lasagna noodles as directed, drain, rinse and set aside meanwhile, cook spinach as directed and set aside
input_text: Ingredients: 2 tbsp cornstarch, 6 lasagna noodles, 1 10 oz pkg frozen spinach, 2 c skim milk, 1 tbsp minced onion, 1 12 c fully cooked diced ham, 12 tsp italian seasoning, 1 c lowfat cottage cheese, 1 c mozzarella cheese, shredded
target_text: Directions: cook lasagna noodles as directed, drain, rinse and set aside meanwhile, cook spinach as directed and set aside

ingredients: 6 medium potatoes, 6 hardcooked eggs, sliced, 1 large onion, peeled and sliced, 1 16 ounce container sour cream, salt and pepper to taste
directions: place the potatoes into a large pot with enough water to cover bring to a boil, and cook until tender enough to insert a fork, 15 to 20 minutes drain and cool slightly, then peel and slice, preheat the oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c place a layer of potato slices in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish top with a layer of onion slices, and then some of the sliced eggs cover with a thin layer of sour cream repeat layering, until ingredients are used up, ending with sour cream on top season with salt and pepper, bake for 35 to 40 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the top layer of sour cream is golden brown
input_text: Ingredients: 6 medium potatoes, 6 hardcooked eggs, sliced, 1 large onion, peeled and sliced, 1 16 ounce container sour cream, salt and pepper to taste
target_text: Directions: place the potatoes into a large pot with enough water to cover bring to a boil, and cook until tender enough to insert a fork, 15 to 20 minutes drain and cool slightly, then peel and slice, preheat the oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c place a layer of potato slices in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish top with a layer of onion slices, and then some of the sliced eggs cover with a thin layer of sour cream repeat layering, until ingredients are used up, ending with sour cream on top season with salt and pepper, bake for 35 to 40 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the top layer of sour cream is golden brown

ingredients: 4 slices bacon, 3 green onions, thinly sliced, 14 cup mayonnaise, 14 cup greek yogurt, 14 cup arugula, chopped, 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon black pepper, freshly ground, 1 pint grape tomatoes, quartered
directions: place the bacon in a medium skillet over medium heat cook, turning, until crisp, about 6 minutes, transfer to a plate lined with a paper towel, combine the onions, mayonnaise, yogurt, arugula, salt and pepper to taste in a food processor pulse until chunky, about 5 times, transfer to a medium bowl, crumble the bacon into the bowl stir into the mayonnaise mixture, stir in the tomatoes
input_text: Ingredients: 4 slices bacon, 3 green onions, thinly sliced, 14 cup mayonnaise, 14 cup greek yogurt, 14 cup arugula, chopped, 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon black pepper, freshly ground, 1 pint grape tomatoes, quartered
target_text: Directions: place the bacon in a medium skillet over medium heat cook, turning, until crisp, about 6 minutes, transfer to a plate lined with a paper towel, combine the onions, mayonnaise, yogurt, arugula, salt and pepper to taste in a food processor pulse until chunky, about 5 times, transfer to a medium bowl, crumble the bacon into the bowl stir into the mayonnaise mixture, stir in the tomatoes

ingredients: for the cupcakes, 12 cups butter, 34 cups sugar, 114 cup allpurpose flour, 14 teaspoons baking soda, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoons kosher salt, 2 whole eggs, 14 cups sour cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 13 cups white chocolate chips, , for the raspberry puree, 8 ounces, weight raspberries, 1 tablespoon water, 3 tablespoons sugar, 1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed in 14 cup water, , for the frosting, 2 cups powdered sugar, 23 teaspoons vanilla extract, 12 sticks softened butter, 14 cups milk, 5 ounces, weight melted white chocolate
directions: mix the cupcake ingredients together in a bowl, folding in the white chocolate chips at the end bake at 350 degrees for about 15 minutes, puree the raspberry puree ingredients together cut a hole in the middle of each cupcake and fill with the puree, beat the frosting ingredients together and fold in the melted white chocolate frost the cupcakes with it, enjoy
input_text: Ingredients: for the cupcakes, 12 cups butter, 34 cups sugar, 114 cup allpurpose flour, 14 teaspoons baking soda, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoons kosher salt, 2 whole eggs, 14 cups sour cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 13 cups white chocolate chips, , for the raspberry puree, 8 ounces, weight raspberries, 1 tablespoon water, 3 tablespoons sugar, 1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed in 14 cup water, , for the frosting, 2 cups powdered sugar, 23 teaspoons vanilla extract, 12 sticks softened butter, 14 cups milk, 5 ounces, weight melted white chocolate

ingredients: 2 cups milk, 1 tsp vanilla, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 cup sugar, 3  4 tbsp flour, graham crackers, bananas
directions: heat milk on medium heat, add eggs, bring to a boil, mix in sugar and flour stirring slowly, pour over graham crackers and bananas, layer, can use vanilla wafers instead of graham crackers
input_text: Ingredients: 2 cups milk, 1 tsp vanilla, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 cup sugar, 3  4 tbsp flour, graham crackers, bananas
target_text: Directions: heat milk on medium heat, add eggs, bring to a boil, mix in sugar and flour stirring slowly, pour over graham crackers and bananas, layer, can use vanilla wafers instead of graham crackers

ingredients: 3 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, 12 cup tequila, 1 lime, zested and juiced, 14 teaspoon garlic powder, divided, 14 teaspoon chili powder, divided, 3 ounces shredded mexicanstyle cheese blend
directions: arrange chicken breasts in a baking dish add tequila and juice of 12 a lime sprinkle 12 of the lime zest, 12 of the garlic powder, and 12 of the chili powder over the chicken cover dish with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes, turn chicken breasts sprinkle remaining lime juice, lime zest, garlic powder, and chili powder on top cover again and marinate in the refrigerator for another 30 minutes, preheat the oven to 425 degrees f 220 degrees c uncover baking dish and discard tequilalime marinade, bake chicken in the preheated oven for 25 minutes sprinkle mexicanstyle cheese over the chicken and continue to bake until the chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 10 minutes more an instantread thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees f 74 degrees c

ingredients: 1 pkg small marshmallows, 1 large can pineapple chunks, 1 jar sweet cherries, 1 c nuts, 12 c sugar, 12 c whipping cream, 3 or 4 bananas, sliced
directions: fold all ingredients together and chill

ingredients: 2 c drained pineapple, 12 c sugar, 1 12 tbsp knox gelatine, 14 c cold water, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 2 tbsp cherry juice, 6 oz cream cheese, 12 oz cherries, chopped, 9 oz cool whip
directions: combine pineapple, sugar, lemon juice and cherry juice, put on the heat, but do not boil, soften gelatine in cold water add to pineapple mixture, add cream cheese and chopped cherries to cool whip, mix altogether, put in refrigerator to set
input_text: Ingredients: 2 c drained pineapple, 12 c sugar, 1 12 tbsp knox gelatine, 14 c cold water, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 2 tbsp cherry juice, 6 oz cream cheese, 12 oz cherries, chopped, 9 oz cool whip

ingredients: 1 cup vegetable oil, 2 cups sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups allpurpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 12 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 12 teaspoons vanilla extract, 3 cups apples, peeled and chopped, 1 cup pecans, chopped, 1 cup butterscotch chips, caramel syrup, for garnish, whipped cream, for garnish
directions: preheat oven to 350 degrees, in a large mixing bowl, mix together oil and sugar, add eggs one at a time, beating with a hand mixer to incorporate, add flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon beat well, stir in vanilla, apples, and pecans mixture will be thick, spread mixture in a greased 9x13 baking dish, sprinkle butterscotch chips over the top of the cake, bake for 55 minutes, i know this is hard, but let it cool completely, serve garnished with plenty of caramel sauce and whipped cream i actually prefer to skip the caramel because its sweet enough as it is, but everyone else seems to like it

ingredients: 1 pkg cubed steak, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 34 c water, 1 pkg lipton onion soup mix, salt and pepper to taste, flour
directions: cut the steak into small pieces, roll in flour and brown in skillet, place the browned steak into crockpot and pour the soup and water over top, salt and pepper, cook on high for 2 to 3 hours or on low for 5 to 6 hours

ingredients: 1 cup tart applesauce, sieved, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 cup sugar, 4 eggs, slightly beaten, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 12 teaspoon nutmeg optional, 12 teaspoon salt, one 9inch unbaked pastry shell deep
directions: preheat oven to 450u00b0f whisk together applesauce, lemon juice, sugar, eggs, butter, nutmeg, and salt pour into pastry shell bake at 450u00b0 for 15 minutes, reduce heat to 275u00b0 and bake until pie is fully set, about 1 hour longer

ingredients: 2 lbs green beans, trimmed, 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 4 garlic cloves, 4 heads dill weed, 14 cup canning salt pickling, 2 12 cups water, 2 12 cups white vinegar
directions: pack beans, lengthwise, into hot jars, leaving 14inch head space, for each pint, add 14 teaspoon cayenne, 1 garlic clove, and 1 head dill, combine remaining ingredients and bring to boiling, pour boiling hot over beans, leaving 14inch head space, adjust caps, process pints and quarts 10 minutes in boiling water bath

ingredients: 1 envelope each grape and orange koolaid unsweetened, 2 c sugar, 3 qt cold water, 1 bottle ginger ale pop
directions: mix koolaid, sugar and water in large kettle, just before serving, add ginger ale, you may serve in kettle as witchs brew

target_text: Directions: mix koolaid, sugar and water in large kettle, just before serving, add ginger ale, you may serve in kettle as witchs brew

ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 cup onion, chopped, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 12 cup dried pinto bean, 12 teaspoon chili powder, salt, to taste, cracked black pepper, to taste, 12 cup green pepper, chopped, 1 3 teaspoon serrano pepper, minced how much kick do you want, 2 cups tomatoes, chopped, 1 teaspoon oregano, 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, chopped, plus a few whole leaves, 14 cup water, 12 teaspoon hot pepper sauce tabasco, tapatio, franks red hot, etc, 12 cup cornmeal, 13 cup allpurpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoon salt, 12 cup milk, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 5 eggs, divided, 12 cup cheese, shredded mexican blend
directions: soak beans overnight or boil 3 minutes then cover and let stand 1 hour, drain beans and cover with fresh water, boil until tender, about 1 12 hours, drain beans and reserve liquid, in a medium skillet saute onion and garlic in oil until tender, about 5 minute, remove 3 tablespoons of the oniongarlic mixture and combine it with the beans, add chili powder and mash beans until smooth adding reserved liquid as necessary, season with salt and pepper, add peppers to the remaining onion mixture and saute another few minutes, add tomatoes, oregano, cilantro, water and pepper sauce, cover and simmer 15 minutes, whisk together flour, baking powder and salt, whisk together milk, butter and 1 egg, add milk mixture to cornmeal mixture and mix until blended, let batter rest 5 minutes, pour about 14 the batter onto lightly greased skillet to make 4 diameter cakes, cook over medium heat until lightly browned, about 3 minutes each side, carefully break remaining 4 eggs into simmering sauce, keeping them apart, cover and cook until eggs are set and yolks are the way you prefer, about 48 min, softhard, cover corn cake with beans, top with egg and some sauce, sprinkle cheese over the tops and broil briefly, garnish with cilantro leaves and serve, there is a lot of overlap in cooking times, you could knock the time down with prepared salsa and refried beans, but why

ingredients: 1 angel food cake, 2 envelopes dream whip, 1 can cherry pie filling, 1 large cream cheese, room temperature
directions: tear cake into small hunks and put in 9 x 13 pan, whip dream whip according to package direction, cut cream cheese into small bits and add to dream whip, whip until smooth, pour over cake and stir gently until all the cake is covered, pour pie filling on top and smooth so it will look nice,, refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving

ingredients: 1 head cabbage, shredded, 2 small carrots, shredded, 3 green onions, minced, 14 c soy sauce, 1 6 oz can chicken, crab or shrimp, drained, salt and pepper to taste, 15 egg roll wrappers, canola or safflower oil
directions: stirfry cabbage, carrots and onions in 2 tablespoons oil and soy sauce for one minute, remove from wok and set aside, add meat and salt and pepper to vegetables, heat 2 cups oil in a skillet, spoon 2 to 3 tablespoons of mixture on each egg roll wrapper, fold sides and roll diagonally, brush with water to seal, fry in hot oil until golden brown, drain on paper towel

ingredients: 4 cans refrigerated biscuits 40, 1 12 tbsp cinnamon, 12 c margarine, 1 c white sugar, 1 c brown sugar, 12 c pecans, chopped, raisins andor coconut
directions: cut each biscuit into 6 pieces, put white sugar and cinnamon in plastic bag, add biscuit pieces, a few at a time, and shake to cover, place pieces in a greased tube pan by layers, sprinkle each layer with pecans, raisins or coconut

ingredients: 34 cup instant rice, 12 cup baby carrots, fresh cut in half lengthwise, 1 cup broccoli slaw mix may substitute broccoli florets, 1 10 ounce can cream of celery soup, 1 10 ounce can cream of mushroom soup, 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, 1 medium yellow sweet onion, chopped, 1 cup roughly chopped canned artichoke heart not marinated, 1 cup cubed velveeta cheese may sub cream cheese, 4 large uncooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut in half
directions: grease the inside of the crock pot and dump in your rice and sprinkle carrots and broccoli slaw on top in a bowl, mix the soup, onion, artichokes, soy sauce and cheese pour half the soup mixture over the ricecarrots and give it a stir place the chicken on top, then pour the rest of the soup mixture on top cover and cook for 3 hours on high serve with some warm crusty bread and butter
input_text: Ingredients: 34 cup instant rice, 12 cup baby carrots, fresh cut in half lengthwise, 1 cup broccoli slaw mix may substitute broccoli florets, 1 10 ounce can cream of celery soup, 1 10 ounce can cream of mushroom soup, 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce, 1 medium yellow sweet onion, chopped, 1 cup roughly chopped canned artichoke heart not marinated, 1 cup cubed velveeta cheese may sub cream cheese, 4 large uncooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut in half

ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 12 bell pepper, diced, 1 medium onion, diced, 1 4 oz jar mushrooms, 1 16 oz can tomatoes, 1 15 oz container ricotta cheese, 1 16 oz bag shredded cheese colby and monterey, 2 tbsp worcestershire sauce, 34 box rotini pasta, 1 tbsp minced garlic, salt and pepper to taste
directions: prepare pasta as directed on box, brown ground beef, bell pepper, onion and garlic, drain off grease turn to medium heat add tomatoes, mushrooms and worcestershire sauce, simmer for 10 minutes turn stove off and add ricotta cheese drain pasta and put in 2quart casserole dish, mix pasta, ground beef mixture and 12 bag shredded cheese, place remaining cheese on top cover and bake in preheated 300u00b0 oven for 30 minutes
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 12 bell pepper, diced, 1 medium onion, diced, 1 4 oz jar mushrooms, 1 16 oz can tomatoes, 1 15 oz container ricotta cheese, 1 16 oz bag shredded cheese colby and monterey, 2 tbsp worcestershire sauce, 34 box rotini pasta, 1 tbsp minced garlic, salt and pepper to taste
target_text: Directions: prepare pasta as directed on box, brown ground beef, bell pepper, onion and garlic, drain off grease turn to medium heat add tomatoes, mushrooms and worcestershire sauce, simmer for 10 minutes turn stove off and add ricotta cheese drain pasta and put in 2quart casserole dish, mix pasta, ground beef mixture and 12 bag shredded cheese, place remaining cheese on top cover and bake in preheated 300u00b0 oven for 30 minutes

ingredients: 1 cup stale bread, cubed, 12 cup apple, peeled and chopped, 14 cup dried cranberries you could also use dried cherries or apricots or a combination of the three, 1 egg, 14 cup granulated sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 12 cup milk, 1 teaspoon butter, ground cinnamon
directions: in a lightly greased 2 cup baking dish, toss together the bread cubes, apple and dried fruit, in a small bowl, whisk together the egg, sugar and vanilla, in a small saucepan, heat the milk with the butter just until steaming gradually whisk into the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream, pour over the bread mixture, let stand for 5 minutes press gently to moisten the bread evenly, sprinkle with cinnamon to taste, bake at 350 degrees f for about 30 minutes or just until puffed and a knife inserted in the centre comes out clean, broil for about 2 minutes or until golden and crusty
input_text: Ingredients: 1 cup stale bread, cubed, 12 cup apple, peeled and chopped, 14 cup dried cranberries you could also use dried cherries or apricots or a combination of the three, 1 egg, 14 cup granulated sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 12 cup milk, 1 teaspoon butter, ground cinnamon
target_text: Directions: in a lightly greased 2 cup baking dish, toss together the bread cubes, apple and dried fruit, in a small bowl, whisk together the egg, sugar and vanilla, in a small saucepan, heat the milk with the butter just until steaming gradually whisk into the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream, pour over the bread mixture, let stand for 5 minutes press gently to moisten the bread evenly, sprinkle with cinnamon to taste, bake at 350 degrees f for about 30 minutes or just until puffed and a knife inserted in the centre comes out clean, broil for about 2 minutes or until golden and crusty

ingredients: 14 cup ground fax seeds, 1 scoop protein powder, 1 cup blackberry, 2 teaspoons sugar free artificial sweetener, 4 ounces soymilk, 2 cups ice
directions: mix and blend in blender until smooth, replace this with one meal each day

ingredients: 2 8 ounce packages manicotti, 14 cup butter or 14 cup margarine, 14 cup allpurpose flour, 2 12 cups milk, 34 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 lb bulk italian sausage, 4 cups diced cooked chicken or 4 cups turkey, 2 10 ounce packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 2 26 12 ounce cans spaghetti sauce, 14 cup minced fresh parsley
directions: cook manicotti according to package directions drain and set aside, melt butter in a saucepan, stir in the flour until smooth, gradually add milk, bring to a boil cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened, stir in parmesan cheese until melted set aside, in a skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until no longer pink drain, add chicken, spinach, eggs, mozzarella cheese and 34 cup white sauce, stuff into manicotti shells, spread 12 cup spaghetti sauce in each of two ungreased 13x9 inch baking dishes, top with manicotti, pour remaining spaghetti sauce over the top, reheat the remaining white sauce, stirring constantly, pour over spaghetti sauce, bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 4550 minutes, sprinkle with parsley
input_text: Ingredients: 2 8 ounce packages manicotti, 14 cup butter or 14 cup margarine, 14 cup allpurpose flour, 2 12 cups milk, 34 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 lb bulk italian sausage, 4 cups diced cooked chicken or 4 cups turkey, 2 10 ounce packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 2 26 12 ounce cans spaghetti sauce, 14 cup minced fresh parsley
target_text: Directions: cook manicotti according to package directions drain and set aside, melt butter in a saucepan, stir in the flour until smooth, gradually add milk, bring to a boil cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened, stir in parmesan cheese until melted set aside, in a skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until no longer pink drain, add chicken, spinach, eggs, mozzarella cheese and 34 cup white sauce, stuff into manicotti shells, spread 12 cup spaghetti sauce in each of two ungreased 13x9 inch baking dishes, top with manicotti, pour remaining spaghetti sauce over the top, reheat the remaining white sauce, stirring constantly, pour over spaghetti sauce, bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 4550 minutes, sprinkle with parsley

ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 2 c grated cheese, 12 c onion, 1 12 c milk, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 bag tater tots
directions: brown hamburger and onion, place meat in bottom of casserole dish, salt and pepper, pour soup over meat do not dilute soup add grated cheese over this, add milk, place potatoes over this, bake at 350u00b0 until tater tots are golden brown
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 2 c grated cheese, 12 c onion, 1 12 c milk, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 bag tater tots
target_text: Directions: brown hamburger and onion, place meat in bottom of casserole dish, salt and pepper, pour soup over meat do not dilute soup add grated cheese over this, add milk, place potatoes over this, bake at 350u00b0 until tater tots are golden brown

ingredients: 1 cup almonds unblanched, 1 cup flour, allpurpose unsifted, 12 cup whole wheat flour, 12 cup turbinado sugar, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 3 large eggs, 12 teaspoon vanilla extract
directions: roast almonds in a 350f 180c f oven for 10 to 15 minutes until lightly browned, cool to room temperature, mix together dry ingredients in a large bowl reserving about 1 cup, lightly beat eggs and vanilla and add, work mixture until dough coheres adding reserved dry ingredients if necessary, add nuts and knead until they are evenly distributed, divide into thirds and rest for a few minutes, then shape into slabs about 1 inch wide and 12 to 14 inch long, place on a lightly oiled cookie sheet and bake at 300f 150c for 50 minutes, cool on a rack for 5 minutes then cut diagonal bars 12 inch thick, lay the cookies on their sides and return to the oven for 50 minutes
input_text: Ingredients: 1 cup almonds unblanched, 1 cup flour, allpurpose unsifted, 12 cup whole wheat flour, 12 cup turbinado sugar, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 3 large eggs, 12 teaspoon vanilla extract
target_text: Directions: roast almonds in a 350f 180c f oven for 10 to 15 minutes until lightly browned, cool to room temperature, mix together dry ingredients in a large bowl reserving about 1 cup, lightly beat eggs and vanilla and add, work mixture until dough coheres adding reserved dry ingredients if necessary, add nuts and knead until they are evenly distributed, divide into thirds and rest for a few minutes, then shape into slabs about 1 inch wide and 12 to 14 inch long, place on a lightly oiled cookie sheet and bake at 300f 150c for 50 minutes, cool on a rack for 5 minutes then cut diagonal bars 12 inch thick, lay the cookies on their sides and return to the oven for 50 minutes

ingredients: 4 to 6 fresh tomatoes, 2 long yellow peppers these are hot, 1 green bell pepper, 1 large onion, salt and pepper to taste
directions: chop all ingredients, mix together well and refrigerate for one hour before serving, serve with white corn tortilla chips hot and delicious
input_text: Ingredients: 4 to 6 fresh tomatoes, 2 long yellow peppers these are hot, 1 green bell pepper, 1 large onion, salt and pepper to taste
target_text: Directions: chop all ingredients, mix together well and refrigerate for one hour before serving, serve with white corn tortilla chips hot and delicious

ingredients: 2 c allpurpose flour, 1 c hungry jack mashed potato flakes, 1 12 c sugar, 1 tsp baking soda, 12 tsp salt, 1 tsp cinnamon, 12 tsp ginger, ground, 14 tsp cloves, ground, 1 c margarine or butter, softened, 1 egg, 14 c sugar
directions: heat oven to 375u00b0, lightly spoon flour into measuring cup level off, in large bowl, combine all ingredients except 14 cup sugar mix until well blended, shape into 1inch balls, place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets, flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in the 14 cup sugar, bake at 375u00b0 for 7 to 9 minutes or until lightly browned, let stand 1 minute before removing from cookie sheet, cool on racks, store in tightly covered container, makes 5 dozen cookies
input_text: Ingredients: 2 c allpurpose flour, 1 c hungry jack mashed potato flakes, 1 12 c sugar, 1 tsp baking soda, 12 tsp salt, 1 tsp cinnamon, 12 tsp ginger, ground, 14 tsp cloves, ground, 1 c margarine or butter, softened, 1 egg, 14 c sugar
target_text: Directions: heat oven to 375u00b0, lightly spoon flour into measuring cup level off, in large bowl, combine all ingredients except 14 cup sugar mix until well blended, shape into 1inch balls, place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets, flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in the 14 cup sugar, bake at 375u00b0 for 7 to 9 minutes or until lightly browned, let stand 1 minute before removing from cookie sheet, cool on racks, store in tightly covered container, makes 5 dozen cookies

ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 12 cup chopped shallot, 8 ounces ground lamb, 4 medium plum tomatoes, chopped, 2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley, 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon fresh ground pepper, yellow cornmeal, for dusting, 1 lb pizza dough, 13 cup crumbled feta, 1 tablespoon pine nuts
directions: heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat, add shallots cook, stirring often, until softened, about 2 minutes, add lamb and cook, stirring and breaking up with a wooden spoon, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes, transfer to a colander and drain fat, wipe out the pan return the meat and shallots to the pan and stir in tomatoes, cook until the tomatoes begin to break down, about 3 minutes, add parsley, pomegranate molasses, cinnamon, salt and pepper and stir to coat remove from the heat, preheat grill to low, for charcoal grilling or an oven variation, see below, , sprinkle cornmeal onto a pizza peel or large baking sheet, roll out the dough see tip and transfer it to the prepared peel or baking sheet, making sure the underside of the dough is completely coated with cornmeal, slide the crust onto the grill rack close the lid, cook until lightly browned, 3 to 4 minutes, using a large spatula, flip the crust, spread the lamb mixture on the crust, leaving a 1inch border, sprinkle with feta and pine nuts, close the lid again and grill until the toppings are hot and the bottom of the crust has browned, about 8 minutes
input_text: Ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 12 cup chopped shallot, 8 ounces ground lamb, 4 medium plum tomatoes, chopped, 2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley, 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon fresh ground pepper, yellow cornmeal, for dusting, 1 lb pizza dough, 13 cup crumbled feta, 1 tablespoon pine nuts
target_text: Directions: heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat, add shallots cook, stirring often, until softened, about 2 minutes, add lamb and cook, stirring and breaking up with a wooden spoon, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes, transfer to a colander and drain fat, wipe out the pan return the meat and shallots to the pan and stir in tomatoes, cook until the tomatoes begin to break down, about 3 minutes, add parsley, pomegranate molasses, cinnamon, salt and pepper and stir to coat remove from the heat, preheat grill to low, for charcoal grilling or an oven variation, see below, , sprinkle cornmeal onto a pizza peel or large baking sheet, roll out the dough see tip and transfer it to the prepared peel or baking sheet, making sure the underside of the dough is completely coated with cornmeal, slide the crust onto the grill rack close the lid, cook until lightly browned, 3 to 4 minutes, using a large spatula, flip the crust, spread the lamb mixture on the crust, leaving a 1inch border, sprinkle with feta and pine nuts, close the lid again and grill until the toppings are hot and the bottom of the crust has browned, about 8 minutes

ingredients: for the bars, 1 cup peanut butter, 1 cup maple syrup, or agave nectar or a combination of both, 3 cups quick cooking oats if using old fashioned oats, use 12 cup less, 14 teaspoons salt, , for the optional addins, 18 cups protein powder, 14 cups chopped nuts, 14 cups dried fruit, 14 cups chocolate chips dark works great
directions: in a medium pot, over medium heat, mix peanut butter and syrup heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture begins to bubble and melt down stir in oats, salt, and any other addins that you like press down into a lightly greased 8 x 10 baking dish, and allow to cool and set you can place it in the fridge cut into desired bar shapes and enjoy
input_text: Ingredients: for the bars, 1 cup peanut butter, 1 cup maple syrup, or agave nectar or a combination of both, 3 cups quick cooking oats if using old fashioned oats, use 12 cup less, 14 teaspoons salt, , for the optional addins, 18 cups protein powder, 14 cups chopped nuts, 14 cups dried fruit, 14 cups chocolate chips dark works great
target_text: Directions: in a medium pot, over medium heat, mix peanut butter and syrup heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture begins to bubble and melt down stir in oats, salt, and any other addins that you like press down into a lightly greased 8 x 10 baking dish, and allow to cool and set you can place it in the fridge cut into desired bar shapes and enjoy

ingredients: 180 g dark chocolate couverture nestle plaistowe 63 cocoa couverture, 100 g dark chocolate couverture, melted nestle plaistowe 63 cocoa couverture, 140 g unsalted butter, 3 egg yolks, 3 egg yolks, 85 g caster sugar, 23 cup plain flour, sifted
directions: preheat the oven to 180c and grease eight 175ml dariole moulds, break 40g of the nestle plaistowe 63 cocoa couverture into 5g squares and set aside, place the remaining chocolate with the butter in a heatproof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water dont let the bowl touch the water, when melted, remove from the heat and stir until smooth, cool slightly, place eggs, extra yolks and sugar in the bowl of an electric mixer and beat until pale and thick, pour in melted chocolate, then add flour, using a large metal spoon, stir until mixture is well combined, pour evenly into moulds, push a square of reserved chocolate into the centre of each pudding, ensuring it is completely covered, place moulds on a tray and bake in the oven for 9 minutes, remove moulds from the oven and stand for 1 minute before inverting onto serving plates, serve immediately, drizzled with extra melted chocolate
input_text: Ingredients: 180 g dark chocolate couverture nestle plaistowe 63 cocoa couverture, 100 g dark chocolate couverture, melted nestle plaistowe 63 cocoa couverture, 140 g unsalted butter, 3 egg yolks, 3 egg yolks, 85 g caster sugar, 23 cup plain flour, sifted
target_text: Directions: preheat the oven to 180c and grease eight 175ml dariole moulds, break 40g of the nestle plaistowe 63 cocoa couverture into 5g squares and set aside, place the remaining chocolate with the butter in a heatproof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water dont let the bowl touch the water, when melted, remove from the heat and stir until smooth, cool slightly, place eggs, extra yolks and sugar in the bowl of an electric mixer and beat until pale and thick, pour in melted chocolate, then add flour, using a large metal spoon, stir until mixture is well combined, pour evenly into moulds, push a square of reserved chocolate into the centre of each pudding, ensuring it is completely covered, place moulds on a tray and bake in the oven for 9 minutes, remove moulds from the oven and stand for 1 minute before inverting onto serving plates, serve immediately, drizzled with extra melted chocolate

ingredients: 6 cups flour, 1 pound melted butter, 3 teaspoons baking powder, 2 eggs, 1 cup olive oil, 1 cup milk half, half water, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 egg to brush the tops, sesame seeds
directions: make medium light dough, do not knead much, pinch off portions of dough and fold under hand until 12 inch thick, cut into 4inch long pieces, dip into beaten egg and place on baking sheet, sprinkle sesame seeds over the tops, bake in 400 degree oven until browned
input_text: Ingredients: 6 cups flour, 1 pound melted butter, 3 teaspoons baking powder, 2 eggs, 1 cup olive oil, 1 cup milk half, half water, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 egg to brush the tops, sesame seeds
target_text: Directions: make medium light dough, do not knead much, pinch off portions of dough and fold under hand until 12 inch thick, cut into 4inch long pieces, dip into beaten egg and place on baking sheet, sprinkle sesame seeds over the tops, bake in 400 degree oven until browned

ingredients: 1 medium size zucchini, 1 egg, 13 c milk, flour for dredging, oil for frying, 12 10 oz can italian bread crumbs, 1 14 tsp old bay seasoning more or less to taste
directions: slice zucchini, roll in flour, then roll in milkegg mixture roll in bread crumbbay seasoning mixture, let set 1 hour before frying in canola oil
input_text: Ingredients: 1 medium size zucchini, 1 egg, 13 c milk, flour for dredging, oil for frying, 12 10 oz can italian bread crumbs, 1 14 tsp old bay seasoning more or less to taste
target_text: Directions: slice zucchini, roll in flour, then roll in milkegg mixture roll in bread crumbbay seasoning mixture, let set 1 hour before frying in canola oil

ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 tbsp 15 ml pressed garlic, 112 tsp 7 ml dried thyme, 1 tbsp 15 ml cider vinegar, dry white wine about 1c to 2 cups for basting, salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
directions: preheat oven to 325 degrees 175 c, prepare chicken by removing giblets and rinsing and drying it well, using a sharp knife, cut 14 inch deep by about 12 inch long slits all over the whole bird, make lots of slits, this is where the seasonings will enter into the bird, in a small bowl, mix together thyme, garlic, salt, pepper and vinegar and blend it together well, then, with your hands, work the seasoning paste all over the bird and into the slits, place chicken on roasting rack in your roaster pan and roast about 2 hours, basting often with the white wine and any of the juices and seasongs that drip into the roasting pan, the bird will turn a beautiful golden color, if the chicken has cooked properly, it should be running with wonderful juices as you carve, dip or drizzle each slice of carved meat in the basting juices from the pan before placing on serving platter or plates
input_text: Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 tbsp 15 ml pressed garlic, 112 tsp 7 ml dried thyme, 1 tbsp 15 ml cider vinegar, dry white wine about 1c to 2 cups for basting, salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 325 degrees 175 c, prepare chicken by removing giblets and rinsing and drying it well, using a sharp knife, cut 14 inch deep by about 12 inch long slits all over the whole bird, make lots of slits, this is where the seasonings will enter into the bird, in a small bowl, mix together thyme, garlic, salt, pepper and vinegar and blend it together well, then, with your hands, work the seasoning paste all over the bird and into the slits, place chicken on roasting rack in your roaster pan and roast about 2 hours, basting often with the white wine and any of the juices and seasongs that drip into the roasting pan, the bird will turn a beautiful golden color, if the chicken has cooked properly, it should be running with wonderful juices as you carve, dip or drizzle each slice of carved meat in the basting juices from the pan before placing on serving platter or plates

ingredients: 12 cup urad dal, 12 moong dal, 1 cup yogurt, spice, to taste cumin and paprika, oil, for frying, 14 cup milk
directions: clean dal, wash and soak in water for 4 hours, blend in blender at medium speed, using the minimum amount of water required to keep paste moving freely, add salt and start heating oil, drop spoonfuls of batter in the hot oil using a large tablespoon, fry until golden brown, drop in water, let it soak until ready to serve, beat yogurt with milk, add spice according to taste, squeeze out water from the vada and add yogurt, serve
input_text: Ingredients: 12 cup urad dal, 12 moong dal, 1 cup yogurt, spice, to taste cumin and paprika, oil, for frying, 14 cup milk
target_text: Directions: clean dal, wash and soak in water for 4 hours, blend in blender at medium speed, using the minimum amount of water required to keep paste moving freely, add salt and start heating oil, drop spoonfuls of batter in the hot oil using a large tablespoon, fry until golden brown, drop in water, let it soak until ready to serve, beat yogurt with milk, add spice according to taste, squeeze out water from the vada and add yogurt, serve

ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 12 c chopped onion, 1 pkg hamburger helper mix, 5 c water, 1 bay leaf, 14 tsp salt, 18 tsp pepper, 1 can whole tomatoes, 1 pkg frozen mixed vegetables
directions: you can put in any kind of vegetables you want but the most common vegetables are corn, green beans and carrots, you can also put in hot peppers, if you want, also can add hamburger

ingredients: 3 strips bacon, fried and crumbled, 1 small onion, 1 8 oz can water chestnuts, 1 lb can green beans, 2 tsp cornstarch, 14 tsp salt, 14 tsp dry mustard, 1 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp vinegar
directions: fry bacon reserve fat, brown onion and water chestnuts in hot bacon fat, drain green beans save 12 cup liquid mix with remaining ingredients and add to onion in skillet, cook, stirring until boiling, add green beans to rest of ingredients and heat, garnish with crumbled bacon
input_text: Ingredients: 3 strips bacon, fried and crumbled, 1 small onion, 1 8 oz can water chestnuts, 1 lb can green beans, 2 tsp cornstarch, 14 tsp salt, 14 tsp dry mustard, 1 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp vinegar

ingredients: 700 g squash, diced, 4 tablespoons canola oil, 150 g potatoes, diced, 3 stalks celery, in slices, 1 tablespoon minced ginger, 1 tablespoon ground turmeric, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, 12 teaspoon ground cardamom, 2 tablespoons dried cilantro, 12 lemon, juice of, 250 ml water
directions: heat oil and fry ginger, cardamom and optionally 1 cloves and medium heat until the spices are fragrant, add squash, celery and potato, add ground spices optional spices nutmegand fry for 2 minutes, add water, bring to a boil, then simmer at low heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, for a creamier curry you can add 50 g of soy cream
input_text: Ingredients: 700 g squash, diced, 4 tablespoons canola oil, 150 g potatoes, diced, 3 stalks celery, in slices, 1 tablespoon minced ginger, 1 tablespoon ground turmeric, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, 12 teaspoon ground cardamom, 2 tablespoons dried cilantro, 12 lemon, juice of, 250 ml water
target_text: Directions: heat oil and fry ginger, cardamom and optionally 1 cloves and medium heat until the spices are fragrant, add squash, celery and potato, add ground spices optional spices nutmegand fry for 2 minutes, add water, bring to a boil, then simmer at low heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, for a creamier curry you can add 50 g of soy cream

ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, 30 ounces ragu sauce, 1 12 cups water, 12 ounces mozzarella cheese, shredded, 15 ounces cottage or ricotta cheese, 12 cup parmesan cheese, 2 eggs, 8 ounces lasagne noodles
directions: brown ground beef drain combine with sauce and water in large saucepan and simmer for 10 minutes meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine cheeses and egg set aside, in a 9 x 13 inch pan, pour 1 12 cup sauce place one layer of uncooked noodles then alternately layer 1 cup sauce, 12 cheese mixture, and noodles top with remaining sauce cover with foil and bake 375 degrees for 45 minutes uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes
input_text: Ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, 30 ounces ragu sauce, 1 12 cups water, 12 ounces mozzarella cheese, shredded, 15 ounces cottage or ricotta cheese, 12 cup parmesan cheese, 2 eggs, 8 ounces lasagne noodles
target_text: Directions: brown ground beef drain combine with sauce and water in large saucepan and simmer for 10 minutes meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine cheeses and egg set aside, in a 9 x 13 inch pan, pour 1 12 cup sauce place one layer of uncooked noodles then alternately layer 1 cup sauce, 12 cheese mixture, and noodles top with remaining sauce cover with foil and bake 375 degrees for 45 minutes uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes

ingredients: 2 c sugar, 3 c allpurpose flour, 1 c nuts, 2 c zucchini or apple seeded and grated, 1 c cooking oil, 3 eggs, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp baking powder, 14 tsp salt, 2 tsp vanilla extract, 1 tsp almond extract may be added
directions: mix and bake in two loaf pans greased and floured at 350u00b0 for 1 hour or test with toothpick until it comes out clean serve hot
input_text: Ingredients: 2 c sugar, 3 c allpurpose flour, 1 c nuts, 2 c zucchini or apple seeded and grated, 1 c cooking oil, 3 eggs, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp baking powder, 14 tsp salt, 2 tsp vanilla extract, 1 tsp almond extract may be added
target_text: Directions: mix and bake in two loaf pans greased and floured at 350u00b0 for 1 hour or test with toothpick until it comes out clean serve hot

ingredients: 8 ounces mixed wild mushrooms, 4 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives, salt, pepper, 8 eggs
directions: clean the mushrooms, melt 2 t butter in a frying pan over high heat add the mushrooms and saute, stirring often, until they are tender and all the liquid they release has evaporated, 57 minutes, stir in the parsley and chives and season with salt and pepper the mushrooms can be cooked an hour or two ahead and left at room temperature, if necessary, warm the cooked mushrooms, to scramble the eggs, whisk them in a bowl with salt and pepper, melt the remaining 2 t butter in a heavy saucepan over low heat, add the eggs and cook, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, until they begin to thicken this should take at least 5 minutes, continue stirring, lifting the pan from the heat as necessary so the eggs thicken smoothly and form quite small curds, in france, scrambled eggs are served soft, but you may prefer them almost set, when cooked to your taste, stir in the mushrooms, taste, adjust the seasoning, and serve at once on warmed plates, serve the eggs with crusty country bread or on a slice of toast
input_text: Ingredients: 8 ounces mixed wild mushrooms, 4 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives, salt, pepper, 8 eggs

ingredients: 2 23 c chopped pretzels, 1 stick oleo, 12 oz cream cheese, 1 14 c sugar, 1 large box frozen strawberries 16 oz, 34 large carton cool whip, 1 large strawberry jello, 2 c pineapple juice
directions: mix pretzels and oleo together, press in dish, bake 10 minutes at 400u00b0

ingredients: 2 cans fruit juicy red hawaiian punch, 2 liter bottle ginger ale, 1 qt sherbet, fruit cocktail in juice or fresh fruit optional
directions: add fruit punch to fruit, top with some sherbet, then add the ginger ale for the foamy look

ingredients: 250 g linguine, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon garlic, minced, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 800 g can tomatoes, drained, 14 cup white wine, 2 teaspoons sugar, 1 tablespoon fresh basil, 12 teaspoon chili, 500 g seafood, mix available at your deli
directions: cook and drain pasta, keep hot, heat oil, add onion and garlic and cook until soft, stir in tomatoes, wine, sugar, chilli and basil, bring to the boil, lower heat and cook 15 minutes, stir in seafood and cook an additional 15 minutes, add pasta and heat through
input_text: Ingredients: 250 g linguine, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon garlic, minced, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 800 g can tomatoes, drained, 14 cup white wine, 2 teaspoons sugar, 1 tablespoon fresh basil, 12 teaspoon chili, 500 g seafood, mix available at your deli
target_text: Directions: cook and drain pasta, keep hot, heat oil, add onion and garlic and cook until soft, stir in tomatoes, wine, sugar, chilli and basil, bring to the boil, lower heat and cook 15 minutes, stir in seafood and cook an additional 15 minutes, add pasta and heat through

ingredients: 12 c crisco shortening, 1 12 c sugar, 2 eggs, 2 12 c allpurpose flour, 1 scant tsp salt, 2 12 oz red food coloring, 1 tsp vanilla flavoring, 1 tsp soda, 1 tbsp cocoa, 1 c buttermilk, 1 tsp vinegar
directions: cream crisco, sugar and eggs together, in a separate bowl, make a paste of food coloring and cocoa, add to the first mixture, add vanilla to buttermilk, salt and flour, add this to the first mixture, beat 2 minutes at high speed, add vinegar and soda stir gently, bake in 2 layer pans at 350u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes
input_text: Ingredients: 12 c crisco shortening, 1 12 c sugar, 2 eggs, 2 12 c allpurpose flour, 1 scant tsp salt, 2 12 oz red food coloring, 1 tsp vanilla flavoring, 1 tsp soda, 1 tbsp cocoa, 1 c buttermilk, 1 tsp vinegar
target_text: Directions: cream crisco, sugar and eggs together, in a separate bowl, make a paste of food coloring and cocoa, add to the first mixture, add vanilla to buttermilk, salt and flour, add this to the first mixture, beat 2 minutes at high speed, add vinegar and soda stir gently, bake in 2 layer pans at 350u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes

ingredients: 1 lb rotini pasta, cooked,drained,and cooled, 2 unpeeled cucumbers, chopped, 2 bunches green onions, sliced thin, 2 tablespoons parsley flakes, 2 teaspoons pepper, 1 14 cups cider vinegar, 34 cup salad oil, 1 cup sugar
directions: mix cooked rotini with cucumbers, onions, parsley and pepper, mix together cider vinegar, salad oil sugar, pour over rotini mixture and stir completely, refrigerate at least 4 hours, best if set overnight
input_text: Ingredients: 1 lb rotini pasta, cooked,drained,and cooled, 2 unpeeled cucumbers, chopped, 2 bunches green onions, sliced thin, 2 tablespoons parsley flakes, 2 teaspoons pepper, 1 14 cups cider vinegar, 34 cup salad oil, 1 cup sugar
target_text: Directions: mix cooked rotini with cucumbers, onions, parsley and pepper, mix together cider vinegar, salad oil sugar, pour over rotini mixture and stir completely, refrigerate at least 4 hours, best if set overnight

ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 large onions, chopped about 1 12 pounds total, 12 garlic cloves, chopped, 7 tablespoons new mexico chili powder, 1 12 tablespoons ground cumin, 14 cups or more water, 1 12 pounds dried black beans, rinsed, 2 12 teaspoons dried oregano preferably mexican, 1 12 teaspoons finely grated orange peel, 1 12 teaspoons minced canned chipotle chiles in adobo, 6 fresh poblano chiles, 1 cup finely chopped white onion, 1 7ounce can salsa verde, 2 cups sour cream, 2 teaspoons minced canned chipotle chiles in adobo, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 pounds countrystyle boneless pork ribs, cut into 34inch cubes, 12 cup lowsalt chicken broth, 112 cups chopped fresh cilantro, 4 teaspoons cumin seeds, toasted, grated hot pepper monterey jack cheese
directions: heat olive oil in heavy large pot over medium heat, add chopped onions and garlic and cook until onions are translucent, stirring often, about 8 minutes, add chili powder and ground cumin and stir 1 minute, add 14 cups water, black beans, dried oregano, and grated orange peel, bring mixture to boil reduce heat to mediumlow, cover with lid slightly ajar, and simmer until black beans are tender, about 2 hours, add chipotle chiles and season chili to taste with salt, simmer until black beans are creamy, mashing coarsely with potato masher to desired consistency, adding more water by 12 cupfuls if too thick, and stirring frequently, about 30 minutes longer, season chili to taste with more salt, do ahead chili can be made 3 days ahead, refrigerate uncovered until cold, then cover and keep chilled, char poblano chiles over gas flame or in broiler until blackened on all sides, place in large bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let stand until cool enough to handle, about 20 minutes, peel, seed, and chop chiles, place chiles in medium bowl, add onion and salsa verde, season to taste with salt and pepper, do ahead can be made 2 days ahead, cover and refrigerate, stir sour cream and minced chipotle chiles in medium bowl, cover and refrigerate, heat oil in heavy large skillet over high heat, sprinkle pork ribs with salt and pepper, working in batches, add pork ribs to skillet and cook until browned, about 7 minutes per batch, transfer pork ribs to medium bowl, return all pork ribs and any juices to skillet, add chicken broth, cover, and reduce heat to low, cook until pork is tender, stirring occasionally, about 40 minutes, transfer to another medium bowl, meanwhile, rewarm chili, stir cilantro and cumin seeds into salsa, divide chili among bowls, top with pork, salsa, chipotle crema, and cheese, new mexico chili powder can be found at specialty foods stores and at latin markets, canned chipotle chiles in adobo and fresh poblano chiles sometimes called pasilla chiles can be found at some supermarkets and at specialty foods stores and latin markets
