and slide mixure back into skillet and cook the other side for 6 minutes, turn out onto serving platter and cut into wedges and serve warm, 1 pound dried spaghetti, 14 cup olive oil, 1 14 cups mixed olives, pitted and halved, 12 tablespoon red pepper flakes, plus more if desired, 3 cups tomato sauce, recipe follows, 12 cup grated parmesan, 12 cup basil leaves, shredded, in a large pot, bring 6 quarts of salted water to a boil, when water comes to a boil, add pasta, stirring constantly for the first minute to help prevent spaghetti from sticking together, cook until al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes, in a large saute pan, heat oil, when almost smoking, add olives and red pepper flakes, saute for 3 minutes over medium high heat, reduce heat to low and carefully pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes, drain pasta in a colander, reserving 14 cup pasta water, add pasta to the sauce and toss to coat completely, add pasta water if you need to thin out the sauce a bit, plate pasta and sprinkle with parmesan cheese and basil, 12 cup extravirgin olive oil, 1 small onion, chopped, 2 cloves garlic, chopped, 1 stalk celery, chopped, 1 carrot, chopped, sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, 2 32ounce cans crushed tomatoes, 2 dried bay leaves, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, optional, in a large casserole pot, heat oil over medium high heat, add onion and garlic and saute until soft and translucent, about 5 to 10 minutes, add celery and carrots and season with salt and pepper, saute until all the vegetables are soft, about 5 to 10 minutes, add tomatoes and bay leaves and simmer uncovered on low heat for 1 hour or until thick, remove bay leaves and check for seasoning, if sauce still tastes acidic, add unsalted butter, 1 tablespoon at a time to round out the flavors, add 12 the tomato sauce into the bowl of a food processor, process until smooth, continue with remaining tomato sauce, if not using all the sauce, allow it to cool completely and pour 1 to 2 cup portions into freezer plastic bags, this will freeze up to 6 months

ingredients: 3 ripe bananas  mashed, 12 cup shortening, 1 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups flour, 1 tsp baking soda, 12 tsp salt, 12 cup peacans, chopped
directions: cream together shortening, sugar and eggs add bananas and mix well slowly add in rest of ingredients grease bread pan bake for 1 hour at 300 or until done
input_text: Ingredients: 3 ripe bananas  mashed, 12 cup shortening, 1 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups flour, 1 tsp baking soda, 12 tsp salt, 12 cup peacans, chopped
target_text: Directions: cream together shortening, sugar and eggs add bananas and mix well slowly add in rest of ingredients grease bread pan bake for 1 hour at 300 or until done

ingredients: 1 pkg pitted dates, 1 stick butter, 1 c grated cheese, toasted pecans, 1 12 c flour, salt and red pepper
directions: stuff dates with nuts, make pastry with other ingredients roll pastry thin and cut with small biscuit cutter, wrap pastry around dates, press edges together, bake in 375u00b0 oven 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown
input_text: Ingredients: 1 pkg pitted dates, 1 stick butter, 1 c grated cheese, toasted pecans, 1 12 c flour, salt and red pepper
target_text: Directions: stuff dates with nuts, make pastry with other ingredients roll pastry thin and cut with small biscuit cutter, wrap pastry around dates, press edges together, bake in 375u00b0 oven 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown

ingredients: 12 tsp dill weed, 14 tsp garlic salt, 14 tsp lemon pepper, 1 pkg hidden valley ranch dressing mix, 34 c oil, 1 lb oyster crackers
directions: in a fairly large bowl, mix all the spices with the oil add oyster crackers and stir well spread out in jelly roll or other large pan with sides bake at 250u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring a couple of times cool and eat
input_text: Ingredients: 12 tsp dill weed, 14 tsp garlic salt, 14 tsp lemon pepper, 1 pkg hidden valley ranch dressing mix, 34 c oil, 1 lb oyster crackers
target_text: Directions: in a fairly large bowl, mix all the spices with the oil add oyster crackers and stir well spread out in jelly roll or other large pan with sides bake at 250u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring a couple of times cool and eat

ingredients: 14 cup bulgur, 6 tsp olive oil, 24 oz cremini mushrooms, quartered about 8 cups, 4 mediumsized leeks, sliced 3 cups, 12 cup chopped green onions, 12 cup chopped fresh dill, 12 cup chopped fresh parsley, 2 tbs fresh lemon juice, 24 sheets phyllo dough about 10 oz, thawed according to package directions, 2 tsp poppy seeds
directions: to make filling, put bulgur in medium bowl, and cover with 1 cup boiling water, let soak until most of water is absorbed, about 15 minutes, drain, and press out excess moisture, meanwhile, heat 2 tsp, oil in large skillet over mediumhigh heat, add half of mushrooms, and cook, stirring occasionally, 4 to 6 minutes, or until tender and browned, transfer to large bowl, add 2 tsp, oil to skillet, and repeat with remaining mushrooms, add remaining 2 tsp, oil to skillet, and reduce heat to mediumlow, add leeks, and cook, stirring often, 3 to 5 minutes, or until tender, transfer to bowl of mushrooms, add bulgur, green onions, dill, parsley, lemon juice, and salt and pepper to taste to mushroom mixture toss well, let cool completely, preheat oven to 375f if not making strudels ahead of time, line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper, or coat with cooking spray, to make strudels, unroll phyllo sheets onto clean, dry surface, cover with plastic wrap and damp kitchen towel, carefully lift one sheet of phyllo, and place on sheet of wax paper, coat lightly with cooking spray, layer another 5 sheets of phyllo on top, lightly coating each with cooking spray, cut stack in half to make 2 squares, keep phyllo stack covered while assembling individual strudels, place about 23 cup filling in center of one phyllo square, bring 4 corners together, then press firmly along seams to seal, lightly coat with cooking spray, and sprinkle with poppy seeds, place strudel on prepared baking sheet, repeat to make 8 strudels, if doing ahead, tightly cover strudels with plastic wrap, and refrigerate, bake 35 to 40 minutes, or until golden and crisp, to serve, pool madeiramushroom sauce on plates, and place strudels in centers of sauce
input_text: Ingredients: 14 cup bulgur, 6 tsp olive oil, 24 oz cremini mushrooms, quartered about 8 cups, 4 mediumsized leeks, sliced 3 cups, 12 cup chopped green onions, 12 cup chopped fresh dill, 12 cup chopped fresh parsley, 2 tbs fresh lemon juice, 24 sheets phyllo dough about 10 oz, thawed according to package directions, 2 tsp poppy seeds
target_text: Directions: to make filling, put bulgur in medium bowl, and cover with 1 cup boiling water, let soak until most of water is absorbed, about 15 minutes, drain, and press out excess moisture, meanwhile, heat 2 tsp, oil in large skillet over mediumhigh heat, add half of mushrooms, and cook, stirring occasionally, 4 to 6 minutes, or until tender and browned, transfer to large bowl, add 2 tsp, oil to skillet, and repeat with remaining mushrooms, add remaining 2 tsp, oil to skillet, and reduce heat to mediumlow, add leeks, and cook, stirring often, 3 to 5 minutes, or until tender, transfer to bowl of mushrooms, add bulgur, green onions, dill, parsley, lemon juice, and salt and pepper to taste to mushroom mixture toss well, let cool completely, preheat oven to 375f if not making strudels ahead of time, line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper, or coat with cooking spray, to make strudels, unroll phyllo sheets onto clean, dry surface, cover with plastic wrap and damp kitchen towel, carefully lift one sheet of phyllo, and place on sheet of wax paper, coat lightly with cooking spray, layer another 5 sheets of phyllo on top, lightly coating each with cooking spray, cut stack in half to make 2 squares, keep phyllo stack covered while assembling individual strudels, place about 23 cup filling in center of one phyllo square, bring 4 corners together, then press firmly along seams to seal, lightly coat with cooking spray, and sprinkle with poppy seeds, place strudel on prepared baking sheet, repeat to make 8 strudels, if doing ahead, tightly cover strudels with plastic wrap, and refrigerate, bake 35 to 40 minutes, or until golden and crisp, to serve, pool madeiramushroom sauce on plates, and place strudels in centers of sauce

ingredients: 2 tbsp melted butter or margarine, 1 slightly beaten egg, 12 c milk, 1 can whole corn, 1 can creamed corn, 1 c bisquick, 12 to 1 lb monterey jack cheese, grated
directions: melt butter in large baking dish 9 x 13inch, spread over bottom and halfway up sides, while oven is preheating to 350u00b0
input_text: Ingredients: 2 tbsp melted butter or margarine, 1 slightly beaten egg, 12 c milk, 1 can whole corn, 1 can creamed corn, 1 c bisquick, 12 to 1 lb monterey jack cheese, grated
target_text: Directions: melt butter in large baking dish 9 x 13inch, spread over bottom and halfway up sides, while oven is preheating to 350u00b0

ingredients: 1 small pkg lime jello, 1 3 oz cream cheese, 80 miniature marshmallows, 1 c boiling water juice, 1 can crushed pineapple, 14 c water, 12 c nuts, 12 pt whipped cream
directions: combine and mash jello and cream cheese, mash in marshmallows, then add water add and mix pineapple, water and nuts, refrigerate until thick, whip cream until thick and fold into mixture, refrigerate until firm
input_text: Ingredients: 1 small pkg lime jello, 1 3 oz cream cheese, 80 miniature marshmallows, 1 c boiling water juice, 1 can crushed pineapple, 14 c water, 12 c nuts, 12 pt whipped cream
target_text: Directions: combine and mash jello and cream cheese, mash in marshmallows, then add water add and mix pineapple, water and nuts, refrigerate until thick, whip cream until thick and fold into mixture, refrigerate until firm

ingredients: 1 8 oz container mascarpone cheese, 34 cup heavy cream, 14 cup kahlua, 1 7 oz package italianstyle crunchy ladyfingers savoiardi, 1 12 cups pelican tsunami stout beer or other nonhoppy stout beer, 1 tablespoon cocoa powder
directions: line a 5 by 9in loaf pan with plastic wrap, leaving at least a 1in overhang on all sides combine mascarpone, cream, and kahlua and beat on low speed, then medium, until mixture is thick enough to spread do not overbeat, set 1 ladyfinger cookie vertically against a long edge of loaf pan and trim it flush with rim of pan use it as a guide to trim 12 more cookies, reserving trimmed ends soak 1 ladyfinger at a time in beer, about 1 second per side then arrange in rows along the long sides of pan, picket fencestyle arrange 4 ladyfingers lengthwise on bottom of pan, spoon half the mascarpone mixture over bottom layer of ladyfingers and smooth evenly top with another layer of soaked ladyfingers using reserved trimmed ends first, then top with remaining mascarpone mixture, smoothing evenly sift cocoa over top of cream wrap beeramisu and chill at least 8 hours and up to, to serve, use plastic wrap to lift cake out of the loaf pan unwrap and slice crosswise dust each slice with additional cocoa, if you like, note nutritional analysis is per serving
input_text: Ingredients: 1 8 oz container mascarpone cheese, 34 cup heavy cream, 14 cup kahlua, 1 7 oz package italianstyle crunchy ladyfingers savoiardi, 1 12 cups pelican tsunami stout beer or other nonhoppy stout beer, 1 tablespoon cocoa powder
target_text: Directions: line a 5 by 9in loaf pan with plastic wrap, leaving at least a 1in overhang on all sides combine mascarpone, cream, and kahlua and beat on low speed, then medium, until mixture is thick enough to spread do not overbeat, set 1 ladyfinger cookie vertically against a long edge of loaf pan and trim it flush with rim of pan use it as a guide to trim 12 more cookies, reserving trimmed ends soak 1 ladyfinger at a time in beer, about 1 second per side then arrange in rows along the long sides of pan, picket fencestyle arrange 4 ladyfingers lengthwise on bottom of pan, spoon half the mascarpone mixture over bottom layer of ladyfingers and smooth evenly top with another layer of soaked ladyfingers using reserved trimmed ends first, then top with remaining mascarpone mixture, smoothing evenly sift cocoa over top of cream wrap beeramisu and chill at least 8 hours and up to, to serve, use plastic wrap to lift cake out of the loaf pan unwrap and slice crosswise dust each slice with additional cocoa, if you like, note nutritional analysis is per serving

ingredients: 1 12 lb stew meat, cubed, 1 medium onion, sliced, 3 stalks celery, sliced, 4 carrots, sliced, 6 potatoes, cubed, 1 8 oz can tomato sauce, 1 can water
directions: use 2 12quart or larger casserole dish, place uncooked meat in bottom, season to taste, then layer the vegetables as listed except potatoes, pour tomato sauce and water, cover and bake 3 hours at 350u00b0, remove from oven, add potatoes, cover and bake 45 minutes more
input_text: Ingredients: 1 12 lb stew meat, cubed, 1 medium onion, sliced, 3 stalks celery, sliced, 4 carrots, sliced, 6 potatoes, cubed, 1 8 oz can tomato sauce, 1 can water
target_text: Directions: use 2 12quart or larger casserole dish, place uncooked meat in bottom, season to taste, then layer the vegetables as listed except potatoes, pour tomato sauce and water, cover and bake 3 hours at 350u00b0, remove from oven, add potatoes, cover and bake 45 minutes more

ingredients: 3 c minute oats, 23 c peanut butter, 5 tbsp cocoa, 1 tsp vanilla, 2 c sugar, 12 c milk, 13 c butter
directions: combine sugar, milk and butter, bring to a boil, boil for 1 minute, take off heat and add other ingredients, mix well, put spoonfuls on a sheet of wax paper, let cool
input_text: Ingredients: 3 c minute oats, 23 c peanut butter, 5 tbsp cocoa, 1 tsp vanilla, 2 c sugar, 12 c milk, 13 c butter
target_text: Directions: combine sugar, milk and butter, bring to a boil, boil for 1 minute, take off heat and add other ingredients, mix well, put spoonfuls on a sheet of wax paper, let cool

ingredients: 1 chicken  boiled, deboned  chopped use about 5 chicken breast, 1 c cooked rice, 1 c diced celery, 3 tbsp diced onion, 1 8 12 oz can water chestnuts, drained  sliced, 12 c mayonnaise, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 tsp flavor enhancer accent, 14 c corn oil, 12 stick margarine, melted, 1 pkg ritz crackers, crushed, 14 c slivered almonds
directions: in large bowl mix rice, celery, onion, chestnuts, almonds, mayonnaise, soup, flavor enhancer, corn oil, adding chicken last, stir gently, spoon into 9 x 13 casserole dish, mix together ritz crackers and margarine and sprinkle over top of chicken mixture bake at 350u00b0 for 45 minutes or until golden brown
input_text: Ingredients: 1 chicken  boiled, deboned  chopped use about 5 chicken breast, 1 c cooked rice, 1 c diced celery, 3 tbsp diced onion, 1 8 12 oz can water chestnuts, drained  sliced, 12 c mayonnaise, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 tsp flavor enhancer accent, 14 c corn oil, 12 stick margarine, melted, 1 pkg ritz crackers, crushed, 14 c slivered almonds
target_text: Directions: in large bowl mix rice, celery, onion, chestnuts, almonds, mayonnaise, soup, flavor enhancer, corn oil, adding chicken last, stir gently, spoon into 9 x 13 casserole dish, mix together ritz crackers and margarine and sprinkle over top of chicken mixture bake at 350u00b0 for 45 minutes or until golden brown

ingredients: 3 cups flour, 13 cup sugar, 1 cup 2 sticks butter, slightly softened, 1 egg yolk, 3 to 6 tablespoons heavy cream or cold water, 1 cup whole almonds, blanched, 34 cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar, 34 cup 1 12 sticks butter, cut into 12 pieces and slightly softened, 4 eggs, 14 cup flour, 1 tablespoon brandy or orange liqueur, plus more for brushing, 14 to 13 cup plum or raspberry jam, about 8 firm but ripe plums, halved and pitted
directions: to make the dough, combine the flour, sugar, and butter in the bowl of a food processor pulse until the butter resembles coarse crumbs add the yolk and process until combined add the cream, a little at a time, and process until the dough just comes together transfer to a lightly floured board and gently knead to bring it together divide the dough into 2 disks, wrapping both in plastic, and freeze one for another use chill the other disk for 30 minutes before rolling out, roll the dough disk into a 12inch circle on a lightly floured board carefully transfer to a 9 or 10inch tart pan with a removable bottom, pressing any remaining bits and pieces into the edge so that it is a little thicker on the sides dont worry if the dough breaks as you transfer it simply press the remaining dough into the pan, andor patch the torn areas with scraps prick the bottom with a fork freeze the shell, meanwhile, to make the filling, grind the almonds with the 2 tablespoons sugar in a food processor until medium fine you still want to see and feel the texture beat the remaining 34 cup sugar with the butter in a stand mixer beat in the eggs, one at a time, until just blended beat in the ground almonds, flour, and brandy chill the filling long enough for it to firm up just a bit, about 20 minutes, preheat the oven to 350u00b0f, spread a thin layer of jam a scant 14 cup or so on the bottom of the uncooked tart shell and spread the almond filling over the top gently push the plum halves, cut side up, into the filling brush the plums with a little brandy bake for 50 to 60 minutes, until the filling is golden brown and set in the middle cool on a rack before carefully removing the tart from the pan warm any remaining jam with a little water to make a thin glaze and brush over the tart before serving
input_text: Ingredients: 3 cups flour, 13 cup sugar, 1 cup 2 sticks butter, slightly softened, 1 egg yolk, 3 to 6 tablespoons heavy cream or cold water, 1 cup whole almonds, blanched, 34 cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar, 34 cup 1 12 sticks butter, cut into 12 pieces and slightly softened, 4 eggs, 14 cup flour, 1 tablespoon brandy or orange liqueur, plus more for brushing, 14 to 13 cup plum or raspberry jam, about 8 firm but ripe plums, halved and pitted
target_text: Directions: to make the dough, combine the flour, sugar, and butter in the bowl of a food processor pulse until the butter resembles coarse crumbs add the yolk and process until combined add the cream, a little at a time, and process until the dough just comes together transfer to a lightly floured board and gently knead to bring it together divide the dough into 2 disks, wrapping both in plastic, and freeze one for another use chill the other disk for 30 minutes before rolling out, roll the dough disk into a 12inch circle on a lightly floured board carefully transfer to a 9 or 10inch tart pan with a removable bottom, pressing any remaining bits and pieces into the edge so that it is a little thicker on the sides dont worry if the dough breaks as you transfer it simply press the remaining dough into the pan, andor patch the torn areas with scraps prick the bottom with a fork freeze the shell, meanwhile, to make the filling, grind the almonds with the 2 tablespoons sugar in a food processor until medium fine you still want to see and feel the texture beat the remaining 34 cup sugar with the butter in a stand mixer beat in the eggs, one at a time, until just blended beat in the ground almonds, flour, and brandy chill the filling long enough for it to firm up just a bit, about 20 minutes, preheat the oven to 350u00b0f, spread a thin layer of jam a scant 14 cup or so on the bottom of the uncooked tart shell and spread the almond filling over the top gently push the plum halves, cut side up, into the filling brush the plums with a little brandy bake for 50 to 60 minutes, until the filling is golden brown and set in the middle cool on a rack before carefully removing the tart from the pan warm any remaining jam with a little water to make a thin glaze and brush over the tart before serving

ingredients: 2 c baking mix, 23 c milk
directions: mix until soft dough forms, drop by spoonfuls onto hot meat or vegetables in boiling stew, do not drop onto liquid, cook over low heat, uncovered, for 10 minutes, cover and cook 10 minutes longer, yields 10 to 12 dumplings

target_text: Directions: mix until soft dough forms, drop by spoonfuls onto hot meat or vegetables in boiling stew, do not drop onto liquid, cook over low heat, uncovered, for 10 minutes, cover and cook 10 minutes longer, yields 10 to 12 dumplings

ingredients: 2 tbsp margarine, 1 tbsp parsley, 2 tbsp chopped onion, 1 lb carrots, cleaned and sliced, 1 can beef consomme, dash of nutmeg
directions: saute parsley and onion in margarine for 5 minutes, add carrots, beef consomme and nutmeg, cook 15 minutes uncovered, then 15 minutes covered
input_text: Ingredients: 2 tbsp margarine, 1 tbsp parsley, 2 tbsp chopped onion, 1 lb carrots, cleaned and sliced, 1 can beef consomme, dash of nutmeg

ingredients: 1 green pepper, cut into strips, 1 carrot, shredded, 1 onion, chopped, 2 celery stalks, sliced thinly, 1 lb beef, sliced into thin strips, 12 tsp garlic powder, 14 tsp ground cumin, 2 tbsp sherry, 13 c soya sauce, 1 c stock, 2 tsp cornstarch
directions: brown up the meat in frying pan, add the vegetables and everything except the stock and starch, cover and simmer until the vegetables are done
input_text: Ingredients: 1 green pepper, cut into strips, 1 carrot, shredded, 1 onion, chopped, 2 celery stalks, sliced thinly, 1 lb beef, sliced into thin strips, 12 tsp garlic powder, 14 tsp ground cumin, 2 tbsp sherry, 13 c soya sauce, 1 c stock, 2 tsp cornstarch
target_text: Directions: brown up the meat in frying pan, add the vegetables and everything except the stock and starch, cover and simmer until the vegetables are done

ingredients: 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, at room temperature, 1 tablespoon dry grated parmesan cheese, 4 slices wholewheat sandwich bread, 4 slices processed cheese about 14 lb, 4 slices swiss cheese
directions: in a small bowl, blend butter and parmesan, arrange bread in sandwich pairs, spread butter mixture on tops and bottoms of pairs, place 2 slices, buttered sides down, on work surface, top each with 1 slice processed cheese, then 2 slices swiss cheese, then 1 slice processed cheese, top each with a bread slice buttered slice up, using spatula, transfer sandwiches to skillet, heat until bottoms are golden brown and cheeses start to melt, 34 minutes, flip, press down gently with spatula, heat until bottoms are golden brown and cheeses have melted, cut each sandwich into 2 triangles
input_text: Ingredients: 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, at room temperature, 1 tablespoon dry grated parmesan cheese, 4 slices wholewheat sandwich bread, 4 slices processed cheese about 14 lb, 4 slices swiss cheese
target_text: Directions: in a small bowl, blend butter and parmesan, arrange bread in sandwich pairs, spread butter mixture on tops and bottoms of pairs, place 2 slices, buttered sides down, on work surface, top each with 1 slice processed cheese, then 2 slices swiss cheese, then 1 slice processed cheese, top each with a bread slice buttered slice up, using spatula, transfer sandwiches to skillet, heat until bottoms are golden brown and cheeses start to melt, 34 minutes, flip, press down gently with spatula, heat until bottoms are golden brown and cheeses have melted, cut each sandwich into 2 triangles

ingredients: 3 tablespoons butter or 3 tablespoons margarine, 10 large marshmallows, 6 cups crispy rice cereal, 12 cup peanut butter, 34 cup chocolate chips
directions: heat butter in a saucepan till melted, add marshmallows and chocolate and heat until almost melted, add peanut butter combine, and remove from heat, stir in rice cereal until coated and pour into a non stick deep pan, allow to cool
input_text: Ingredients: 3 tablespoons butter or 3 tablespoons margarine, 10 large marshmallows, 6 cups crispy rice cereal, 12 cup peanut butter, 34 cup chocolate chips

ingredients: 5 lb ground beef, 2 c chopped onions, 1 c chopped green peppers 2 medium, 9 c 5 pt cooked or canned tomatoes, 4 6 oz cans 2 23 c tomato paste, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 2 tbsp minced parsley, 1 12 tbsp salt, 1 tbsp oregano, 12 tsp pepper, 12 tsp ginger, 12 tsp allspice, 2 tbsp vinegar, 1 pt tomato juice
directions: brown ground beef and onions, add green peppers and cook slowly until tender, add remaining ingredients, simmer until thick enough for serving, skim off excess fat before canning pour hot into jars, leaving 1inch head space, adjust caps process pints 1 hour and quarts for 1 hour and 15 minutes at 10 pounds pressure
input_text: Ingredients: 5 lb ground beef, 2 c chopped onions, 1 c chopped green peppers 2 medium, 9 c 5 pt cooked or canned tomatoes, 4 6 oz cans 2 23 c tomato paste, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 2 tbsp minced parsley, 1 12 tbsp salt, 1 tbsp oregano, 12 tsp pepper, 12 tsp ginger, 12 tsp allspice, 2 tbsp vinegar, 1 pt tomato juice
target_text: Directions: brown ground beef and onions, add green peppers and cook slowly until tender, add remaining ingredients, simmer until thick enough for serving, skim off excess fat before canning pour hot into jars, leaving 1inch head space, adjust caps process pints 1 hour and quarts for 1 hour and 15 minutes at 10 pounds pressure

ingredients: 1 cup granulated sugar, 2 cups water, 2 tablespoons rum
directions: my favorite method is to poke each layer with a toothpick all over the top, then pour the syrup on top, in a saucepan dissolve the sugar with the water, bring to a boil, cover and remove from heat, let the syrup cool to room temperature, add the 2tablespoons of rum and stir, allow it to set up well before finishing the cake this will take about 2 hours
input_text: Ingredients: 1 cup granulated sugar, 2 cups water, 2 tablespoons rum

ingredients: 2 c sugar, 1 c white vinegar, 1 14 tbsp salt, 12 c water
directions: heat the sugar, water and salt almost to boiling, take off stove and add vinegar, cool, add to shredded cabbage as needed keeps well in the refrigerator

target_text: Directions: heat the sugar, water and salt almost to boiling, take off stove and add vinegar, cool, add to shredded cabbage as needed keeps well in the refrigerator

ingredients: 90 pecan halves about 1 12 c, 12 14 oz pkg vanilla caramels about 25, 1 tbsp water, 12 c semisweet chocolate pieces
directions: to toast pecan halves, spread nuts in a single layer in a shallow baking pan, toast the nuts in a 350u00b0 oven about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally

ingredients: 2 pt fresh strawberries, 34 c sugar, 1 envelope gelatin plain, 12 c water, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 1 c whipping cream, whipped
directions: thinly slice 1 12 pints strawberries, reserving 12 pint combine with sugar, set aside until sugar dissolves, soften gelatin in water, stir over low heat until dissolved, combine gelatin, strawberries and lemon juice, fold in whipped cream chill until mixture mounds when dropped from spoon, pour filling into coconut crust, chill at least 4 hours and garnish with remaining strawberries, makes 9inch pie
input_text: Ingredients: 2 pt fresh strawberries, 34 c sugar, 1 envelope gelatin plain, 12 c water, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 1 c whipping cream, whipped
target_text: Directions: thinly slice 1 12 pints strawberries, reserving 12 pint combine with sugar, set aside until sugar dissolves, soften gelatin in water, stir over low heat until dissolved, combine gelatin, strawberries and lemon juice, fold in whipped cream chill until mixture mounds when dropped from spoon, pour filling into coconut crust, chill at least 4 hours and garnish with remaining strawberries, makes 9inch pie

ingredients: 3 c sugar, 1 12 c crisco shortening, 5 eggs, 1 c sweet milk, 1 tsp each vanilla, lemon and coconut flavorings, 3 c allpurpose flour
directions: cream sugar and shortening add eggs one at a time, add flour and milk, add a pinch of salt, add flavorings last, bake 1 12 hours at 325u00b0
input_text: Ingredients: 3 c sugar, 1 12 c crisco shortening, 5 eggs, 1 c sweet milk, 1 tsp each vanilla, lemon and coconut flavorings, 3 c allpurpose flour
target_text: Directions: cream sugar and shortening add eggs one at a time, add flour and milk, add a pinch of salt, add flavorings last, bake 1 12 hours at 325u00b0

ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 lb ground turkey, 2 or more cloves garlic, minced, 1 large onion, chopped, 2 c chicken broth, 2 to 3 tbsp fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 12 tbsp lime juice, 1 12 tbsp ground cumin, 12 tsp dried oregano, 14 tsp salt taste before adding, 1 11 oz can white shoepeg corn undrained, 1 15 to 16 oz can butter beans undrained, 1 15 to 16 oz can cannellini beans undrained, can use great northern beans instead
directions: in a dutch oven, heat 1 tablespoon of oil and brown turkey
input_text: Ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 lb ground turkey, 2 or more cloves garlic, minced, 1 large onion, chopped, 2 c chicken broth, 2 to 3 tbsp fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 12 tbsp lime juice, 1 12 tbsp ground cumin, 12 tsp dried oregano, 14 tsp salt taste before adding, 1 11 oz can white shoepeg corn undrained, 1 15 to 16 oz can butter beans undrained, 1 15 to 16 oz can cannellini beans undrained, can use great northern beans instead
target_text: Directions: in a dutch oven, heat 1 tablespoon of oil and brown turkey

ingredients: 2 slices bacon, chopped, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 3 garlic cloves, finely chopped, 1 shallot, finely chopped, 1 red bell pepper, cored, seeded, finely chopped, 1 jalapeno, cored, seeded, and finely chopped, 5 small okra, stemmed and thinly sliced crosswise, 4 ears corn, shucked, kernels sliced off or 10 ounces frozen corn, 4 scallions, thinly sliced, kosher salt, to taste, fresh ground black pepper, to taste, 16 lge shrimp, peeled, tails on, 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 2 cups steamed white rice, for serving, scallion, cut on the bias, for sprinkling over the rice
directions: in a 12 skillet over mediumhigh heat, cook bacon, stirring occasionally, until crisp, about 7 minutes, using a slotted spoon, transfer bacon to a paper towellined plate set aside, melt 1 tablespoons butter in hot bacon fat, add garlic, shallots, peppers, and jalapenos and cook over mediumhigh heat, stirring occasionally, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes, increase heat to high add okra and corn and cook, stirring occasionally, until crisptender, about 6 minutes, stir in scallions and remaining butter and season with salt and pepper set aside and keep warm, meanwhile, heat oven to broil and place a rack 8 from broiler element, toss shrimp with oil in a large bowl and season with salt and pepper, transfer shrimp in a single layer to an aluminum foillined baking sheet and broil, turning once using tongs, until pink and cooked through, about 4 minutes, serve the maque choux and shrimp on top of a bed of rice garnish with reserved bacon and a sprinkling of scallions
input_text: Ingredients: 2 slices bacon, chopped, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 3 garlic cloves, finely chopped, 1 shallot, finely chopped, 1 red bell pepper, cored, seeded, finely chopped, 1 jalapeno, cored, seeded, and finely chopped, 5 small okra, stemmed and thinly sliced crosswise, 4 ears corn, shucked, kernels sliced off or 10 ounces frozen corn, 4 scallions, thinly sliced, kosher salt, to taste, fresh ground black pepper, to taste, 16 lge shrimp, peeled, tails on, 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 2 cups steamed white rice, for serving, scallion, cut on the bias, for sprinkling over the rice
target_text: Directions: in a 12 skillet over mediumhigh heat, cook bacon, stirring occasionally, until crisp, about 7 minutes, using a slotted spoon, transfer bacon to a paper towellined plate set aside, melt 1 tablespoons butter in hot bacon fat, add garlic, shallots, peppers, and jalapenos and cook over mediumhigh heat, stirring occasionally, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes, increase heat to high add okra and corn and cook, stirring occasionally, until crisptender, about 6 minutes, stir in scallions and remaining butter and season with salt and pepper set aside and keep warm, meanwhile, heat oven to broil and place a rack 8 from broiler element, toss shrimp with oil in a large bowl and season with salt and pepper, transfer shrimp in a single layer to an aluminum foillined baking sheet and broil, turning once using tongs, until pink and cooked through, about 4 minutes, serve the maque choux and shrimp on top of a bed of rice garnish with reserved bacon and a sprinkling of scallions

ingredients: 4 c chopped peeled tomatoes, 1 12 c chopped cucumber, 1 12 c chopped green pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 2 c vegetable broth, 12 c lemon juice, 14 c olive oil, salt
directions: put 1 cup broth into a blender with all the vegetables, work into a thick puree, add the remaining cup of broth, lemon juice and olive oil and salt to taste, let stand and chill at least 3 hours so flavors blend well, serve cold, garnished with bacos, croutons andor tomato and cucumber cubes, good with a second course of beans and rice, or as lunch with a sandwich
input_text: Ingredients: 4 c chopped peeled tomatoes, 1 12 c chopped cucumber, 1 12 c chopped green pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 2 c vegetable broth, 12 c lemon juice, 14 c olive oil, salt

ingredients: 5 tbsp flour, 1 c sugar, 2 15 oz cans chunk pineapple, drained, 3 tbsp pineapple juice, 2 c grated sharp cheese, 1 12 c ritz crackers, crushed, 1 stick margarine, melted
directions: mix first 4 ingredients and place in a greased 8 x 8inch baking dish, top with cheese and cracker crumbs, pour melted margarine over the top, bake at 350u00b0 for 30 minutes or until brown
input_text: Ingredients: 5 tbsp flour, 1 c sugar, 2 15 oz cans chunk pineapple, drained, 3 tbsp pineapple juice, 2 c grated sharp cheese, 1 12 c ritz crackers, crushed, 1 stick margarine, melted
target_text: Directions: mix first 4 ingredients and place in a greased 8 x 8inch baking dish, top with cheese and cracker crumbs, pour melted margarine over the top, bake at 350u00b0 for 30 minutes or until brown

ingredients: 2 medium cucumbers, 1 large tomato, 1 small onion, mayonnaise to taste
directions: cut cucumbers in rounds, dice tomato in medium size pieces chop onion and mix all with enough mayonnaise to make a dressing season to taste with salt, garlic powder and black pepper
input_text: Ingredients: 2 medium cucumbers, 1 large tomato, 1 small onion, mayonnaise to taste
target_text: Directions: cut cucumbers in rounds, dice tomato in medium size pieces chop onion and mix all with enough mayonnaise to make a dressing season to taste with salt, garlic powder and black pepper

ingredients: 1 cup sugar, 1 cup confectioners sugar, 1 cup butter, 1 cup canola oil, 4 12 cups flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cream of tartar, 2 cups pecan pieces, 6 ounces almond brickle chips, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 2 eggs, sugar
directions: in large mixer bowl blend sugar, powdered sugar, butter and oil until mixed well add almond extract and eggs and mix well, lightly spoon flour into measuring cup and level off gradually blend in flour, baking soda, salt and cream of tartar at low speed by hand, stir in pecans and brickle chips, roll large tablespoonful of dough into balls roll balls in sugar and place on ungreased cookie sheet flatten in crisscross pattern with fork, bake at 350u00b0f for 8 minutes do not overbake cool 1 minute before removing from cookie sheet
input_text: Ingredients: 1 cup sugar, 1 cup confectioners sugar, 1 cup butter, 1 cup canola oil, 4 12 cups flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cream of tartar, 2 cups pecan pieces, 6 ounces almond brickle chips, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 2 eggs, sugar
target_text: Directions: in large mixer bowl blend sugar, powdered sugar, butter and oil until mixed well add almond extract and eggs and mix well, lightly spoon flour into measuring cup and level off gradually blend in flour, baking soda, salt and cream of tartar at low speed by hand, stir in pecans and brickle chips, roll large tablespoonful of dough into balls roll balls in sugar and place on ungreased cookie sheet flatten in crisscross pattern with fork, bake at 350u00b0f for 8 minutes do not overbake cool 1 minute before removing from cookie sheet

ingredients: 300 grams peeled shrimp, 13 stalk japanese leek, 20 grams ginger, 1 clove garlic, 1 beaten egg, 14 tsp salt, 1 dash pepper, 1 tsp sake, 1 tbsp egg white, 2 tbsp katakuriko, 1 tbsp vegetable oil, 1 tsp doubanjiang, 5 tbsp tomato ketchup, 200 ml chinese soup stock, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sake, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 dash pepper, 1 katakuriko slurry
directions: finely chop the leek, ginger and garlic, combine the shrimp with the salt, pepper, sake, and egg whites in a bowl, add the katakuriko and oil and mix together, make the combined seasonings, put all the ingredients except for the doubanjiang and katakuriko dissolved in water in a bowl and combine, put a generous amount of oil in a pan and add the shrimp while the oil is still lukewarm, shallowfry the shrimp over high heat, when the shrimp have turned red, drain in a colander or sieve, add a little oil in the pan and stir fry the ginger, garlic and doubanjiang, when its fragrant, add the leek and continue stir frying, add the combined seasonings and bring to a boil, then add the fried shrimp, thicken the sauce with katakuriko dissolved in water, add a beaten egg, stir slowly, and its done
input_text: Ingredients: 300 grams peeled shrimp, 13 stalk japanese leek, 20 grams ginger, 1 clove garlic, 1 beaten egg, 14 tsp salt, 1 dash pepper, 1 tsp sake, 1 tbsp egg white, 2 tbsp katakuriko, 1 tbsp vegetable oil, 1 tsp doubanjiang, 5 tbsp tomato ketchup, 200 ml chinese soup stock, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sake, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 dash pepper, 1 katakuriko slurry
target_text: Directions: finely chop the leek, ginger and garlic, combine the shrimp with the salt, pepper, sake, and egg whites in a bowl, add the katakuriko and oil and mix together, make the combined seasonings, put all the ingredients except for the doubanjiang and katakuriko dissolved in water in a bowl and combine, put a generous amount of oil in a pan and add the shrimp while the oil is still lukewarm, shallowfry the shrimp over high heat, when the shrimp have turned red, drain in a colander or sieve, add a little oil in the pan and stir fry the ginger, garlic and doubanjiang, when its fragrant, add the leek and continue stir frying, add the combined seasonings and bring to a boil, then add the fried shrimp, thicken the sauce with katakuriko dissolved in water, add a beaten egg, stir slowly, and its done

ingredients: 14 pound diced cooked ham or bacon not sugarcured, 1 large yellow onion, sliced, two 9ounce packages frozen cut green beans, thawed, or two 14 12ounce cans cut green beans, rinsed and drained, 1 cup water, 1 cup mayonnaise, 2 hardboiled eggs, chopped, 1 heaping tablespoon prepared horseradish, 1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce, 12 teaspoon garlic salt, 12 teaspoon celery salt, 12 teaspoon onion salt, ground black pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, juice of 1 lemon
directions: combine the meat and onion in a large saucepan over mediumhigh heat, stirring occasionally, cook until the meat is lightly browned and the onion translucent, 2 to 3 minutes, add the beans and water, cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer until the beans are tender, about 20 minutes, meanwhile, combine the mayonnaise, eggs, horseradish, worcestershire sauce, garlic salt, celery salt, onion salt, pepper, parsley, and lemon juice in a bowl, mix well, drain the bean mixture, put on a serving plate, and spoon the horseradish sauce on top
input_text: Ingredients: 14 pound diced cooked ham or bacon not sugarcured, 1 large yellow onion, sliced, two 9ounce packages frozen cut green beans, thawed, or two 14 12ounce cans cut green beans, rinsed and drained, 1 cup water, 1 cup mayonnaise, 2 hardboiled eggs, chopped, 1 heaping tablespoon prepared horseradish, 1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce, 12 teaspoon garlic salt, 12 teaspoon celery salt, 12 teaspoon onion salt, ground black pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, juice of 1 lemon
target_text: Directions: combine the meat and onion in a large saucepan over mediumhigh heat, stirring occasionally, cook until the meat is lightly browned and the onion translucent, 2 to 3 minutes, add the beans and water, cover, reduce the heat to low, and simmer until the beans are tender, about 20 minutes, meanwhile, combine the mayonnaise, eggs, horseradish, worcestershire sauce, garlic salt, celery salt, onion salt, pepper, parsley, and lemon juice in a bowl, mix well, drain the bean mixture, put on a serving plate, and spoon the horseradish sauce on top

ingredients: 13 c soft shortening, 1 12 c sugar, divided, 1 egg, 1 12 c sifted allpurpose flour, 1 12 tsp baking powder, 12 tsp salt, 14 tsp nutmeg, 12 c milk, 6 tbsp melted butter, 1 tsp cinnamon
directions: cream shortening and 1 cup sugar, add egg beat well, mix and sift flour, baking powder, salt and nutmeg, add alternately with milk to egg mixture, fill greased muffin pans 23 full bake in moderate oven 350u00b0 for 20 to 30 minutes or until golden brown, remove from pans at once and roll in melted butter, then in mixture of remaining 12 cup sugar and cinnamon, makes 12 medium or 18 small muffins
input_text: Ingredients: 13 c soft shortening, 1 12 c sugar, divided, 1 egg, 1 12 c sifted allpurpose flour, 1 12 tsp baking powder, 12 tsp salt, 14 tsp nutmeg, 12 c milk, 6 tbsp melted butter, 1 tsp cinnamon
target_text: Directions: cream shortening and 1 cup sugar, add egg beat well, mix and sift flour, baking powder, salt and nutmeg, add alternately with milk to egg mixture, fill greased muffin pans 23 full bake in moderate oven 350u00b0 for 20 to 30 minutes or until golden brown, remove from pans at once and roll in melted butter, then in mixture of remaining 12 cup sugar and cinnamon, makes 12 medium or 18 small muffins

ingredients: 1 kg pork fillet, diced, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 onions, finely sliced, 1 red pepper, finely sliced, 2 medium kumara, peeled and cubed, 4 medium potatoes, peeled and thickly sliced, 1 tablespoon curry powder, 2 tablespoons olive oil, extra optional, 1 12 cups beef stock, 400 g italian tomatoes, 1 lemon, juice of, 300 g mint flavoured peas, 1 tablespoon flour, 12 cup cream, 1 cup parsley, finely chopped
directions: heat the oil in a wok or fry pan to high, add pork and brown on all sides, remove pork with a slotted spoon and place onto paper towels, reduce heat in wok, add onion and red pepper and quickly stir fry for 23 minutes then add kumara and potatoes, sprinkle over curry powder, drizzle over extra oil if necessary and toss for 1 minutes until well combined, pour in stock, stir in tomatoes and lemon juice, transfer pork and vegetable mixture to the inner bowl of crockpot, cover with lid and cook for 5 hours as per instructions in your crockpot manual, add peas 15 minutes before serving
input_text: Ingredients: 1 kg pork fillet, diced, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 onions, finely sliced, 1 red pepper, finely sliced, 2 medium kumara, peeled and cubed, 4 medium potatoes, peeled and thickly sliced, 1 tablespoon curry powder, 2 tablespoons olive oil, extra optional, 1 12 cups beef stock, 400 g italian tomatoes, 1 lemon, juice of, 300 g mint flavoured peas, 1 tablespoon flour, 12 cup cream, 1 cup parsley, finely chopped
target_text: Directions: heat the oil in a wok or fry pan to high, add pork and brown on all sides, remove pork with a slotted spoon and place onto paper towels, reduce heat in wok, add onion and red pepper and quickly stir fry for 23 minutes then add kumara and potatoes, sprinkle over curry powder, drizzle over extra oil if necessary and toss for 1 minutes until well combined, pour in stock, stir in tomatoes and lemon juice, transfer pork and vegetable mixture to the inner bowl of crockpot, cover with lid and cook for 5 hours as per instructions in your crockpot manual, add peas 15 minutes before serving

ingredients: 12 c instant nonfat dry milk, 12 c sugar, 18 tsp salt, 1 13 c water, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 tsp vanilla, 1 14 c cooked rice, 1 tbsp butter, melted, 12 tsp cinnamon optional
directions: mix nonfat dry milk, sugar, salt and water, stir in eggs and vanilla, mix together with rice and butter, pour into 1quart baking dish, greased, and sprinkle with cinnamon, set dish in a shallow pan of water hot in preheated 350u00b0 oven, bake for approximately 1 14 hours, stir twice after first 12 hour of baking, makes 4 servings
input_text: Ingredients: 12 c instant nonfat dry milk, 12 c sugar, 18 tsp salt, 1 13 c water, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 tsp vanilla, 1 14 c cooked rice, 1 tbsp butter, melted, 12 tsp cinnamon optional
target_text: Directions: mix nonfat dry milk, sugar, salt and water, stir in eggs and vanilla, mix together with rice and butter, pour into 1quart baking dish, greased, and sprinkle with cinnamon, set dish in a shallow pan of water hot in preheated 350u00b0 oven, bake for approximately 1 14 hours, stir twice after first 12 hour of baking, makes 4 servings

ingredients: 34 c dry rice, 1 12 c water, 3 eggs or 6 egg whites, 3 tbsp grated parmesan, 1 pkg frozen spinach, chopped and drained, 12 tsp nutmeg, pepper to taste, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 tbsp margarine, 1 c skim milk
directions: cook rice in water until tender drain and mix with 1 beaten egg and tablespoon cheese, press firmly into 9inch pie pan to form crust, bake crust 3 minutes in 425u00b0 oven, saute onion in margarine until slightly brown, add to spinach, nutmeg, pepper and lemon juice, put in crust sprinkle with remaining cheese mix 2 eggs with milk and pour into quiche, bake 10 minutes at 425u00b0, lower temperature to 350u00b0 and bake 30 minutes longer, done when center is firm, makes 6 servings, approximately 185 calories per serving
input_text: Ingredients: 34 c dry rice, 1 12 c water, 3 eggs or 6 egg whites, 3 tbsp grated parmesan, 1 pkg frozen spinach, chopped and drained, 12 tsp nutmeg, pepper to taste, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 tbsp margarine, 1 c skim milk
target_text: Directions: cook rice in water until tender drain and mix with 1 beaten egg and tablespoon cheese, press firmly into 9inch pie pan to form crust, bake crust 3 minutes in 425u00b0 oven, saute onion in margarine until slightly brown, add to spinach, nutmeg, pepper and lemon juice, put in crust sprinkle with remaining cheese mix 2 eggs with milk and pour into quiche, bake 10 minutes at 425u00b0, lower temperature to 350u00b0 and bake 30 minutes longer, done when center is firm, makes 6 servings, approximately 185 calories per serving

ingredients: 2 or more eggs, 2 or more tomatoes, grated cheese, 14 pt milk
directions: skin and slice tomatoes, cook in a little margarine in a saucepan, and then pour into a greased pie dish, in the same pan, with a little more margarine, add the milk and the slightly beaten eggs, cook over low heat, stirring as for scrambled eggs, until just beginning to set
input_text: Ingredients: 2 or more eggs, 2 or more tomatoes, grated cheese, 14 pt milk
target_text: Directions: skin and slice tomatoes, cook in a little margarine in a saucepan, and then pour into a greased pie dish, in the same pan, with a little more margarine, add the milk and the slightly beaten eggs, cook over low heat, stirring as for scrambled eggs, until just beginning to set

ingredients: 1 ounce, fluid herbal or green aromatic tea, 212 ounces, fluid fresh watermelon juice, 2 ounces, fluid vodka
directions: first, brew one of your favorite light aromatic teas  any delicately flavored aromatic herbal or green tea should work nicely we used an herbal orangelemon grass tea the slight bitterness of the tea when combined with the delicate sweetness of the fresh watermelon created a balanced well rounded flavor once brewed, chill the tea mixture, for the watermelon juice cut one watermelon in half, saving one half in case you need more juice later or for another recipe cut the halved watermelon into medium sized chunks while removing the rind and place chunks into a food processor or blender process the watermelon thoroughly or until it looks like a watermelon slushy strain the watermelon mixture through a fine kitchen strainer or sieve into a bowl if you dont have a strainer you can use cheese cloth or a paper towel, this will reduce your yield slightly due to the cloth absorbing some of the juice, but works well one half of a 56 diameter seedless watermelon yielded 16 ounces of juice, serving start by chilling a classic martini style cocktail glass by filling it with ice or placing it in the freezer for a few minutes, in a cocktail shaker filled with ice, mix in the above quantities or equivalent ratios of vodka, fresh watermelon juice, and tea shake the cocktail mix for at least 1015 seconds in shaker to ensure the mix is extra cold and well combined, pour into a chilled glass and garnish with a rose petal if you really want to make a statement enjoy

ingredients: 1 pkg 4serving size jello chocolate flavor instant pudding, 1 cup allpurpose baking mix, 14 cup oil, 1 egg, 14 cup sugar
directions: preheat oven to 350f, mix dry pudding mix and baking mix in medium bowl, stir in oil and egg with wooden spoon until mixture forms ball, shape dough into 36 small balls, each about 12 inch in diameter, place, 2 inches apart, on ungreased baking sheets, flatten each cookie with bottom of drinking glass sprinkle with sugar, bake 5 to 8 minutes or until cookies feel set to the touch, cool on wire racks
input_text: Ingredients: 1 pkg 4serving size jello chocolate flavor instant pudding, 1 cup allpurpose baking mix, 14 cup oil, 1 egg, 14 cup sugar
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 350f, mix dry pudding mix and baking mix in medium bowl, stir in oil and egg with wooden spoon until mixture forms ball, shape dough into 36 small balls, each about 12 inch in diameter, place, 2 inches apart, on ungreased baking sheets, flatten each cookie with bottom of drinking glass sprinkle with sugar, bake 5 to 8 minutes or until cookies feel set to the touch, cool on wire racks

ingredients: 12 lb sausage, cooked and drained, 12 lb hamburger, cooked and drained, bread crumbs, 1 egg, 1 onion, chopped, 1 bay leaf, 1 qt water, salt and pepper, to taste, vinegar, to taste, lemon juice, to taste, salt, to taste, egg yolk, to taste, flour, as needed, capers optional
directions: 1, combine sausage, hamburger, bread crumbs and egg together and form meatballs, cool, 2, in saucepan combine 1 sliced onion, 1 bay leaf, 1 quart water and boil 10 minutes, add meatballs for 15 minutes of boiling, 3, for the sauce combine vinegar or lemon juice, salt, egg yolk and flour to thicken, cook together until thick, add capers, as desired
input_text: Ingredients: 12 lb sausage, cooked and drained, 12 lb hamburger, cooked and drained, bread crumbs, 1 egg, 1 onion, chopped, 1 bay leaf, 1 qt water, salt and pepper, to taste, vinegar, to taste, lemon juice, to taste, salt, to taste, egg yolk, to taste, flour, as needed, capers optional
target_text: Directions: 1, combine sausage, hamburger, bread crumbs and egg together and form meatballs, cool, 2, in saucepan combine 1 sliced onion, 1 bay leaf, 1 quart water and boil 10 minutes, add meatballs for 15 minutes of boiling, 3, for the sauce combine vinegar or lemon juice, salt, egg yolk and flour to thicken, cook together until thick, add capers, as desired

ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp olive oil, 1 c canned tomatoes, chopped, 1 tsp each dried basil and oregano, 1 c cooked pasta, 12 c partskim ricotta cheese
directions: saute garlic in oil, add tomatoes and seasonings, simmer for 10 to 15 minutes, pour over pasta, stir in ricotta cheese, you may substitute 12 cup shredded mozzarella for the ricotta cheese
input_text: Ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tsp olive oil, 1 c canned tomatoes, chopped, 1 tsp each dried basil and oregano, 1 c cooked pasta, 12 c partskim ricotta cheese
target_text: Directions: saute garlic in oil, add tomatoes and seasonings, simmer for 10 to 15 minutes, pour over pasta, stir in ricotta cheese, you may substitute 12 cup shredded mozzarella for the ricotta cheese

ingredients: 13 cup plus 4 tablespoons reserved beef fat, butter, or vegetable oil or a combination, 6 eggs, 1 12 cups allpurpose flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme leaves, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary leaves, 12 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 2 cups milk, 14 cup heavy cream, 4 ounces goat cheese, cut or crumbled into 18 to 20 equal pieces
directions: preheat the oven to 400 degrees f, brush 18 to 20 wells of 2 popover or muffin tins with some of the melted fat, place tins in the oven to heat while you prepare the popover batter, combine the eggs, flour, salt, thyme, rosemary, and pepper in a blender and blend until well combined, using a spatula, scrape down the sides of the blender, while the blender is running, add the milk and cream in a slow stream until smooth and thoroughly combined, remove tins from the oven and fill each prepared well halfway with some of the batter, place a piece of the cheese in the center of each cup and pour the remaining batter over so that the cups are filled 23 of the way, bake the popovers until puffed and golden, 20 to 25 minutes, serve immediately
input_text: Ingredients: 13 cup plus 4 tablespoons reserved beef fat, butter, or vegetable oil or a combination, 6 eggs, 1 12 cups allpurpose flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme leaves, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary leaves, 12 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 2 cups milk, 14 cup heavy cream, 4 ounces goat cheese, cut or crumbled into 18 to 20 equal pieces
target_text: Directions: preheat the oven to 400 degrees f, brush 18 to 20 wells of 2 popover or muffin tins with some of the melted fat, place tins in the oven to heat while you prepare the popover batter, combine the eggs, flour, salt, thyme, rosemary, and pepper in a blender and blend until well combined, using a spatula, scrape down the sides of the blender, while the blender is running, add the milk and cream in a slow stream until smooth and thoroughly combined, remove tins from the oven and fill each prepared well halfway with some of the batter, place a piece of the cheese in the center of each cup and pour the remaining batter over so that the cups are filled 23 of the way, bake the popovers until puffed and golden, 20 to 25 minutes, serve immediately

ingredients: 1 16 ounce package breakfast sausage, do not use maple mild, regular or hot, 2 8 ounce tubes crescent rolls, 1 bunch green onion, 1 8 ounce brick cream cheese softend, 14 teaspoon lowerys season salt
directions: 1, fry sausage until brown and completely done, 2, chop green onions, 3, mix sausage and green onions into softend cream cheese, 4, add just a pinch of lowerys season salt, 5, mix well, 6, spread 1 pack crescent rolls out in a baking dish, 7, spread cream cheese mixture ontop, 8, spread second pack crescent rolls ontop of mixture, 9, bake at 375 degrees for 15  20 minutes, the crescent rolls should be golden brown and flaky
input_text: Ingredients: 1 16 ounce package breakfast sausage, do not use maple mild, regular or hot, 2 8 ounce tubes crescent rolls, 1 bunch green onion, 1 8 ounce brick cream cheese softend, 14 teaspoon lowerys season salt
target_text: Directions: 1, fry sausage until brown and completely done, 2, chop green onions, 3, mix sausage and green onions into softend cream cheese, 4, add just a pinch of lowerys season salt, 5, mix well, 6, spread 1 pack crescent rolls out in a baking dish, 7, spread cream cheese mixture ontop, 8, spread second pack crescent rolls ontop of mixture, 9, bake at 375 degrees for 15  20 minutes, the crescent rolls should be golden brown and flaky

ingredients: 1 tablespoon canola oil, 12 pound boneless pork shoulder butt roast, cubed, 12 pound fully cooked andouille sausage links, sliced, 2 medium tomatoes, seeded and chopped, 1 can 15 ounces hominy, rinsed and drained, 1 cup minced fresh cilantro, 1 medium onion, chopped, 4 green onions, chopped, 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 12 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 12 teaspoon coarsely ground pepper, 6 cups reducedsodium chicken broth, optional ingredients corn tortillas, chopped onion, minced fresh cilantro and lime wedges
directions: in a 6qt electric pressure cooker, select saute setting and adjust for normal heat add oil add pork cubes and sausage cook and stir until browned remove pork and sausage drain return meats to pressure cooker, add next 12 ingredients lock lid make sure vent is closed select manual setting adjust pressure to high and set time for 10 minutes when finished cooking, allow pressure to naturally release for 5 minutes, then quickrelease any remaining pressure according to manufacturers directions if desired, serve with tortillas, onion, cilantro and lime wedges
input_text: Ingredients: 1 tablespoon canola oil, 12 pound boneless pork shoulder butt roast, cubed, 12 pound fully cooked andouille sausage links, sliced, 2 medium tomatoes, seeded and chopped, 1 can 15 ounces hominy, rinsed and drained, 1 cup minced fresh cilantro, 1 medium onion, chopped, 4 green onions, chopped, 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 12 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 12 teaspoon coarsely ground pepper, 6 cups reducedsodium chicken broth, optional ingredients corn tortillas, chopped onion, minced fresh cilantro and lime wedges
target_text: Directions: in a 6qt electric pressure cooker, select saute setting and adjust for normal heat add oil add pork cubes and sausage cook and stir until browned remove pork and sausage drain return meats to pressure cooker, add next 12 ingredients lock lid make sure vent is closed select manual setting adjust pressure to high and set time for 10 minutes when finished cooking, allow pressure to naturally release for 5 minutes, then quickrelease any remaining pressure according to manufacturers directions if desired, serve with tortillas, onion, cilantro and lime wedges

ingredients: 1 23 cups ruby port, 14 cup balsamic vinegar, 14 cup packed golden brown sugar, 8 dried black mission figs, stemmed, chopped, 1 6inchlong sprig fresh rosemary, 14 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 12ounce bag fresh cranberries, 34 cup sugar
directions: combine first 6 ingredients in medium saucepan, bring to boil, stirring until sugar dissolves, reduce heat to low and simmer 10 minutes, discard rosemary, mix in cranberries and 34 cup sugar, cook over medium heat until liquid is slightly reduced and berries burst, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes, cool, transfer sauce to bowl chill until cold, cranberry sauce can be prepared 1 week ahead, cover and keep refrigerated
input_text: Ingredients: 1 23 cups ruby port, 14 cup balsamic vinegar, 14 cup packed golden brown sugar, 8 dried black mission figs, stemmed, chopped, 1 6inchlong sprig fresh rosemary, 14 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 12ounce bag fresh cranberries, 34 cup sugar
target_text: Directions: combine first 6 ingredients in medium saucepan, bring to boil, stirring until sugar dissolves, reduce heat to low and simmer 10 minutes, discard rosemary, mix in cranberries and 34 cup sugar, cook over medium heat until liquid is slightly reduced and berries burst, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes, cool, transfer sauce to bowl chill until cold, cranberry sauce can be prepared 1 week ahead, cover and keep refrigerated

ingredients: 112 cups shredded rotisserie chicken whole foods 1 lb for 399 thru 0209, 12 cup frozen corn, 12 cup shredded carrots, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup pollyo original ricotta cheese, 1 cup kraft shredded italian five cheese with a touch of philadelphia, 1 egg, 12 cup kraft shredded parmesan cheese, divided, 14 cup fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips, divided, 6 lasagna noodles, cooked, 2 cups classico family favorites traditional pasta sauce
directions: combine first 7 ingredients in large bowl, add 14 cup parmesan and 2 tbsp, basil mix well, spread chicken mixture onto noodles roll up tightly, pour spaghetti sauce into large skillet, add rollups, seam sides down, spoon sauce over rollups cover, bring to boil on mediumhigh heat simmer on mediumlow heat 20 min, or until heated through, sprinkle with remaining parmesan and basil
input_text: Ingredients: 112 cups shredded rotisserie chicken whole foods 1 lb for 399 thru 0209, 12 cup frozen corn, 12 cup shredded carrots, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 cup pollyo original ricotta cheese, 1 cup kraft shredded italian five cheese with a touch of philadelphia, 1 egg, 12 cup kraft shredded parmesan cheese, divided, 14 cup fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips, divided, 6 lasagna noodles, cooked, 2 cups classico family favorites traditional pasta sauce
target_text: Directions: combine first 7 ingredients in large bowl, add 14 cup parmesan and 2 tbsp, basil mix well, spread chicken mixture onto noodles roll up tightly, pour spaghetti sauce into large skillet, add rollups, seam sides down, spoon sauce over rollups cover, bring to boil on mediumhigh heat simmer on mediumlow heat 20 min, or until heated through, sprinkle with remaining parmesan and basil

ingredients: 2 cans eagle brand milk sweetened, vanilla wafers, bananas, cool whip
directions: place cans in saucepan and cover with water boil for 3 hours, making sure water covers cans throughout the boiling process after 3 hours, set out of water until they become room temperature when open, should be caramelized in a 9inch pie pan, line vanilla wafers layer 4 to 5 bananas on top of wafers and cover with eagle brand top with cool whip
input_text: Ingredients: 2 cans eagle brand milk sweetened, vanilla wafers, bananas, cool whip
target_text: Directions: place cans in saucepan and cover with water boil for 3 hours, making sure water covers cans throughout the boiling process after 3 hours, set out of water until they become room temperature when open, should be caramelized in a 9inch pie pan, line vanilla wafers layer 4 to 5 bananas on top of wafers and cover with eagle brand top with cool whip

ingredients: 3 eggs, 1 cup oil, 2 cups sugar, 2 t salt, 1 t soda, 1 t cinnamon, 3 cups flour, 12 t baking powder, 1 cup nuts, chopped, 2 cups grated zucchini
directions: grease and flour two loaf pans or one large angel food pan, , combine dry ingredients, including sugar, , add to egg and oil mixture, blending, add zucchini and nuts beat on low just until mixed, , pour into prepared pans bake 325 for one hour, , freezes well wrapped in cellophane and aluminum foil
input_text: Ingredients: 3 eggs, 1 cup oil, 2 cups sugar, 2 t salt, 1 t soda, 1 t cinnamon, 3 cups flour, 12 t baking powder, 1 cup nuts, chopped, 2 cups grated zucchini
target_text: Directions: grease and flour two loaf pans or one large angel food pan, , combine dry ingredients, including sugar, , add to egg and oil mixture, blending, add zucchini and nuts beat on low just until mixed, , pour into prepared pans bake 325 for one hour, , freezes well wrapped in cellophane and aluminum foil

ingredients: 1 large garlic clove, 34 teaspoon salt, 1 lb poblano chiles about 4 large,, 6 large eggs, 1 cup whole milk, 12 cup mexican crema or heavy cream, 2 tablespoons finely grated white onion using small teardrop holes of a box grater, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 12 lb monterey jack cheese, coarsely grated 2 12 to 3 cups, a 9inch 2inch deep round fluted tart pan with removable bottom pie weights or raw rice, pie weights or raw rice
directions: put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 375u00b0f, roll out dough into a 13inch round on a lightly floured surface with a floured rolling pin fit dough into tart pan, without stretching, letting excess dough hang over edge fold overhang inward and press against side of pan to reinforce edge prick bottom all over with a fork chill until firm, about 30 minutes, line shell with foil or parchment paper and fill with pie weights bake until pastry is set and pale golden along rim, 20 to 25 minutes, carefully remove foil and weights and bake shell until deep golden all over, 15 to 20 minutes more put tart pan in a shallow baking pan leave oven on, mince garlic and mash to a paste with salt using side of a large knife, discard seeds, ribs, and stems from chiles, then pat dry if necessary and cut into 13inchwide strips, whisk together eggs, milk, crema, onion, garlic paste, and pepper in a large bowl until just combined, then pour into baked tart shell, sprinkle cheese and chiles over custard chiles will sink slightly and bake until custard is just set, 50 to 60 minutes center will jiggle slightly filling will continue to set as it cools, transfer quiche in pan to a rack to cool at least 20 minutes before serving, to remove side of tart pan, center a large can under pan and let side of pan drop serve warm or at room temperature
input_text: Ingredients: 1 large garlic clove, 34 teaspoon salt, 1 lb poblano chiles about 4 large,, 6 large eggs, 1 cup whole milk, 12 cup mexican crema or heavy cream, 2 tablespoons finely grated white onion using small teardrop holes of a box grater, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 12 lb monterey jack cheese, coarsely grated 2 12 to 3 cups, a 9inch 2inch deep round fluted tart pan with removable bottom pie weights or raw rice, pie weights or raw rice
target_text: Directions: put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 375u00b0f, roll out dough into a 13inch round on a lightly floured surface with a floured rolling pin fit dough into tart pan, without stretching, letting excess dough hang over edge fold overhang inward and press against side of pan to reinforce edge prick bottom all over with a fork chill until firm, about 30 minutes, line shell with foil or parchment paper and fill with pie weights bake until pastry is set and pale golden along rim, 20 to 25 minutes, carefully remove foil and weights and bake shell until deep golden all over, 15 to 20 minutes more put tart pan in a shallow baking pan leave oven on, mince garlic and mash to a paste with salt using side of a large knife, discard seeds, ribs, and stems from chiles, then pat dry if necessary and cut into 13inchwide strips, whisk together eggs, milk, crema, onion, garlic paste, and pepper in a large bowl until just combined, then pour into baked tart shell, sprinkle cheese and chiles over custard chiles will sink slightly and bake until custard is just set, 50 to 60 minutes center will jiggle slightly filling will continue to set as it cools, transfer quiche in pan to a rack to cool at least 20 minutes before serving, to remove side of tart pan, center a large can under pan and let side of pan drop serve warm or at room temperature

ingredients: 12 c shortening, 12 c firmly packed brown sugar, 1 c allpurpose flour, sifted, 12 tsp salt, 2 eggs, 1 c firmly packed brown sugar, 1 tsp vanilla, 2 tbsp allpurpose flour, 12 tsp baking powder, 1 13 c flaked coconut, 1 c chopped pecans
directions: preheat oven to 325u00b0, blend shortening and 12 cup brown sugar, add 1 cup flour and salt, stir in milk, pat evenly in a greased 9 x 9 x 2inch pan, bake at 325u00b0 for about 20 minutes or until light brown, beat eggs add 1 cup brown sugar and vanilla beat until thick, stir remaining ingredients, pour onto mixture in pan, bake at 325u00b0 for 20 minutes, or until golden brown cool, frost and garnish with cherries, if desired, cut into squares
input_text: Ingredients: 12 c shortening, 12 c firmly packed brown sugar, 1 c allpurpose flour, sifted, 12 tsp salt, 2 eggs, 1 c firmly packed brown sugar, 1 tsp vanilla, 2 tbsp allpurpose flour, 12 tsp baking powder, 1 13 c flaked coconut, 1 c chopped pecans
target_text: Directions: preheat oven to 325u00b0, blend shortening and 12 cup brown sugar, add 1 cup flour and salt, stir in milk, pat evenly in a greased 9 x 9 x 2inch pan, bake at 325u00b0 for about 20 minutes or until light brown, beat eggs add 1 cup brown sugar and vanilla beat until thick, stir remaining ingredients, pour onto mixture in pan, bake at 325u00b0 for 20 minutes, or until golden brown cool, frost and garnish with cherries, if desired, cut into squares

ingredients: 1 8 ounce package small seashell pasta, 2 eggs, 2 ounces cooked ham, cut into thin strips, 1 10 ounce package frozen english peas, thawed, 1 cup shredded swiss cheese, 12 cup mayonnaise, 14 cup sour cream, green onions, chopped, 1 teaspoon prepared mustard, 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, 1 teaspoon paprika
directions: bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente rinse under cold water, drain, and set aside, meanwhile, place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water over medium heat, bring water to a full boil lower heat and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes immediately plunge eggs into cold water let cool completely, then peel and slice, in a large serving bowl, toss together the pasta, egg, ham, peas, and swiss cheese in a separate bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, sour cream, green onion, mustard, mustard, and hot pepper sauce stir until well blended, pour 34 of the dressing over the pasta, and toss to coat thoroughly spread the remaining dressing evenly over the top of the pasta salad, all the way to the edge of the bowl sprinkle with paprika, cover tightly, and chill 4 hours, or overnight for best flavor
input_text: Ingredients: 1 8 ounce package small seashell pasta, 2 eggs, 2 ounces cooked ham, cut into thin strips, 1 10 ounce package frozen english peas, thawed, 1 cup shredded swiss cheese, 12 cup mayonnaise, 14 cup sour cream, green onions, chopped, 1 teaspoon prepared mustard, 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, 1 teaspoon paprika
target_text: Directions: bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente rinse under cold water, drain, and set aside, meanwhile, place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water over medium heat, bring water to a full boil lower heat and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes immediately plunge eggs into cold water let cool completely, then peel and slice, in a large serving bowl, toss together the pasta, egg, ham, peas, and swiss cheese in a separate bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, sour cream, green onion, mustard, mustard, and hot pepper sauce stir until well blended, pour 34 of the dressing over the pasta, and toss to coat thoroughly spread the remaining dressing evenly over the top of the pasta salad, all the way to the edge of the bowl sprinkle with paprika, cover tightly, and chill 4 hours, or overnight for best flavor

ingredients: 12 c onion, 1 6 oz can tomato paste, 14 tsp salt, 1 c water, 1 12 lb ground beef, 1 c bread crumbs, 1 12 tsp salt, 1 tsp oregano, 14 tsp basil, 14 tsp pepper, 12 clove garlic, 1 egg, 1 tbsp parmesan cheese, 1 c shredded mozzarella cheese
directions: combine tomato paste, salt and water in saucepan, bring to a boil reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, 20 minutes, combine other ingredients except cheeses, using 12 cup of cooled sauce shape and put in loaf pan, bake at 375u00b0 for 1 hour, pour remaining sauce over meat loaf sprinkle with cheeses and bake 10 minutes more

target_text: Directions: combine tomato paste, salt and water in saucepan, bring to a boil reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, 20 minutes, combine other ingredients except cheeses, using 12 cup of cooled sauce shape and put in loaf pan, bake at 375u00b0 for 1 hour, pour remaining sauce over meat loaf sprinkle with cheeses and bake 10 minutes more

ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 green bell pepper, diced, 2 teaspoons chili powder, 12 teaspoon kosher salt, 2 cups white beans, rinsed and drained, 1 14 12ounce can chopped tomatoes, drained, 2 14 12ounce cans chicken broth, 6 ounces roasted lamb, shredded, 1 cup roasted carrots, chopped, 2 tablespoons allpurpose flour, 2 scallions, trimmed and thinly sliced
directions: in a large skillet over medium heat, heat the oil add the bell pepper, chili powder, and salt and cook until softened, about 3 minutes add the beans, tomatoes, chicken broth, lamb, and carrots cover and bring to a boil reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes, meannwhile, in a small bowl, whisk together the flour and 14 cup warm water stir into the chili and cook until thickened, about 5 minutes more stir in the scallions

ingredients: 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 12 lb zucchini, chopped, 2 12 c chicken stock, 14 tsp nutmeg, 12 tsp dried basil, 12 tsp salt, 12 tsp pepper, 1 c cream or half and half

ingredients: crawfish cakes, 12 cup butter, 2 cups onions, peeled and diced, 1 cup celery, diced, 1 cup red bell pepper, seeded and diced, 1 cup green bell pepper, seeded and diced, 1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon tabasco sauce or other louisiana style hot sauce, 1 lb crawfish tail meat, 2 ounces romano cheese, grated about 12 cup, 1 cup dry breadcrumbs, salt and pepper, to taste, 4 tablespoons olive oil, 4 tablespoons flour, for dusting, lemon butter sauce, 2 lemons, juice of, 14 cup dry white wine chardonnay, pinot grigio or sauvignon blanc, 1 cup butter, cut into tablespoons
directions: to make the crawfish cakes melt the butter in a large skillet and saute the vegetables until tender, about five minutes, add the worcestershire, hot sauce and crawfish cook about three minutes or until the crawfish are heated through, remove from heat and add remaining ingredients mix thoroughly, transfer to a cookie sheet and chill in refrigerator at least 45 minutes or overnight, form into 8 round cakes of about 12 cup each, dust with flour, heat olive oil in a skillet and cook cakes until golden on each side, for the sauce combine the lemon juice and wine in a saucepan cook over medium heat until reduced by half, lower heat and whisk in butter a tablespoon at a time, to serve, ladle a little sauce on warmed salad plates place two cakes on each

directions: combine first 4 ingredients in a small bowl sprinkle both sides of fish with spice mixture, heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium heat, and add fish cook 6 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork

directions: shred lettuce, place in shallow 4quart size dish, top with onion, celery and chestnuts, break apart frozen peas sprinkle over greens, add mayonnaise, sugar, cheese, salt and garlic salt cover and chill in refrigerator overnight, before serving, slice boiled eggs and decorate salad, add crumbled bacon bits and tomatoes

ingredients: 14 34 ounces salmon, drained and flaked remove skin and bones, 2 avocados, halved, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 tablespoon taco seasoning or 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 cup tomatoes, chopped, 1 cup white onion, chopped, 2 3 jalapenos, chopped, 12 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
directions: cut avocados in half and scoop out avocado, leaving 14 inch rim for shell, set aside halved shells, reserve avocado and dice to combine with remaining ingredients, combine salmon, lemon juice, lime juice, and seasoning and stir gently, toss diced avocado, tomato, onion, jalapeno, and cilantro with seasoned salmon, fill avocado shells with salmon tomato mixture, serve with hot sauce and tortilla chips if desired

ingredients: 6 large eggs, water
directions: place eggs in medium saucepan cover with water 1 above the eggs place on stovetop over high heat, bring to a boil immediately remove from heat and cover let sit 1820 minutes, pour cold tap water into pot allowing the hot water out by holding the pot on a slant let eggs sit in cold water for 12 minutes, then peel easily, note no garbage disposalshells for gardening method i peel the eggs under running cold water with a colander underneath to catch the shells i placed the eggs onto paper towels to rid excess moisture for egg salad, or place peeled eggs into a bowl of cold water, cover and refrigerate where they keep for about 45 days

ingredients: 2 c salmon, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 12 c bread crumbs, 1 c thin white sauce, salt and pepper
directions: flake salmon and place half of it into a greased baking dish season with lemon juice, cover with half of bread crumbs and repeat in layers, pour white sauce on top and bake in oven for 20 minutes at 350u00b0
